The space
Aplace Antwerp is located on a charming little square in the very center of Antwerp (fashion district area). Literally around the corner of everything you want to see in this beautifull city.

It has a small sitting corner with sofa, digital tv, a docking station, dvd-player, a shared kitchinette with Illy espresso machine, a perculator and a little fridge and a microwave. The bathroom has a walk-in / rainshower.


This suite is situated in the back of the building and is extremely cosy.

name: Apartment with terrace in trendy Zurenborg
description:
Do you enjoy authentic places with a lot of charm? Parquet flooring, high ceilings, many nice ornaments. The neighbourhood Zurenborg is a real gem. The square near the house 'Dageraadplaats' is packed with bars and restaurants. All generations enjoy the lively athomsphere, parents can enjoy the many terraces while kids are playing safely on the playground. This apartment has a small terrace. It is near the train station and very well connected with public transport to get to the centre of town.

The space
This apartment has one room with a double bunk bed. A big sofa in the living room can be used as a bed if necessary. The house was built in the beginning of the roaring twenties. The large room has a loggia, high ceilings, marble chimney and integrated mirrors. It is filled with wonderful decorative antique ornaments.

The space
Apartment "Roscam" is a charming self catering guest apartment situated on the Vrijdagmarkt, a peaceful square in the fashion district area, right in the old city center of Antwerp.

A cosy living room (incl. double sofa bed), one comfortable bedroom with a double bed, a fully equipped kitchen (coffee, tea, boiler, microwave, toaster), and a bathroom with a shower.
The apartment is perfect for a couple and could host up to four people.

Guest access
The apartment is on the first floor but there is no elevator.

your entire, private groundfloor 2-bedroom apartment and garden

The space

You have lots of space, making our house suitable for longer stays. We prefer stays of minimum 3 nights. You're welcome for 1 or 2 nights too, but we only take these short term stays max. 2 weeks in advance.
Our flat provides one double and one single room. You get to the single room through the double room, so we only accommodate for a single party of maximum three people.
You have your own bathroom with shower and toilet, a full blown kitchen, a very cosy living-room (the library) and a small dining-room. And ... your own private garden.

host_about:
We, Lieve (52 y.) Fronk (49 y.) and Aurora (18 y.) love talking, laughing and music.
Communication is always easy as we speak several languages
Fronk is crazy about Brazil, where he lived for 2 years
Lieve adores India and Aurora is mad about Greece.
We have a preference for natural, vegetarian food.
Lieve and Fronk  practice Yoga daily..
We and our neighbours live on pleasant terms with each other.
Tranquility is a must in our home and in the building.
Please ring our bell... N°116/14 (fifth floor)

FLANDERS TODAY a flemish online newspaper has published an article about us and about Airbnb:
“In the last year we’ve had 60 or so guests staying with us at home,” says Fronk, who, with his partner Lieve, is one of the best-rated Flemish hosts on Airbnb, a hotel-like service for the digital age. “We have had guests from Brazil, the US, Canada, Iran, Japan, Bulgaria and more. Though no one from Africa has yet requested to stay.” 
Airbnb is an online marketplace for temporary accommodation across 33,000 cities in 192 countries. Trip planners can find spare rooms, flats, sofa-beds and even igloos and private islands. Some hosts are simply renting out a spare room for a couple of weeks a month to travellers to supplement their incomes or to fill the house when they themselves are away. 
Airbnb is in the vanguard of the so-called “sharing economy”, in which web services help private individuals monetise their possessions and share anything from school runs to electric drills. Flanders has more than 900 listings on the site. 
Connections 
Fronk and Lieve say that their guests have loved Antwerp and always have a good time. Yet if a number of their guests are visiting for tourism, many are in town for less conventional reasons. One was interviewing for a job at the opera house. Another was doing a course with world-famous contemporary artist Jan Fabre, while a third was studying with a leading dancer. A medievalist stayed for several weeks to learn Dutch for her research, while a Canadian rock band crashed when gigging down the road. 
Connecting with new people with different world views is one of the attractions, as is discovering a unexpected shared interest. “The other day I was having a bowl of soup with one of our guests, who had just arrived from the United States,” recalls Fronk. “To our surprise, we soon discovered that we were both working on essays on the same subject.” Fronk, who is a literary translator of Russian and a performer, and Lieve, an organist and soprano, say that in their year of hosting they have yet to have a bad experience. Some guests stay several weeks, some come back for a second or third visit. “But we make it clear on the website that we are vegetarians, that we do yoga and that this is a family house,” Fronk explains. This attracts people who are into the same things (and probably discourages those who want to spend their time exploring Antwerp’s party scene). 
Peer reviews 
Fronk and Lieve live in Borgerhout, a neighbourhood with a large immigrant population just east of the city’s Central Station, which is visible from their balcony. Borgerhout itself does not house many attractions and enjoys a reputation for being a rough sort of place. But guests have never had any problems, says Fronk. Indeed, he wistfully recalls a middle-aged American visitor looking out of the window at the district where Fronk grew up and declaring it a beautiful place. 
Importantly for guests, the area provides easy access by foot or bike to Antwerp’s main sites, including the zoo; elephants can be heard vaguely trumpeting from the flat’s balcony.

name: The chill place in Antwerp 1
description:
De slaapkamer bevind zich op de eerste verdieping van een sfeervol heren huis.

The space
Close to the city centre and central station in the artistic and multicultural neighbourhood Borgerhout a beautiful mansion (herenhuis) from 1905. Live in the grandeur of passed times and feel at home. Sleep in the comfortable double beds of the two large rooms. The two rooms share one big bathroom where a refreshing rainshower starts your day.

When you arrive I always take time to show you the house and give you a lot of suggestions what to do in Antwerp, where to drink or dine and where to go out.

name: Stay in a designers place & donate
description:
My beautiful one bedroom designer's place with exposed brick has a true city feeling! It comfortably fits two and is close to the heart of the city but in a quiet neighbourhood just on the other side of the river. Enjoy the open space!

The space
This beautiful designers place is located just one metrostop away from the city, just on the other side of the river. In an amazingly quiet neighborhood where you can walk next to the river and enjoy the view on our beautiful cathedral or our famous MAS museum which is located just on the other side of the river. The loft has an open kitchen and living room, and also open bath- and bedroom (double bed) with a shower and bathtub. The bedroom is equiped with a television with an HDMI cable (also apple) which allows you to connect your laptop and watch movies if you like. There is a small balcony in the front and a little terrace in the back which smokers can use for smoking, please no smoking inside.

host_about:
My two passions are traveling and designing interior and furniture. With airbnb i get to share both, because I believe the design of my appartment is also one of the reasons you choose for it. Since I travel a lot for work and private purposes, my appartment is empty quiet a lot and so i like others to enjoy it too! Also I just love to take good care of people, so whenever you come at my place I will always try to put in this little extra thing to make you smile!

As a lot of people I started renting out my place to have an extra income, to cover for my bills and to create some financial space to travel more myself. Recently I started sharing my profit with charity because I wanted it to be something more, for me. So now 5% of the profit I make renting out my appartment is donated to charity. 'SOS Kinderdorpen' at the moment, I will add more later on.

name: Duplex in the New South across of NEW PARK
description:
Well located in the vibrant 't Zuid of Antwerp

The space
Modern duplex in neighborhood "'t Zuid" of Antwerp. Right across there's a tram station which can bring you anywhere. Easy connection to central station. Food store on walking distance, just as bars and restaurants. Vibrant night life around the corner.

You'll have easy access to anywhere in the city. There's a bike station right across the street where you can rent bike for only 15 EUR for a week.

There's always something to do and you'll never need a car to go anywhere.

A couple can easily sleep in my bed but if you prefer two different sleeping facilities, there's also a comfortable couch where numerous people spent the night. Including myself.

If you let me know in advance when you are coming with more people, I can arrange and extra mattress or folding bed for their convince.

Guest access
Guests will have acces to the full apartment

name: BOHEMIAN FRIDA with garden, nearby central station
description:
BOHEMIAN FRIDA is gelegen naast een rustieke culturele fabriek met een ziel. Hier kom je niet zomaar terecht, het hele gebouw is begeven van artiesten en zelf zijn we ook met kunsten bezig o.a. keramiek en muziek. De plek voelt voor vele aan als een echte thuis en biedt een verzameling aan tweedehands schatten. Het ligt in Borgerhout vlakbij centraal station (15min. wandelen) De club DESTEEG beneden geven het appartement een extra gezelligheid en ambiance waar je kan komen dansen.

The space
Appartement is 45m2 groot en bevindt zich op de 3e verdieping. Het heeft zicht op de groene steeg en is volledig uitgerust met een keuken (+basisspullen zoals zout, peper, olijfolie, koffie en thee + snelkoker & oven) en een badkamer met bad, douche, toilet en haardroger. Handdoeken en douchegel worden voorzien.

Antwerp, my beattiful city, take a look at:

Visiting Antwerp and looking for a comfortable stay during your weekend, business-trip or an extended period of time? Then I am pleased to welcome you into my home in Deurne, a great starting point to explore Antwerp. You are surrounded by 3 parcs.
This family-run concept as an alternative to a hotel offers you a warm welcome and creates a relaxing atmosphere in which you will feel like home. Not far away from the city yet away from all the noise, you can enjoy a good night's sleep in an oasis of calmness after your journey or City-Trip.
The two beautiful guestrooms are decorated with much love and care, designed to give its guests the most pleasant stay possible. host_about:
I'm 29 years old, study Language and Literature at UA and work part-time in Antwerp.  I love the lively atmosphere of every city and try to enjoy it as much as possible. Going from concerts at festivals or parks, fashion and shopping, theatre performances, museums or just strolling through the city. And since I'm very social and quick to make contacts, the vision of an AirBnB is right up my alley. Providing a cosy space for wanderlust travelers, handing information about my town and creating some interaction without obtrusiveness. So travelling  in an unconventional way and interacting with locals is something the guests and I have in common. After travelling to San Francisco to live with a childhood friend, participating on an intercultural project in Mexico, sharing the apartment of an inhabitant in Berlin, Valladolid, Barcelona, Vienna, etc I even try to make a holiday out of being at home. Or as one of my favorite Dutch writers, Godfriend Bomans,  would put it; "The art of living is to be at home when one is travelling". I hope to bring my guests a feeling of "Home" during their stay and hopefully soon I'll meet and welcome you in Antwerp, I'm looking forward to it.

Ik ben  29 jaar, werk parttime en studeer  taal- en letterkunde aan de Universiteit van Antwerpen. Ik hou erg  van het levendige en bruisende, dat elke stad in zich heeft en probeer daar zoveel mogelijk van te genieten:  de terrasjes, optredens in parken of festivals, shoppen,   theatervoorstellingen, musea, flaneren door de stad, noem maar op.  Vermits ik vrij sociaal ben en snel  contacten maak, past de AirBnB -formule  helemaal in mijn visie: een cosy plek verschaffen aan de reislustige gasten, hen informatie geven over mijn stad en enige interactie opbouwen zonder opdringerigheid. Eén punt hebben de gasten en ik gemeen: we reizen graag, doen dit graag op een niet al te conventionele manier en houden van interactie met de plaatselijke inwoner(s).  Zo ging ik naar San Francisco om bij een jeugdvriendin in te wonen, nam deel aan een intercultureel project in Mexico,  deelde het appartement van een inwoonster in  Berlijn, Valladolid, Barcelona en Wenen, enz.  Ik probeer me ook thuis op reis te voelen of zoals de Nederlandse schrijver Godfried Bomans, één mijn favoriete schrijvers, het stelde : ” De kunst van te leven is thuis te zijn alsof men op reis is ". Ik hoop dat ik mijn gasten een gevoel van 'thuis zijn'  tijdens hun reis kan geven en hoop jullie snel te mogen verwelkomen en ontmoeten in (Website hidden by Airbnb) kijk er alvast naar uit..

Tengo 29 años y estudio Lengua y Literatura en la Universidad de Amberes y trabajo a medio tiempo en la ciudad. Me encanta el ambiente animado de cada ciudad y trato de disfrutarlo lo más posible con paseos a conciertos en festivales o parques, a través de la moda y las compras, obras de teatro, museos o simplemente pasear por la ciudad. Como soy una persona muy social y que rápidamente hace contactos, la visión de Airbnb es lo mío. Ofrezco un espacio agradable para los viajeros con deseo de explorar, facilito información sobre mi ciudad y establezco algún tipo de interacción sin impertinencia. Viajar de una manera poco convencional e interactuar con la gente local, es algo que los clientes y yo tenemos en común. Después de haber viajado a la ciudad de San Francisco para vivir con una amiga de la infancia, participado en un proyecto intercultural en México, compartido el apartamento de un habitante de Berlín, Valladolid, Barcelona, Viena, y más lugar, hasta trato de hacer unas vacaciones estando en mi casa. Como dice uno de mis escritores Neerlandés favoritos, Godfried Bomans "el arte de vivir es estar en casa cuando uno está viajando." Espero darles a mis invitados una sensación de "hogar" durante su estancia y espero que pronto pueda darle la bienvenida en Amberes.

我今年 29歲，在UA修語言及文學，同時在安特衛普打工。我喜歡每一個城市的熱鬧氛圍，不管是音樂節，公園演唱會，時尚購物，戲劇表演，博物館，或在市中心散步，我都盡可能找機會品嘗。另外我很樂於交朋友，不管是提供舒適的空間給旅遊愛好者，傳達關於我的城市的資訊，或無壓力的互動，我很理解也能夠發揮Airbnb想表達的精神，畢竟非凡的旅遊方式和與當地人交集是我們的共同點。
我曾去舊金山與兒時的朋友居住，參與過墨西哥的多重文化案子，與他人居住的城市包含柏林，巴拉多利德，巴塞羅那，維也納，等等。在家時我也儘量保持旅遊的心態。我最愛的荷蘭作家『Godfriend Bomans』曾說:『生活的祕訣在於旅遊時也感受到家。』我希望來這裡的客人都有這樣的感受，並期待很快能歡迎您來安特衛普。 

我今年29岁，在UA修语言及文学，同时在安特卫普打工。我喜欢每一个城市的热闹氛围，不管是音乐节，公园演唱会，时尚购物，戏剧表演，博物馆，或在市中心散步，我都尽可能找机会品尝。另外我很乐于交朋友，不管是提供舒适的空间给旅游爱好者，传达关于我的城市的资讯，或无压力的互动，我很理解也能够发挥Airbnb想表达的精神，毕竟非凡的旅游方式和与当地人交集是我们的共同点。
我曾去旧金山与儿时的朋友居住，参与过墨西哥的多重文化案子，与他人居住的城市包含柏林，巴拉多利德，巴塞罗那，维也纳，等等。在家时我也尽量保持旅游的心态。我最爱的荷兰作家『Godfriend Bomans』曾说:『生活的秘诀在于旅游时也感受到家。 』我希望来这里的客人都有这样的感受，并期待很快能欢迎您来安特卫普。

name: Colourful Inspiration In Every Room
description:
The space
Visiting Antwerp and looking for a comfortable stay during your weekend, business-trip or an extended period of time? Then I am pleased to welcome you into my home in Deurne, a great starting point to explore Antwerp. You are surrounded by 3 parcs.
This family-run concept as an alternative to a hotel offers you a warm welcome and creates a relaxing atmosphere in which you will feel like home. Not far away from the city yet away from all the noise, you can enjoy a good night's sleep in an oasis of calmness after your journey or City-Trip.
The beautiful guestroom is decorated with much love and care, designed to give its guests the most pleasant stay possible. Inspired by the Belgian architect Agnes Emery, The rooms were painted with the warm colors of Emery en co and were even given poetic titles to match the appearance of the rooms.
If you prefer charm, subtle romance and a bit of nostalgia then "La Nuit Tous Les Chats Sont Gris" with a bathro

host_about:
I'm 29 years old, study Language and Literature at UA and work part-time in Antwerp.  I love the lively atmosphere of every city and try to enjoy it as much as possible. Going from concerts at festivals or parks, fashion and shopping, theatre performances, museums or just strolling through the city. And since I'm very social and quick to make contacts, the vision of an AirBnB is right up my alley. Providing a cosy space for wanderlust travelers, handing information about my town and creating some interaction without obtrusiveness. So travelling  in an unconventional way and interacting with locals is something the guests and I have in common. After travelling to San Francisco to live with a childhood friend, participating on an intercultural project in Mexico, sharing the apartment of an inhabitant in Berlin, Valladolid, Barcelona, Vienna, etc I even try to make a holiday out of being at home. Or as one of my favorite Dutch writers, Godfriend Bomans,  would put it; "The art of living is to be at home when one is travelling". I hope to bring my guests a feeling of "Home" during their stay and hopefully soon I'll meet and welcome you in Antwerp, I'm looking forward to it.

Ik ben  29 jaar, werk parttime en studeer  taal- en letterkunde aan de Universiteit van Antwerpen. Ik hou erg  van het levendige en bruisende, dat elke stad in zich heeft en probeer daar zoveel mogelijk van te genieten:  de terrasjes, optredens in parken of festivals, shoppen,   theatervoorstellingen, musea, flaneren door de stad, noem maar op. name: Cosy ship Hannus Antwerp Belgium
description:
The space
Hannus is a over 100 years old ship, originally built as a sailing cargo vessel. Nowadays the ship is used as a cosy hostel for individual travellers and groups. The ship offers 24 beds in 10 cabins, most cabins have 2 beds, two cabins offer 4 beds. Each cabin has its own sink offering warm and cold water and a cv radiator.

There are 2 shared showers and 2 shared toilets. Inside there is no internet, however on deck, outside, there is a free wifi of Antwerp available.

In the central room breakfast is served, guest may sit there to talk, read. In concert the central kitchen may be used by the guests.

Hannus offers an informal and pleasant stay in Antwerp amids many restaurants, bars and musea like the famous MAS while moored in the antique Bonapartedok, many historical houses and buildings make the unique location. The historical centre of Antwerp is only a few minutes walking away, along the River Scheldt. There is almost a

Belangstelling voor natuur, cultuur en schoonheid vind ik belangrijk. Het gaat mij om blijvende waarden.

name: Cosy historic Ship Hannus  Antwerp
description:
Sailing vessel in the centre of Antwerp, ideal for groups ( 24 beds) and individual travellers. The location is perfect next musea, good restaurants and pubs, the historical centre is 10 minutes walking away. Sailing is possible if planned ahead

The space
In a harbour as Antwerp you may choose to stay on board of a historic ship. Hannus is over 100 years old sailing vessel with 10 cabins allowing around 24 guests to sleep. Inside you will enjoy the maritime look and feel thanks to the beautiful wooden interior. The cabins are small, like you may expect on a sailing vessel, but comfortable with good beds, sink and heating. In the main cabin, you may sit, read, chat with other guests. The kitchen may be used to make coffe or thee and to prepare a meal. It is all rather informal. Breakfast can be served for a supplement.

description:
A quiet place in the heart of Antwerp, overlooking park.
700m from Central Station and ZOO.
1500m from the old city center.
500m from shopping area.
Showroom for fashion labels but sometimes available for a holiday in Antwerp. We love our place and we furnish bit by bit to our taste.

The space
6th floor with elevator.
Apartment from 1956 recently renovated, preserving authentic atmosphere. With large living room (50m²), 2 bedrooms (14m² and 20m²), kitchen, bathroom, balcony (8m²), ...
It is usually a showroom to Belgian designers and personal pied-à-terre for weekends with friends. We like sharing it with people who respect the place as it is and handle it with care.
We like to keep the neighbours happy: they love quietness. The neighborhood offers 100 opportunities for wilder evenings.
7 minutes walk from the central station with direct connection to Brussels (45'), Ghent (45'), Bruges (1h25'),...

Hallo,
Ik ben Debora.
Het appartement uit 1956 vonden we in geheel authentieke staat en we restaureerden zo getrouw mogelijk;

Tussen de modeseizoenen stellen wij het graag ter beschikking. De rust van de buren respecteren we graag.
Jo en Debora

name: Trendy apartment near city park !
description:
Comfortable apt. for 2 persons in the middle of the centre of Antwerp, situated nearby the City Park (Diamond area). Only a 5 min. walk to the commercial centre & less than 15 min. away from the old centre and trendy South. Public transport and citybikes are just around the corner.

The space
Our apt. has recently been renovated. We want to give you a warm and comfy feeling, just like your own home.
All modern facilities are available to make your stay more pleasurable (Wifi, dishwasher, washing machine and dryer, digital TV and a terrace to chill out...)

Double bed, lounge and breakfast table.

host_about:
Your hosts

For 20 years we lived and worked in different Asian countries. We where based in Thailand, Malaysia, Sri-Lanka, China and India.
Paul as Manager-Technical Advisor in Diamond Manufacturing Company’s. Patricia as a Documentary-Photographer.
In 2006 we decided to extend our family, we settled in Antwerp and in March 2007 our daughter Vita was born.
Patricia bought the anno1870 old Mansion in 2003 and with the original architecture in mind we renovated the entire house, into a unique and original B&B.
In Januari 2010 Patricia finally opened “Antwerp Bed and Breakfast.” We run our business not as a job but as a passion in life. Our goals are an excellent around the clock service, but most important to make our guests feel comfortable and relaxed like we would do with our own family.
Our hobby’s Art lovers. Vita’s hobby’s are, making mess and
listening to fairytales.
We look forward to welcoming you!

Opgelet: toeristenbelasting wordt apart afgerekend bij het begin van het verblijf en bedraagt €2,8/nacht per volwassene

Within walking distance of the historic city centre. At the garden side of the building, located in a renovated ICE FACTORY .

The space
LOFT 1D is a design of a famous Belgian interior architect Filip Deslee , which was actually designed for himself. His minimalistic point of view has been translated into an impressive Loft with many straight lines, without turning into a clinic sterile interior. Impressive large pivoting walls, makes you create the space according your mood. 100m². Its situated at the garden side of the building, meaning : green view and quiet place. :-) Bright and spacious.

communal garden is accessible, with table

unique design concept - has been published in books and magazines,be

name: spacious and comfortable apartment
description:
Welcome to my large and bright apartment on the fourth floor in a quiet neighborhood. It is situated on the Grotesteenweg nearby the small Albertpark. You can reach the city center by city bike (3 euro/day or 7 euro/week) or by public transport. Other nice neighborhoods are a short walk on foot. Every Saturday there are two markets nearby where you can buy flowers, fresh fruit and delicious food. Or you can visit the tasty restaurant Marie next door.

The apartment was build in 2005 so it is very comfortable. It has wooden floors throughout the whole space. There is a spacious livng room with self designed and vintage furniture, tv, dvd and stereo. On the balcony you can enjoy your breakfast, a coffee, or a glass of good wine while watching the sunset. The large open kitchen is fully equipped with a fridge, a microwave, a gas stove and all the amenities you need. A washing machine and a dryer are available in a separate room

There is one large bedroom with a ergo

The space
Ons appartement - gelegen op de 2de verdieping - maakt deel uit van een recent volledig gerenoveerd gebouw uit de 19de eeuw op het bruisende Antwerpse Zuid. Loop je de straat uit dan bots je als het ware op het nieuwe justitiepaleis.

Het appartement is ideaal voor 2 personen maar wij hebben in de woonruimte ook een heerlijke slaapbank staan van waaruit je gezellig kan genieten van digitale TV.

Voor een verkwikkende rust leg je je te slapen in een bed met pocketveren matras op ee

host_about:
Hello, my name is Fatima and I'm from Brasil. I've been living in Belgium, Antwerp for 27 years now and I love cooking, Quentin Tarantino movies and Caetano Veloso's music. I am on Airbnb because I love meeting new people. The house is very cosy and colorful and I hope you'll feel at home. It's decorated with really exotic details. It has three floors. On the first floor you have a huge living room with a hammock and a giant kitchen which is especially designed as I am a professional cook. On the second floor you have the shared large bathroom with a separate shower and a big bathtub. The rooms for rent are on the third floor. They are not too big but with every comfort you will need like a good quality bed, matras and enough drawers. The kitchen, living room and the bathroom are shared.

It's not a house with a lot of  house rules; but we expect our guest to have awareness of some fundamentals like; respect, hygiene and open communication. 

The location of the house is ten minutes walk from Antwerpen Berchem station and five minutes walk from tram and bus stops. You have also a really nice square in five minutes walking distance  "Dageraadsplaats" with a lot of cafes bars and restaurants. 
There is a supermarket 50 meters from the house, open all days. There is also a very large supermarket about 300 meters from the house.

If you would like to discover Belgium's gastronomy and culture, combined with Brasil's hospitality, don't hesitate to send me a message!

The space

host_about:
Vincent and I (Ester his girlfriend) are both born,raised and residented in Belgium. Vincent is 100% Belgian but I'm also 50% made out of thai roots :-)

We both have our own appartement in the center of Antwerp, but because we are both fond of meeting new people from diffrent nations we decided to put one up on air bnb. Because the second appartment is nearby, we will always be close to help you out. 

During our education in economics at the University of Antwerp we participated in some exchange programme. Vincent went to Sweden for 3 months and I stayed a semester in Toulouse (France) and Georgtown ( Washington) during my studies. Our jobs are also related to these studies. 

We try to travel the world on any occation we can, holidays, exchange programs, international work environment... after all this is the best eduction man can get! Seeing the world, meeting new people and of course charing my love of great food and drinks with them while getting insights.  from an other angel.

name: Charmant appartement op toplocatie!
description:
Wilt u ook graag eens slapen onder oude stenen gewelven op een toplocatie in Antwerpen?
Ons appartement is 80m2, gelegen op de begane grond en een souterrain. Het heeft een moderne en knusse uitstraling en is van alle gemakken voorzien.
De badkamer is recent vernieuwd en heeft een prachtige, moderne beton-ciré look, met vloerverwarming.

The space
In ons appartement slaap je in alle rust onder prachtige oude gewelven.

Guest access
Van 1 t/m 5 personen beschikbaar.

Other things to note
Reserveren is mogelijk vanaf 2 personen tot max. 5 personen.

Het appartement is NIET geschikt voor feestjes!
amenities: ["Refrigerator", "Fire extinguisher", "Long term stays allowed", "Kitchen", "Smoke alarm", "Hair dryer", "Coffee maker", "First aid kit", "Cable TV", "Wifi", "Cooking basics", "TV with standard cable", "Heating", "Dishes and silverware", "Essentials"]
host_about:
Wij zijn Leonie en Ahmed. Wij houden ervan om te reizen en nieuwe sfeervolle adresjes te ontdekken. Zo genieten we ervan om de fijne ervaring die we zelf hebben met het verblijf in ons appartement te delen met anderen die de stad Antwerpen willen verkennen of gewoon een heerlijk weekendje met vrienden door willen brengen.
We vinden het belangrijk om vanuit vertrouwen en respect om te gaan met andermans eigendom, maar ook zorg te dragen voor de wereld om ons heen. 
Sfeer en eigenheid is voor ons onmisbaar.. Dat maakt de plek waar je verblijft..

Daarnaast zijn we graag bezig met het creëren van nieuwe dingen; meubels maken, fotograferen, beeldend werken.

Stad en platteland is voor ons een belangrijke afwisseling, zowel om te wonen als om te reizen.

name: Kamers - Appartement - Studio - Centrum Antwerpen
description:
Emperors48 is located in the middle of the Old City Center of Antwerp, founded and run by art photographer Bart Michielsen. In this 19th Century old Building you can rent Rooms, an Apartment or Studio, there's free wifi, a computer, television, double bedrooms, bathroom, kitchen, dining-room, a terrace and fitness available.

The space
I'm in the Heart of the Historical Center of Antwerp, you have Public Transport just around the corner, there are cycles or bicycles for rent across the house. Everything is in walking distance : SHOPPING AREA, MUSEA, HISTORICAL BUILDINGS, RESTAURANTS, THEATRES and other SIGHTSEEING.

Guest access
The second floor : living area, kitchen, terrace. Third floor : 2 bedrooms + bathroom. For a reservation of 2 guests there's only 1 bedroom. If you want 2 bedrooms, you have to make a reservation for min. 3 persons.

Other things to note

Hallo, ik houd al meer dan 25 jaar mijn B&B open en doe het nog altijd even graag.
In mijn vrije tijd luister ik vaak naar klassieke muziek (ik zing zelf ook), kook ik lekkere gerechten of onderhoud ik mijn stadstuintje. Daarnaast reis ik graag met mijn man doorheen Europa, meestal op de fiets.
Ik ontvang mijn gasten in stijl in één van mijn studio's en geef hen met plezier uitleg over alle fijne adresjes in Antwerpen. 
En mijn motto? Carpe Diem. De tijd gaat al snel genoeg om hem te verliezen aan pietluttigheden :-)

name: Cosy 19th c townhouse near Central Station+parking
description:
Charmant huis met 2 slaapkamers in een levendige woonbuurt vlakbij winkelstraat Meir,Zoo,Elisabethzaal,Centraal Station.
U beschikt over het volledige huis. Wij wonen met ons gezin aan de achterzijde van de vakantiewoning.
Digitale tv, dvd, wifi, keuken met oven, magnetron, vaatwas, Nespresso-apparaat,koffie en thee,handdoeken,beddengoed, gezelschapspellen,boeken,dvd's..
Vrij gebruik van de gesloten private parkeerplaats naast het huis. Steile trap: moeilijker voor jonge kinderen/ouderen.

The space
Huis Dujardin is een kleine stadswoning (72 m²) met authentieke 19e eeuwse charme. Het huis staat helemaal ter uwer beschikking. Het is centraal gelegen op wandelafstand (500 m) van het Antwerps Centraal Station -het mooiste treinstation ter wereld-, de Antwerpse Zoo -een van de oudste dierentuinen ter wereld-, de wandelboulevard De Keyserlei en de Meir,de belangrijkste winkelstraat van de stad. Voor muziekliefhebbers is de Opera, de Roma en het Sportpal

name: Duplex 160m² with sauna & piano
description:
Spacious apartment located in the city center of Antwerp (South District) with sauna, an upright piano, 2 spacious rooms, 2 bathrooms and a spacious living room with an open kitchen and a dining room.

The space
This apartment has 2 spacious rooms. The master bedroom has 2 double beds. The second room also features 2 double beds. The living room is spacious with an open kitchen and a dining room. The dining room has a TV and an upright piano.

Guest access
all rooms are open.

Other things to note
The building has a camera security system. In the common entrance hall and at the fire ladder are camera's for your safety.

host_about: Ik heb psychologie en human resources management gestudeerd. Ik werk voor een project in het bedrijfsleven rond diversiteit. Mijn doelstelling is openheid te creëren bij bedrijven voor personen met een arbeidsbeperking, 50 +'ers, allochtonen en jongeren laaggeschoolden. Daarnaast probeer ik in mijn vrije tijd zoveel mogelijk te reizen en speel ik piano en keyboard in een bandje. Sinds enkele weken ben ik gestart met airbnb en ik vind het fantastisch! Leuk om mensen te kunnen ontmoeten over heel de wereld. Ik verwelkom u graag in mijn appartement en geef je al de nodige info over leuke plaatsjes in Antwerpen. Tot binnenkort!

name: Luxueuze vakantiewoning in centrum outdoor sauna
description:
House "the Square" is een luxueus volledige gerenoveerde woning in het centrum van Antwerpen. Het huis beschikt over 2 badkamers ingericht met een regendouche en een vrijstaand bad. Elke slaapkamer is voorzien van een eigen televisie of beamer.
Het huis ligt op 400m van de Meir en 700m van de Grote Markt. Supermarkten, apotheker en terrasjes op wandelafstand.

name: Bedroom, cosy sitting area & rooftop terrace
description:
The private bedroom (double bed), living room (with double sleeping couch) & terrace are very close to Central Station & has direct connection to old city centre & shopping. Two streets further is the green lung of the city, like Central Park in NYC

The space
The private bedroom (double bed), living room (with sleeping couch) & terrace are located in my duplex apartment. So bathroom is to share. Upstairs is an open kitchen that you can use, as well as my dining area. But you also can enjoy your meal in the private room or on your terrace.

Guest access
My guests can enter the entire duplex apartment, only not my working area.

Other things to note
You will be provided with all sorts of info and tips from locals, having no problem getting around in the city of Antwerp.

name: Unique city loft with amazing view!
description:
Welcome to Antwerp's historic city center!

Your home will be a light and spacious loft in a refurbished 1850's building.

White wooden floors, lots of natural light, stunning view on the cathedral, fully equipped kitchen with coffee, tea etc.
Separate bathroom with bath and shower.

The space
**Hygiene and cleanliness have always been very important to us. After each booking we clean the whole apartment thoroughly. We have enhanced our cleaning routines and are following guidelines provided by Airbnb and local health authorities.**

The loft has no separate bedroom. One double bed and one double sofa bed. Bed linen and towels are provided.

The loft is on the 3rd floor in a building without a lift. You'll have to climb 3 flights of stairs, which are normal for these kind of European buildings, but quite steep. Definitely worth the view though, but not suitable for people with mobility issues.

Hello!
I'm Yara and I've lived in Antwerp for 6 years.

 Sharing=caring :D

description:
The space
In het hart van het modecentrum van Antwerpen staat een gezellig vakantiehuisje. Een ideale uitvalsbasis om een bruisende stad te leren kennen. Want Antwerpen is een havenstad waar steeds iets te ontdekken en te beleven valt. Denk maar aan de mode, de musea, de dierentuin, de oergezellige cafeetjes, de markten, de theaters, de antiquairs ... En als je dan kan logeren in een historisch pandje, waar je alle comfort van een hotel hebt, maar de privacy van je eigen thuis en waar je eventueel een heerlijk dineetje kan serveren voor enkele vrienden, is de keuze snel gemaakt.

Het huisje is volledig beschikbaar.

Ik ontvang jullie bij aankomst en spreek met jullie af bij vertrek.
Jullie verblijf is op basis van self-catering.

Ideaal gelegen in het midden van de hippe modewijk en op enkele minuten wandelafstand van de Grote Markt en Kathedraal en de Schelde.

Alle openbaar vervoer is op wandelafstand beschikbaar.

name: Le Tissu Résidence XL 2 bedrooms
description:
Ruim 2 slaapkamerappartement. Het appartement heeft een oppervlakte van 97m2 en beschikt over een ruime woonkamer, een keuken, een apart toilet, een badkamer en een dressing.

The space
Volledig gerenoveerd ruim twee slaapkamerappartement uit de jaren 40. De binnenhuisarchitecten Danny De Munter en Wim Gyselinck hebben er hun ziel ingestopt; Het appartement beschikt over een balkon aan de voor en achterzijde. Je komt binnen via een ruime hal met direct rechts de keuken. De keuken is voorzien van alle gemakken inclusief een afwasmachine. Links bevindt zich de woonkamer met authentieke schouw. Via de gang naar achteren passeert u het vrijstaand toilet, vervolgens de badkamer en de grote dressing. Aan het einde van de gans tref je de twee slaapkamers aan.

Guest access
De gasten hebben vrij toegang tot het gehele appartement. Ook kunnen de gasten gebruik maken van de binnentuin.

description:
We fully renovated this appartement in 2016 and spared no expense.
The living room has an oaken floor and an absolutely amazing view on the city of Antwerp. The bedrooms have a terrace with a breathtaking view as well.
Close to the large Berchem train station and even closer to a few supermarkets and plenty of restaurants in the beautifull Zurenborg district.
Contact me now for any special requests or prices.

The space
The pictures offcourse speak for themselves.
Living room with oaken floor, wooden table, panoramic window and antique cupboard.
Eames chairs, bubble chair and a sleeping sofa complete the infrastructure.

The kitchen is brand new and fully functional with an oven, seperate microwave, fridge, freezer and induction cooking plate.
Hidden in a big cupboard there is also the washing machine.

In the hallway is a marble floor and a huge cupboard.

host_about:
Ik ben 31 jaar oud. In het verleden heb ik vele seizoenen gedaan als skileraar. Na een geweldige tijd heb ik besloten om me terug in Antwerpen te vestigen. Het is een beslissing waarvan nog geen seconde twijfel heb gehad.  Gezien ik altijd graag mensen een leuk verblijf heb bezorgd in het toerisme wilde ik dit ook in Antwerpen verder zetten door het verhuren van een camper en een appartement.
Sinds ik met mijn vriendin Maartje samen ben en ons appartement af heb gerenoveerd  gaat het absoluut geweldig. Wanneer we samen terug gaan skiën met de nieuwe camper verhuren we soms ook ons eigen huis in Borgerhout.

Wanneer er tijd is geef ik graag zelf gegidste wandelingen door onze mooie stad.

Mijn hobby's zijn fietsen, klimmen, skiën en telemarken.

Contacteer me zeker voor een mogelijke korting. De situatie is verschillend voor elke huurder. Voor ons is een aangename relatie met de huurder erg belangrijk.

name: Mindblowing little penthouse in Antwerp!
description:
We renovated this apartment completely in 2017. More than 50 meters above Antwerp you can enjoy the mindblowing view from the terrace. The interior design is art deco/art nouveau style-inspired. These styles you'll find back in the architecture of this vibrant neighborhood called Zurenborg.

Restaurants and shops are close to the apartment. As is the acces to public transport, the Berchem train station, the city's bicycle network & the highway.

Please contact me for special prices or demands.

The space
A beautiful oak wooden floor, Louis Van Teeffelen chairs, some charming belle epoque and art deco furniture, a brand new completely equipped kitchen and bathroom, a smartly hidden washing machine in a big cupboard with art-nouveau handles, a new and comfortable boxspring bed, a place to feel good!

To make sure you have a pleasant stay we spared no expense for the renovation and interior design of this amazing apartment!

This flat is also ideally suited for guest singers at the Flemish Opera House, since I am an opera singer myself, during the day one can vocalise here and the apartment is within walking distance from the opera house.

The space
The Hamsa is an old town house in the fashion district of Antwerp. It has all the original features an old house should have, but has been renovated very recently. The high and charming hallway connects all the different rooms and mezzanines. Windows everywhere. The color green is the thread that links everything.

The Hamsa is named after the 'hamsa' symbol that can be found in the kitchen above the stove. It is the symbol for happiness.

name: Double room in cosy and quiet house with garden.
description:
To rent in Antwerp Deurne double room in indipendent house with garden. The house, recently build, is composed by 3 sleeping rooms, fully equipped kitchen with induction cooking plates, 2 bathrooms, spacious garden. The use of internet, washing machine and dryer is included in the price. 15 minutes by bus from the center and the station, busses and trams stops are at 200m from the house. Around the house there are several parking spots. We have a lovely cat, Fusi, he's really quiet and cuddly :)

Guest access
You will have your own room, the bathroom and shower will be shared with the family members, you can use the kitchen and the garden.

description:
This cosy,fully furnished 1 bedroom/80 m2 apartment in the very heart of Antwerp, will let you discover this cosmopolitan and vibrant city in fullcomfort. It is just a stone's throw away from the Central Station, Diamond District and Meir. Historic and shopping centers are all within less than 10 minutes walking distance . Easy for public transport connections .Perfect both for short and long stays.Ideal for1 p. (especially when considering long term)or a couple & there is also 1 foldable bed.

The space
Spacious living room , plenty of light , very clean and comfortable . Separate bedroom , bathroom , toilet and kitchen . All kitchen essentials are available if you prefer to shop and prepare your own dinner for a night in . Nespresso coffee machine & several capsules as well as towels,bedlinen,shampoos, shower gels and soaps are also included . For the guests who stay longer (14 days and more ) and are usually too busy to do their own laundry, ironing, cleaning

description:
Welcome to our beautiful renovated old classic appartement with terrace and garden views.
220 square metres on 2 levels of authentic elements, high doors, windows and ceilings combined with modern comfort and luxury.
10 minutes from the historic center! You're welcome to enjoy our premises whilst respecting the quiet for themselves and our neighbours.

Guest access
Guests have full and private access to all amenities and rooms in the house.
We expect from our guests that they'll treat our house and its surroundings like their own home, this means:
Not causing night noise or anything that might disturb our neighbours
No parties, music or loud noises after 22 pm
Be extra quiet in the hall when entering or leaving the building
Please leave our house tidy and don't leave any dirty dishes

name: Full house with garden, near by tram
description:
This house is situated outside of the city center. The center of Antwerp is located at cycling distance and only 5 km away. There is a tram stop at 200 m from the residence. The tram ride will take about 20 to 30 minutes. The cat you read about in the reviews died in 2018. Dit huis bevindt zich net buiten de stad. Het centrum van Antwerpen is op fietsafstand en slechts 5 km verwijderd. Er is een tramhalte op 200 m. De tramrit naar de stad duurt 25 - 30 minuten. De kat is er niet meer.

The space
The house contains a beautiful kitchen and modern bathroom. There is one cozy bedroom with one double bed and one bedroom with one single bed. Under the single bed is also an extra matrass for an additional 4th person.
Er is een riante keuken en een moderne badkamer. Er is een gezellige slaapkamer met één 2-persoonsbed (140cm) en een ruime kamer met een 1-persoonsbed. Onder dat bed ligt een extra matras voor een eventuele 4de persoon.

name: Design loft in historic building
description:
Compleet gerenoveerd privé design loft in ons huis gebouwd in 1869. Op 5' wandelafstand van het centraal station. Om de hoek loop je de hoofdwinkelstraat Meir op en in de buurt zijn een hoop leuke restaurants en bars. Vlakbij het hippe Eilandje!

The space
The location in the city centre of Antwerp is ideal for shopping during the day, drop your bags at home, refresh and go out in the night. The loft is very spacious, you can program the blinds to wake up with daylight, you have your own kitchenette to make Nespresso coffee or tea and there is a small refrigerator for your drinks! The bathroom has a luxury bath and a lovely rain shower.

Guest access
You acces the space on the third floor through the shared staircase.

Other things to note
We have two cats, but they are not allowed to come upstairs in the design loft.

name: "la casa di Frà"
description:
The space
In a quiet street not far from the Central Station, you can find our happy house where to spend your beautiful week (- end) in Antwerp, ideal for business as well as for travelling couples (also with children).
We are Frà and Dominique –an Italian- Belgian couple- and we have been trying to re-create the differences of our cultures in the project of the house, not forgetting our architectural studies. La casa di Frà is part of our double-house renovation plan, we'll be next-door neighbors, but you will enjoy your own totally private space and terrace.

On the ground floor you'll find a bathroom (with shower) and a bedroom with a double bed with space for an extra little children bed; on the first floor a bright open space with living room and the kitchen. If the weather is more Italian then Belgian, you can drink a nice Belgian beer on the sunny terrace.
Inside you’ll find a fully equipped kitchen (microwave, dishwasher, toaster, pots…), kitch
amenities: ["Fire extinguisher", "Long term stays allowed", "Kitchen", "Smoke alarm", "First aid kit", "Wifi", "TV", "Heating", "Essentials"]
host_about:
"La casa di Frà" was built with the idea to learn to know people who travel around, with different stories and experiences.
I am Frà, short for Francesca, an Italian but I moved to Belgium 10 years ago to be with Dominique, my Flemish husband, with whom I have two little girls. We are an eclectic couple, joined by many small aspects that make our cultural diversity very interesting.
I like to cook, sports and I enjoy my social life. I love the sea and the sun.
I think Antwerp is a funny and interesting city, where you can really find anything what you like on every single moment. 

 “La casa di frà” è nata dal desiderio di conoscere persone che viaggiano alla scoperta di luoghi e di culture diverse. 
Sono Frà, abbreviazione di Francesca, un’italiana che vive in Belgio da 10 anni e sposata con un fiammingo, Dominique, e abbiamo due bambine. Siamo una coppia eclettica,  le nostre diversita' culturali rendono affascinante e interessante la nostra vita. 
Mi piace cucinare, fare sport e chiacchierare con gli amici e conoscerne di nuovi. Amo il mare e il sole.
Trovo Anversa una città divertente e stimolante, tutta da scoprire.

host_about:
Hallo, ik ben Arthur en verhuur sinds een dik jaar een appartement op airbnb. 
Aangezien ik meestal de organisator ben als we met vrienden op citytrip gaan, ben ik eveneens graag een goede host voor mijn gasten.
Daarom sta ik altijd klaar met suggesties om jullie verblijf extra aangenaam te maken.
Ik woon al meer dan 10 jaar in dezelfde buurt als het appartement, wat betekent dat ik snel in de buurt ben in geval van een probleempje, maar ook dat ik de buurt heel goed ken en voldoende tips kan geven wat betreft bezienswaardigheden en restaurantjes. 
Het appartement is ruim en heeft een grote woonkamer met hoog plafond, wat ervoor zorgt dat het gezellig vertoeven is als je met een groep vrienden of met het gezin een weekend samen wilt doorbrengen.
Het interieur is nogal eclectisch qua stijl, vintage gemixt met design klassiekers. Vooral geen zwart/wit, maar kleurrijk, en ook zo ingericht dat het lijkt alsof iemand er echt woont, geen steriele hotelkamer. Ik ben een liefhebber van films, fotografie en kunst, en dit valt eveneens als je het appartement betreedt. Litho's van Karel Appel en Dali worden afgewisseld met foto's van Helmut Newton en Herb Ritts. 
Als ik zelf op citytrip ga, vind ik naast de huiselijkheid van het appartement dat ik huur, de locatie erg belangrijk. Daarom dat ik voor het appartement op Vleminckveld gekozen heb, het ligt recht in het midden van alle belangrijke attracties/buurten.
Je kunt deze allemaal te voet bezoeken, het bruisende Zuid, het historisch centrum, het shopping gedeeltje,... 
Het ligt dus enorm centraal en terrasjes en restaurantjes liggen zeer nabij, maar toch is de straat erg rustig, dus van nachtlawaai is geen sprake. 
Niet te vergeten is de supermarkt die zich in hetzelfde gebouw bevindt, super handig als je last minute nog iets nodig hebt.
Kortom ik heb geprobeerd alle elementen waar ikzelf belang aan hecht als ik op citytrip ga, te bundelen in het appartement dat ik verhuur in mijn thuishaven Antwerpen.

description:

The space
The house was built in 1886. We have tried to keep the atmosphere of the time.

Guest access

Other things to note
If you plan to travel through Belgium by train, make sure to buy a 'tienrittenkaart'. It gives you the right to do ten rides ('tien ritten' means ten rides). If you are under 26 years old, it is 50 euros for ten rides, five euro per ride, to ANY train station in Belgium. That is extremely cheap. If you are older than 26, it is 75 euro, 7,5 euro per ride, still not bad. Brugge is a train ride from here of 1,5 hour, Brussels is 45 minutes from here, Gent also about the same.
http://www.belgianrail.be/en/Default.aspx

name: House of Books for your summer
description:
This house can only be 'rented' on an exchange basis. Only contact us if you are an airbnb host wanting to swap house.
Located 0.4 km from Antwerp Central Station and the nearest subway entrance, 0.2 km from the tram and buses. Brussels and Ghent are 45' from Bruges 1.5h, direct train. Direct train and bus connection to Brussels’ Airport (33').

The space
More than you renting our house, we are interested in a house swap. Contact us if you have a house in a city in Central Europe that can house five to six people.
The house is 19th century. At ground floor level there is an impressive entrance hall leading into interconnecting living room with many period features and original fireplace and equipped kitchen. The kitchen opens onto the green city garden.

The first floor has a master bedroom with king size bed. The window opens to two terraces that overlook the garden. In the front there is a home office/study/library on this level.

name: Comfortable accommodation in spacious penthouse
description:
Comfortable room with queen-size bed, wardrobe, writing desk and chairs. Second private room with (pull-out) sofa available. Shared living room, kitchen, bathroom and roof terrace.
Generally, you'll be able to enjoy the entire apartment, as I spend most of my time abroad. Occasionally, I may spend Tuesday and/or Wednesday nights at the apartment.
New and located in a quiet street, close to public transport, 15 min walk from central train station, 30 min walk to city center.

The space
- The private room has a double bed, wardrobe, writing desk and chairs. The pull-out sofa in the second private room is available as a bed for the 3rd and 4th guests.
- The bathroom has a bath tub and a separate shower (bed linen & towels provided).
- The luminous living room, with open kitchen (fully equipped), is connected to a rooftop terrace that is blessed with afternoon & evening sunshine.
- WiFi is available throughout the entire apartment.

name: Belle Epoque Townhouse Antwerp
description:
A spacious 19th century house located in the center of Antwerp.
You can enjoy the grandeur of the bél epoque with all the modern comfort of today.
The house has up to 5 individual bedrooms and can accomodate up to 12 adults.

The space
We fall directly in love with this house the first moment we saw it.
Build in the end of the 19th century, you can almost grasp the different spirits of time that passed here. High ceilings, lots of lights and well conserved ornaments.
The house was totally renovated with repect to the original style of the house. It consists of 430 square meters divided over 4 floors. There are 5 spacious bedrooms with double beds. It is possible to foresee extra beds for children. Each floor has its own bathroom + toilet. The master bedroom has a private bathroom and library.

Guest access
All house is available except the basement.

name: Cosy & quiet appartment in Antwerp!
description:
The space
A beautiful, elegantly furnished one bedroom flat in the heart of Antwerp, ideally located very close to the trendy “South” or “Zuid”-neighbourhood. Bars & restaurants are within a 5 minutes walking distance and there is a supermarket in the street. The center is also within walking distance but if desired, great public transport connections are available nearby. At the end of the street there is a city bike station to rent bicycles for short term.

The flat is decorated in an attractive and fresh contemporary style with wooden floors and large windows giving it plenty of light. It has a lovely bright kitchen/living room, and the kitchen is well equipped and has everything you might need for cooking during your stay. The bedroom is very quiet as it is situated in de back of the flat. In the bathroom you will find a great walk-in shower.

The apartment contains all facilities, internet, TV for DVD (no cable), coffee machine, even shampoo. All that's needed for a child up to five is also available if required. Very central location to visit other cities in Belgium or in the Netherlands by car or train.

The space
Het appartement ligt op de eerste verdieping, te bereiken met trap of lift. Het werd volledig gerenoveerd in 2015 en voorzien van alle benodigdheden. (kookgeri, linnen,...) Het is er gezellig vertoeven, maar wat het uniek maakt is de toffe buurt en de uitgebreide parkeermogelijkheden. Voor weekendgasten is het makkelijk dat de supermarkt op de hoek ook op zon- en feestdagen open is. Wij hebben een aantal gasten die jaarlijks terug komen.

Het ganse appartement is ter beschikking voor de gasten.

name: Authentic Belgian apartment
description:
Hi!
You have Antwerp for tourists AND you have Antwerp for travelers. Our apartment is located in the city's coolest and most upcoming neighbourhood where you can buy the cheapest fresh food and meet with different cultures.
We love to give advice!

The space
The apartment has 4 rooms:
1. The living room : tv, couch, dining table with 4 chairs, office,
2. The bedroom : Double bed, big closet, down comforters and pillows
3. Kitchen : Breakfast table, 2 barstools, kitchenet, fridge, cutlery, pots and pans, mop, towels
4. Bathroom : Shower, toilet, lavatory, toiletpaper, clothes horse

Guest access
The whole first floor is yours

Other things to note
I am a kindergarten teacher and a free time artist. I love every aspect of art and love to give you advice. My son is a designer and traveler. He studied and lives in Antwerp. He is aware of a lot of the events. He helps me with the bookings for my
amenities: ["Fire extinguisher", "Long term stays allowed", "Kitchen", "Dryer", "Shampoo", "Hair dryer", "Smoke alarm", "First aid kit", "Hangers", "Cable TV", "Iron", "Dedicated workspace", "Wifi", "TV with standard cable", "Heating", "Essentials"]
host_about:
"Adventure is the best way to learn."

Hi everyone,
My name is Christel and this is my story:
I come from the countryside of Belgium. You know...like a small time-stood-still-village where everybody knows everybody :) ? Well, the only way to get out of there once in a while is by going to my favorite city in Belgium, Antwerp.

The City.
I like art, no I mean I LOVE art. Music, theatre, ballet, expositions, literature, performances,...are my sources of inspiration to be creative. I also love  Antwerp is both modern and authentic. It’s a city that moves. There are dozens of cultural activities every week. The food in the restaurants, even in the tiny bars are amazing. It’s ALL about exploring with all your senses. 

About the apartment.
My husband, my kids and I renovated this building a couple of years ago. I prefer to stay there once in a while, having some time for myself. That’s why we decided it to rent it on Airbnb. We’ve chosen for this neighborhood ‘cause it’s the most upcoming place in Antwerp. It’s on a foot walk from the centre and yet it’s different. It’s Antwerps most multicultural neigbourhood. Over 70 different nationalities! And they all have their own cultural traditions which are awesome to discover!

To my guests.
Enjoy your time in Antwerp, they say it's the city of diamonds. 
But for me it's the people who shine :)
Leave a note, a comment or better...a story before you leave. 
I love stories.

name: Charming studio in Antwerp
description: Mijn ruimte is vlakbij openbaar vervoer, het stadscentrum, gezinsvriendelijke activiteiten. Je zult genieten van mijn plek vanwege de buurt, het licht en de gezelligheid. Mijn ruimte is geschikt voor stellen, solo-avonturiers en zakenreizigers.

We have everything for a perfect stay (expat or holiday) with great accessibility. This apartment with trendy interior has everything you need incl. Nespresso machine, GoogleHome speakers + Chromecast, WiFi, Smart TV ... You just need to pack your bags enter & enjoy.
We also have a big sunny terrace and FREE PRIVATE parking! The apartment is in a park! You can walk to the city center, take a rental bike or bus around the corner and it is close to the Port of Antwerp, Lotto arena & sportpaleis.

The space
It's location is perfect. Close to the city center, yet quite and close enough to the Port of Antwerp if you are an expat looking for a cozy apartment for a longer stay.
It has all the modern features you need! You have the comfort of a private underground parking spot and a shared bike storage.

The industrial interior is functional, light, sunny, trendy and spacious.

The big terrace is ideal to enjoy the evening sun.

host_about:
Hi I'm Nancy. Together with my husband Arthur we are Airbnb hosts. 
Arthur will welcome our guests and can tell you much about the neighborhood. Why are we host? Because we really like to meet new people. But also it's nice to show our beautiful city.
 
We have two daughters. One of 16 years and the other is 11 years. We have a dog Rakker, where we enjoy hiking. 

I was born and raised in Amsterdam and also know a lot about this beautiful city to tell.  We like sports, tennis, horse-riding and our daughters play hockey. We love running, swimming and skiing. 

We love to travel and we find it fun to meet new people. We're not smokers and try a little to live healthily. That is why sport is very important to us and we keep our houses non-smoking!

name: 2 nd  flr in charming house 1927
description:
If you like the lively energy of the city but love to come home more quiet and still be close to the centre, this is the place for you. I m looking for min 1 month stay or longer term stay.

The space
Upper floor in 2 fl house, 2 rooms , hallway wooden floors, central heating, double bed, closet, sofa, desk. It s a light place with the morning sun in the back room and the evening sun in the front room. There is an option to rent a part of an atelier 5 min walk from house if extra space is needed for creative people, artists.

Guest access
We would share the garden, bathroom and kitchen. I m happy to cook/eat together if our food habits happen to match.

Other things to note
The Singel art cultural centre is 10 min by bike. The park de brandt and Middelheim are a 10 min walk. Swimming pools close by. City centre , musea 10 / 15 min bike ride. It s an upcoming residential area.

name: Charming quiet room in house
description:
Room on first floor with one double bed for a good quiet sleep. The house is very light. Our little garden has sun all day. the bathroom and kitchen are shared. The Tram and bus station are 2 min walk away. 20 min from central station. The south, with all the museums and restaurants, antique stores is 15 min by tram . Food supply 2 min walk away. You can walk to the middelheim museum park and the Brandt park in about 10 min. Brussels is only 35 min by car.

The space
House with old elements from 1927. Wooden floors, lot of light. Old bathtub. The house is east/ west orientated and we have morning light in the kitchen/ bathroom. The sleeping room has sunlight in morning.

Guest access
You will have access to the bathroom with bathtub. The kitchen is next to the garden, where you can have breakfast in the morning sun. You room is east / west orientated , so you will have a beautiful light during the day.

description:
There is a living/dining room with an open kitchen and a bathroom with toilet and shower, and downstairs you find a large room with a double bed, a single one, and possibility to add another single bed.
It is at 7 minutes from the railway station Antwerpen Centraal; it is close to the Zoo (at the railway station); it is 10 à 15 minutes walking to the city center; there are a lot of meat (halal) and vegetables shops; as well as a lot of cafés and small restaurants for grilled meat (turkish)

name: Amazing location! Charming Romantic Historic - TOP
description:
Long term or short term.. this is your place ..
Small, charming, sunny appartement located on the most beautiful square in Antwerp. Lots of character, clean but with an artistic non-chalance, lots of books, wooden floors, an amazing view. near cafés, restaurants, galleries, musea. A place for the culturelover. no sharing of rooms- it will be your own private space - Very interesting for long term stay -

The space
I hope this place feels like home for you during your stay in Antwerp- possibility for short or long term stay -
the space is bright and full of good energie. a real nice place to stay

Guest access
For your own private use - guests can use all the rooms- no sharing with owner - the appartment is only 65m² but it's very cozy and bright - all rooms are separated. wonderful view, very good neighbourhood-

Loft in the city centre of Antwerp. Designed in art deco & vintage (60's-70's-80's). situated @ the 7th floor with an amazing view on the central station of Antwerp. I am always available for any questions or suggestions.

Ik ben Ibrahim, middelste parel van mijn ouders. Mijn naam klinkt Arabisch maar ik ben Turks. Ik studeerde maatschappelijke advisering aan de KHL en studeer momenteel recht aan de universiteit van Antwerpen. Ik combineer mijn studies met een deeltijdse job op de luchthaven.

Ik spreek; NL - FR - TR - EN - PT

Mijn hobbies zijn reizen, fietsen, koken, zwemmen..

name: ANTWERPEN-ZUID TOP FLOOR APARTMENT
description:
Modern apartment at the South, the most trendy and popular area of Antwerp city centre. Free Wifi available. The south ('t zuid) is known for its vividness, and almost feels like a little village inside the city.

The space
Spacious, high ceiling apartement in the middle of the south, the most trendy area of Antwerp city centre. This very bright and quiet apartment on the third (top) floor you reach by stairs and has an open living space with equipped kitchen with eg. combi-microwave oven, Nespresso coffeemachine and watercooker. (Nespresso cups, tea, milk and water for free). Further there is a Guest toilet with lavabo, seperate bedroom (boxspring bed) with ensuite bathroom with lavabo and rainshower. WIFI en flatscreen TV. Seperate room with washing machine.

name: Room in apartment near Central Station
description:
The apartment is located in front of the Central Station in the famous diamond district. It is well connected with all public transport in the city and to other cities in Belgium. You can get to Brussels and Ghent in about half an hour.
I particularly welcome long-term guests (price per month is negotiable).

The space
The apartment is large (more than 90 m2) and has many windows with very nice views on the Antwerp Diamond District and the Central Station.

Guest access
The travellers have their own private bedroom and have access to the bathroom, the kitchen and the living room.

Other things to note
Smoking not allowed.

name: Calm in the middle of the vibrant South District!
description:
Private ideal and idyllic one room appartment covering the full top floor of an ancient town house. Includes separate but private Bath room and toilet. Located in the popular South district in Antwerp known for and full of musea, bars, restos and easy access to highways whilst having free parking around the corner.

The space
Full apartment at top floor of app. 50 square meters with double bed, tv, wifi, small kitchen including a small fridge, oven, microwave, 2 pit electric cooking place and running water. Separate and private bathroom and toilet.
Possibility to rent cool city bikes @ only 5 eur/day

Guest access
One room studio in a family house ( familiy lives in the bottom floors) with (dedicated) bathroom and toilet. Access trough the central stair case of the house.

name: Backpackersroom !!
description:
This is a nice quiet room in a cute house in the city of Antwerp, near the famous Mas museum, the University, and in walking distance to the historical center.

The space
The railwaystation is a 15 minutes walk, there is also bus 17 stopping at the railwaystation that brings you around our corner.

You get a key of the house so you are free to come in and go out as you like.

Our neigbourghoud is full of young people, there are café's, bars, restaurants... just around the corner.

We also can give you advice on where to go, maps...
Clean bedsheets and towels included.

Be welcome!

The money collected by airbnb is used to improve the house to make it even a better place for future guests and to help family, friends and other people in need in Nepal.

name: A smile is our universal welcome :-)
description:
Our apartment lies in a quiet street, near to some cozy bars & good restaurants. It's the perfect base to explore our city and it's vivid nightlife or to go for some shopping.

The apartment is situated in Antwerp Historic Centre, 100 meters from the University, 3 minute walk from MEIR (the main shopping street in Antwerp); Grote Markt is distant only 400mt, 1 Km from the Station Central.
All major museums are within walking distance (Rubens house, MAS, Mode Museum etc).

Enjoy your stay :-)

The space
You'll get the key to your own private apartment which we will make your home during your stay.
It has it's own kitchen, bathroom and outdoor terrace.
If any questions: we live upstairs

Guest access
Since you have your own apartment, you'll have everything you need at your disposition.
If needed, you can use our washing machine.

host_about: Hi, I'm Petra , a Belgian interior designer.  Me and my daughters lived in Connecticut for 15 years were lots of friends and family came to visit.  Guiding them through world cities like New York and Boston was a joy.  Over the years we traveled often back and forth to Belgium, US but also France.  For 20 years my family and I run a vacation resort in the south of France.  The guest that we welcomed over the years are now all like family and lots of them we have the pleasure of meeting again year after year. Coming to visit and showing my American family Antwerp and surroundings, helps me now to look through tourists glasses.  I love sharing those insiders tips and treasures so please feel free to ask so we can make your trip extraordinary!

Een mooi hofje in het centrum van Antwerpen. Een mooi appartement met uitzicht op de prachtige kerk.

The space
Zoekt u een authentieke plek om te overnachten in Antwerpen? Lees dan verder! Het begijnhof om de hoek, het historisch centrum op loopafstand, een kwartiertje van het schitterende centraal station, het MAS (Museum aan de Stroom) en andere musea vlakbij…

Dit terwijl u overnacht op een plek die al meer dan honderd jaar oud is. Hofje is werkelijk uniek gelegen, midden in de levendige universiteitsbuurt, met een eigen binnentuin. Als het mooi weer kunt u lekker genieten van een ontbijtje buiten, uitkijkend op de eeuwenoude kerk.

Het appartement is gelegen op de zolderverdieping van een oud kostershuis. Het is volledig privé. Enkel de entree en de trappen om bij de zolderverdieping te komen zijn gezamenlijk.

name: Historical City Antwerp.
description:
The best place to stay if you like to be in the middle of the whole Antwerp vibe. Right there in the heart of the city with everything in walking distance.
Public transport if needed right in front of our house!
10 min walk from Central station.

The space
Our rooms are nice and spacious.
You stay in a house from the 1600s totally renovated. Old features still visible are the old Ceilings, wooden stairway.
decorated modern industrial and with recycled wooden chairs and tables.

Guest access
Beside your own room you can relax in the downstairs area if you wish. That is as well the area where you will have breakfast.
No use of kitchen.
Tea and coffee available any time of the day.

Other things to note
Staying in our house you have to be able to climb a stair.
Stadsgeluiden!

name: Cosy Studio Historic Centre
description:
You'll be our only Airbnb guests in our private home (a 450 years old house at the end of a private alleyway) in a cosy room with kitchenette, flat-screen (Netflix, Disney+) and all amenities. Your luxury private bathroom nearby is separate from the room accessible via the historic entrance hall.

We welcome you in an outstanding hidden place in the middle of old Antwerp, near to most touristic attractions, shops and restaurants.

We look forward hosting you!

Warm greetings,
Ada & Wim

The space
The house is set 30 meters of the street. You come in along a private historic alleyway and main historic entrance you share with the owners.

The room is accessible via a mezzazine (first floor 13 step stair) that opens onto the historic entrance hall.

Your luxury private bathroom nearby on the groundfloor is accesible via the same historic entrance hall.

You'll have access to our private garden

host_about:
Hi there!

We're Ada & Wim.

We love to enjoy life, cherishing the little things.

Together with  our five children, cat and dog we live in one of the oldest guild houses in Antwerp built in 1564. We both are musicians & also our children love to play music and singing. Ada teaches choir (Wednesday) and pianoclasses (Friday eve & Saturday morning) in our house, near to our guestroom. So when you should stay with us, you may hear music  or singing in the background. 

We'll do all we can to let you feel at home in our house.

See you soon!

Warm greetings,
Ada & Wim

description:
This spacious apartment is located in an historic building at the best part in town! Right on the famous shopping street Meir. All shops, great restaurants, interesting musea and sights at your doorstep.

name: Apartment in historic center - 2nd
description:
The apartment is located in one of the most beautiful historic streets of Antwerp within walking distance of the cathedral, museums, restaurants, bars and shopping streets.
Right outside you'll find the city bikes that can be rented out for a day!

The space
This apartment is part of 'Den Blauwen Esel', a complex of three flats, located in a 16th century building, right in the center of Antwerp. The name of the house dates from the same century. We found this information in the city archives!

The apartment was recently completely renovated and decorated to welcome travelers and businessmen.

The apartment is equipped with oven / microwave, Nespresso machine, kettle and hob (induction). Coffee and tea are always available.
In the living room you'll find a flat screen TV with channels in different languages ​​and WIFI.
We offer bathroom toiletries, towels and a hairdryer.

You'll enjoy a good night's sleep in the bedroo
amenities: ["Fire extinguisher", "Long term stays allowed", "Kitchen", "Smoke alarm", "Shampoo", "Hair dryer", "Hangers", "Cable TV", "Dedicated workspace", "Wifi", "TV with standard cable", "Heating", "Essentials"]
host_about:
In 2014 werden Filip en ik verliefd op een huis in wat bekend staat als één van de mooiste straten van Antwerpen. 
We besloten er onze eigen woning van te maken, maar ook om drie vakantiewoningen te voorschijn te toveren om anderen te laten meegenieten van deze uitzonderlijke locatie in het historische centrum.
Filip, niet toevallig architect, liet zijn tekenkunsten op het huis los en vandaag zijn we eindelijk in de mogelijkheid om gasten te ontvangen.

Als fervente reizigers hopen we nu ook zelf anderen te kunnen helpen bij het ontdekken van onze lievelingsstad: Antwerpen!!

Samen spreken we bovendien vijf verschillende talen, dus kom ons gerust aan een taalproef onderwerpen...

In this studio you can really see the history of the property. The exposed beams date from the 16th century!

The studio has a separate kitchen with oven/microwave, Nespresso machine, kettle and hob. Coffee and tea are always available.
In the living area you'll find a flat screen TV with channels in different languages ​​and WIFI.
In the bathroom we offer bathroom toiletries, towels and a hairdryer.

You'll enjoy a good night's sleep in the bedroom with a wonderful boxspring!

On the terrace you can enjoy the sun or eat together at the small table.

Guest access
The studio apartment is fully at your disposal!

Other things to not
amenities: ["Kitchen", "Smoke alarm", "Shampoo", "Hair dryer", "Wifi", "Dishes and silverware", "Washer", "Luggage dropoff allowed", "Iron", "Dedicated workspace", "Microwave", "Essentials", "Long term stays allowed", "Heating", "Paid parking off premises", "Hot water", "Fire extinguisher", "Dryer", "Coffee maker", "Hangers", "Cable TV", "TV with standard cable"]
host_about:
In 2014 werden Filip en ik verliefd op een huis in wat bekend staat als één van de mooiste straten van Antwerpen. 
We besloten er onze eigen woning van te maken, maar ook om drie vakantiewoningen te voorschijn te toveren om anderen te laten meegenieten van deze uitzonderlijke locatie in het historische centrum.
Filip, niet toevallig architect, liet zijn tekenkunsten op het huis los en vandaag zijn we eindelijk in de mogelijkheid om gasten te ontvangen.

Als fervente reizigers hopen we nu ook zelf anderen te kunnen helpen bij het ontdekken van onze lievelingsstad: Antwerpen!!

Samen spreken we bovendien vijf verschillende talen, dus kom ons gerust aan een taalproef onderwerpen...

description:
Entire floor of a city house in the heart of the city. All sights, museums, theatres, parks, bars, restaurants are in a walking distance. The floor consists of 2 bedroom with a bathroom, a separate toilet and a sun terrace.

The space
The Neighbourhood is full of nice bars, restaurant and shops. The house is easily accessible by tram 8 and 10 from the Central station or by approximately 20 minutes of walk. If you come with a car and you have a foreign plate (except NL or L) please be aware that the house is located in the Low Emission Zone (LEZ) for which you will have to register your car. Guest access

description:
Light and modern flat on 1min walk from the metro that takes you in 10-15min to the city centre and the station. Cosy livingroom with big flatscreen and open kitchen. Bedroom with kingsize bed and smart-tv. Bathroom with bath/shower. Small terrace.

The space
My sunny flat is fully furnished with modern furniture and details. In the livingroom you have a big couch with a bigg ass 55inch television, perfect for a lazy sunday. The kitchen is fully equiped: oven, stove, fridge, freezer and Nespresso coffee machine for those early morning. Table in the livingroom where you can eat or work. Bedroom with a kingsize bed, closet where you can put your clothes and other things and of course a smart-tv. Bathroom with bath and shower. People who like to enjoy the sun can enjoy a glass of wine on my small (aka my leprechaun) terrace.

The space
Our big appartement in loft style has all the accommodations you need: a large living room with TV and Chromecast, fast internet connection, a large terrace, a bathroom with shower and bath tub with jaccuzzi, two separate working desks and a fully equipped kitchen.

name: Cosy home, excellent location!
description:
The space
Behind the front door you'll find a spacious hall with a small cabinet for shoes, bags and other items, a coatrack and enough space to put a pram for example. The livingarea on the ground floor is decorated with a large sofa and a round dinertable. On request toys, puzzles, books and a high chair for children can be facilitated.
The open kitchen which is also situated on the ground floor is fully equiped with a Nespresso coffeemaker, milkfoamer, kettle, toaster, microwave and stove.Besides there's a toilet and a small outdoor area.

From the hall a flight of stairs leads to the first floor where a bedroom and a bedroom/livingarea are situated next to each other. In the cosy bedroom a large electric slatted bed of 180x200cm is placed.
The livingroom on the first floor is furnished with a large (sleeping) sofa, a comfortabel chair and a television with cable tv. When 6 people are staying at Zuid42 this livingroom is converted into a bedroom wit

host_about:
Samen met mijn man en twee kinderen woon ik sinds 2009 in Antwerpen. Daarvoor heb ik in Nederland, Engeland en Duitsland gewoond en gewerkt. Ik hou van reizen en ben ondertussen al op veel plekken geweest. Reizen met een gezin is wel wat anders dan alleen en mede daardoor ben ik op het idee gekomen om een familie-vriendelijke vakantiewoning te gaan verhuren. 

Toen onze kinderen nog een stuk kleiner waren vond ik het lastig om leuke adressen te vinden die voorzien waren van een aantal dingen die je als jonge ouders nodig hebt (en waarvan je geen zin hebt ze altijd mee te zeulen...). 

Ondertussen woon ik lang genoeg in Antwerpen om hier een heleboel leuke plekken te kennen die ik graag deel met gasten. Zowel voor mensen op zakenreis, families met kinderen, stellen of vriendengroepen zijn er veel leuke dingen te doen en te ontdekken. Ik stel mijn stad graag aan je voor!

name: Soulful loft apartment
description:
The museums, bars and restaurants of 't Zuid are within walking distance. There's a swimming pool nearby, next to arts campus deSingel. Within running distance you find the Middelheim sculpture parc. Around the corner you can pick your bike at the Vélo-station. The loft itself - a former post office - is spacious, light and fully equipped to nurture body and soul. Couples, singles, pleasure or business, this is the perfect base camp for your explorations into the city, day and night.

The space
120 square meters of breathing room.

Guest access
Your private front door.
