name: Big sunny appartement full of green
description:
Our appartement is big and full of light. There is a nice bathroom with a shower and bath, a kitchen that is fully equipped and two beautiful terraces.
We are very close to Berchem station, the airport of Deurne and the nice neighborhood Zurenborg. By tram we are 15 minutes away from the center.

The space
The appartement is located on the first floor of and old mansion. It's a big and open space: only bedroom and bathroom are separate spaces. The other bedroom is next to the living room with an open door. In the bathroom there is a bath and a rain shower. The kitchen is big and forms, together with the living room, a nice place to relax after a day of city tripping.

If the weather is good, you can enjoy the sun on the terrace.

Guest access
You have access to the entire appartement and the 2 terraces.

name: Beautiful Light Apartment in Trendy South Quarter
description:
Our place is close to art and culture. You’ll love the apartment because of the neighborhood, the light, the comfy bed, and the kitchen. The perfect place for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

The space
The apartment is located on the third floor of an eclectic house, built for a horse smit in 1906. It has a quiet bedroom at the back with an en suite bathroom and there’s a spacious and light living room with beautiful large windows at the front.

The kitchen is well equipped with a stove, dishwasher and combi oven with microwave function and is stocked with coffee, tea, olive oil and the basic spices.

It might be hard to leave this quiet place in one of the trendiest neighborhoods in town, but do get out! There’s many great things to see and do in the direct surroundings! It’s perfect for a couple or a person alone, looking for a hideaway in a very inspirational part of town.

We have 2 living rooms on different sides of the apartment, both next to our spacious and fully equipped kitchen. Our 2 bedrooms have a separate bathroom and toilet.

My house is located in a very cozy and quiet pedestrianized street. There are a lot of places where you can go for dinner or a drink in the neighborhood. There is easy acces to public transport. Important busstations are a few minutes walking and Central Station/town 10 minutes.

The space
The room is in a charmant house which is situated in a cosy and quiet pedestrian street.

Guest access
Private room. Shared bathroom. No use of kitchen and livingroom.

description:
A very bright & spacious apartment with a modern touch without giving in on coziness and comfort.

It's located in the "Eilandje" (Dutch for islet) district, which is a beautiful piece of Antwerp with its own unique atmosphere: the link with the water and the port of yesteryear. Due to the urban development of recent years, the neighborhood is a metamorphosis between old and new, water and city.

The space
The apartment is modernly furnished with a spacious open kitchen that is fully equipped with appliances and cooking utensils - for those who like to cook. And not to worry; the dishwasher does the dishes!

In the extension of the open kitchen you will find a dining table for 6.

The lighting throughout the apartment is cozy and warm and can easily be changed in intensity and color for the atmosphere you want.

host_about:
I live in Antwerp, and I love being a host here! I like to offer guests a homely & comfortable place to stay, along with a smooth & worry-less Airbnb experience.

I like to travel when I get the chance. When traveling I try to use Airbnb as a guest myself as much as possible, as it's a great way to stay in extraordinary places in the snugness of a home.

name: Privé kamer met dakterras, badkamer & keuken
description:
Mijn ruimte is vlakbij kunst en cultuur, restaurants en eetgelegenheden en gezinsvriendelijke activiteiten. Je zult genieten van mijn plek vanwege de hoge plafonds, de locatie, de mensen en de sfeer. Mijn ruimte is geschikt voor stellen, solo-avonturiers en zakenreizigers.

The space
The room is about 20m2 and features a double bed, a cupboard, a private wash basin and a roof terrace. The room makes part of a fully renovated mansion.

Guest access
Guests have access to a big and fully equipped kitchen (provided with a stove, refrigerator and combi oven, service, cutlery,...). Guests have also access to a bathroom and toilet.

Modern 95m² apartment, bathroom with bath+big rainshower. Fully equiped kitchen with dishwasher&oven/microwave. 2bedrooms. 1st bedroom: 1 double bed +1 single bed. Zurenborg and square 'Dageraadplaats' on 5min walk. Parking in the street possible,3€80/day-Sunday free. 20min walk from Keyserlei and Meir (the shopping area of antwerp).

TV + FAST WIFI. Fully equiped big kitchen with dishwasher, induction cooking plate, oven/microwave, toaster, big fridge & freezer and a coffee machine. Elevator. South oriented terrace. Bath with big rainshower. Separated toilet. 2 bedrooms. One bedroom with a double bed (160cm) + single bed and another bedroom with a double (140cm) and a single bed. 2 couches/sofas in the living area. Everything is renovated in 2015.

host_about:
Hi there!

I am Luc! I love to do yoga, to swim, to bicycle, to read, to sail and to do volunteering for scouts and other organizations. I am also intrested in permaculture (biological, ecological agriculture).

I like to go to the theater and to see modern art.

For food I like thai and chinese food. Or Asian food in general. I am also intrested in macrobiotics.

We want to tell you also we are proponents of diversity and inclusiveness.

When you come to Antwerp I will attempt to do anything that is possible to give you a splendid holiday! :)

I hope you will enjoy your stay in my apartment! We renovated it ourself, so everything is brand new :). We worked hard in it!

Hope to see you soon!
Greetz,
Luc

name: *Our zen spot in the city center. Quiet&authentic*
description:
Our place has a very authentic atmosphere. It's located in a quiet neighbourhood in the center of Antwerp, close to many cultural hotspots. You can walk out the neighbourhood into the vivid old center of Antwerp. The view is amazing and the beds are comfy. We also iron our bed linnen so everything feels like home. You can have a look in my art and design books which I collected over my studies. Suitable for all: couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, and families.

The space
The spacious living room has a dining and lounge area with a large couch convertible into a comfy bed with extra mattress. A glass sliding door gives access to the terrace with an amazing wide view over adjacent parks and gardens. As you have the apartment completely to yourself, it is ideal for families & friends up to 5 people, but also for people traveling alone who like space and peace. name: Small cosy house at magical location.
description:
Little house in quiet blind alley. Buses and trams to the center of Antwerp in 15min. The Rivierenhof, a large and beautiful park starts at the back door. Shops, bars , restaurants and parking lot around the corner. City bike stops nearby. Double bed. There's a small attic (open, no door) with room for 1 extra person. In the living area is a sofa bed for 2 extra persons. If you would like to visit Antwerp and return to a relaxed and quiet place in the evening, this is the perfect house for you.

The space
Fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher. Dining place and living room. Upstairs there is a bathroom with bathtub and shower. Sleeping room with double bed. Attic with matras for 1 extra person. Sofa bed in the living room for 2 extra persons. On the other side of the alley there is a small barn where you can use the washing and drying machine. You can sit outside on both sides of the house, so there is always a spot in the sun.

name: Chakra Room with garden view
description:
We are a tiny international co-housing community and have an empty room for guests who like to stay near the park district of Antwerp. Infront of our door is the entrance of Boekenberg Park. Especially for guests who want to destress, do some Kundalini Yoga or receive a balancing Lomi Lomi massage.
The room has a view over the garden. The garden has a variety of herbs which you can use for cooking.

host_about:
Hi, I'm Linda, 58  and I live by myself in a beautiful cosy house opposite the Boekenberg Park in  Antwerp Deurne.  I practise and teach Kundalini Yoga and love to do energetic bodywork called Lomi Lomi (Hawaiian holistic massage).
I shared my house for the last 6 years with international co-housers. Since December the last one moved (Website hidden by Airbnb) now it's time for shorter visits and more space for myself.

name: Cosy  Park-house with garden
description:
Het huis ligt in de zeer rustige Unitas tuinwijk tegenover het Boekenberg Park en op 20 minuten fietsen van het stadscentrum. Er zijn twee slaapkamers op de eerste verdieping en een badkamer met inloopdouche. Op het gelijkvloers is een grote open ruimte met extra slaapbank en bureau. Mogelijkheid tot chillen, yoga of meditatie in de gezellige veranda aan de tuin.
Grote keuken met alle benodigdheden en gastentoilet. Er is ruime parkeerplek (betalend) en stalling voor fietsen.

name: Quiet Oasis in the Bustling Nationalestraat
description:
Our studio is located in the bustling Nationalestraat, the axis between the trendy "Zuid" and the cosy Groenplaats. You will find plenty of trendy shops and restaurants in the neighbourhood. Since the studio is situated at the backside of the building, you can unwind in our little oasis after a busy day in the city. We trust that you will appreciate the comfortable bed and the brand new bathroom with walk-in shower! The studio can accommodate up to two guests.

The space
The completely renovated studio with a surface of 30 sq. meters has everything you need. In the bathroom you will find a walk-in shower and a toilet. The kitchen is equipped with a combi oven (combination of a traditional oven and a microwave) and two cookers. We offer our guests an outstanding sleeping comfort. The high quality murphy beds (one double bed and one single bed, brand: Clei) both have a fully-fledged 7 pocket spring mattress.

name: Pretty room in the centre of Wilrijk
description:
The apartment is close to parks, shops and transportation to the center of Antwerp. By bike or by bus it takes about half an hour. Ideal for anyone that needs to work at the university in Wilrijk. My apartment is light and airy and I try to keep it as cozy as possible. The room has a comfortable queen size bed, is private and quiet and has its own entrance to the balcony. I accept single (female) guests and couples.
I have two cats but they won't come into your room if the door is closed.

The space
The room is quite large and cosy. There is a desk, a wardrobe, a comfortable queen-size bed, a small refrigerator and a wake-up light alarm clock.I have plenty of towels and if you miss anything in the room I will try my best to supply it. The room has a separate door to to the shared balcony. Use of the washing machine is included during daytime hours though I don't have a dryer.

description:
The room offered is spacious and quiet, on the second floor where guests have all the privacy.
My house is just two blocks walking to the subway that goes directly to the heart of the city in 10 minutes, equally by car (with free parking area).
Ideal to overnight after enjoying a city trip through Antwerp in the weekend or a concert at Het Sportpaleis / Lotto Arena, which is only 10 minutes walking!

The space
Enjoy the quiet room with a comfortable sofa bed.

Guest access
Guest will be offered a coffee/tea in the open kitchen the morning before check out. I will provide a bottle of filtered water in the room you can consume. Use of my design bathroom is allowed (shower& washtub only).

Nice spacious and cozy bedroom accomodation in Antwerpen with garden view in a comfortable, clean and charming apartment. Only 10 min by tram from the centre. At 250m from De Singel Music Conservatorium, Antwerp Expo Center, tram (metro) stop, bicycles to rent, supermarket, fitness and olympic pool. Free car parking at 300m distance. Wifi always available.
Perfect location for those who come to the Conservatorium, those who visit Antwerp Expo and those who come for the olympic pool.

The space
Sunny, comfortable, clean and cozy modern appartment. The bedroom is spacious and quiet with garden view. The double bed is comfortable for one or 2 persons and it is provided with clean sheets and towels. Big fridge and deep freezer available, water boiler and microwave.
Antwerpen tourist tax of 2 euro per day is included in the price.

name: Light apartment in historical center with garage
description:
Beautiful apartment with free underground parking with lots of good energy - located in a quite street with pebble stones within a 5 min walking distance from the most beautiful squares 'Conscienceplein' and 'de Grote Markt' - the historical centre of Antwerp. The shopping street 'Meir' is also 5 min away. The city bikes are in front of the door. You’ll be in the heart of Antwerp.

The space
My apartment is over 70 square meters with two bedrooms. It's spacious and cozy at the same time. Big windows leave light into the dining and living room from the south. Bathroom and toilet are separate.

The whole apartment and garage.

Other things to note
I have no tv and no microwave - the city is there to be explored!

name: Cosy, big and light house with garage and bicycles
description:
Our house is next to the popular Park Spoor Noord and the beautiful Rivierenhof (park). In close distance of cafes and various entertainment areas. 15 minutes walk from the Central Station and several subway stations towards the city center.
The house is suitable for business travelers, families (with children) and large groups.

The space
We have a garage where the car can be parked. We offer you two bicycles. Always convenient to go to the store or to take a step into the world.

For the baby or toddler has a crib and a changing table provided.
Bed Sheets and towels are waiting for you!

Our street is very quiet so you can take enough sleep in the night!

The kitchen's equipped with all the basics. Including oven, microwave, coffee maker, kettle etc ...
Unfortunately, no dishwasher ...

During the summer months you can have breakfast on our city courtyard in the sun.

host_about:
Hello, my name is Maddy. I live in a nice, renovated townhouse in Antwerp and I furnished the roof apartment as a cozy quest house. (since Dec.2021)  I have already had a lot of fantastic experiences with Airbnb as a guest and I would love to give you a warm welcome as well.
I was an art teacher and now I’m retired. I like walking in the countryside, travelling, and exploring beautiful places (around the world). I enjoy art, architecture, nature and meeting new people.  
Please do not hesitate to contact me in case you would have any questions. (by text message, mail, talk by phone or by popping in downstairs during your stay). I hope to meet you soon and  I will make sure you'll have a wonderful stay in Antwerp.  
Best greetings from Antwerp! 
Maddy

name: Terrace Luxury Suite 4
description:
Kaai11 is a luxurious and charming historical building on the Schelde quays in the funky area Antwerp South. Top location!

We house 4 city flats and 2 guest rooms. All flats and rooms can be reached by elevator and stairs.

The city flats offer an amazing river view making your sunset unforgettable. All flats are fully furnished, providing an equipped kitchen, desk, living room, separate bedroom and luxurious bathroom. Our city flats are also suitable for a longer stay.

Other things to note
We offer a luxurious breakfast for 12.5 euro per guest between 9u and 10.30u. You can reserve this by sending us a message here or by calling us directly.

The city flats offer an amazing river view making your sunset unforgettable. All flats are fully furnished, providing an equipped kitchen, desk, living room, separate bedroom and luxurious bathroom. Our city flats are also suitable for a longer stay.

name: Charming house - 1 bedroom  & sunny roof terrace
description:
My place is available for couples, singles or business people.

It has a fully equiped kitchen, a large living room, a bathroom with shower/bath, a room to work or relax, and one spacious bedroom with a king size bed, where you can also set up an extra bed. Wifi and a washing machine are aso available. I have a lovely sunny roof terrace where you can have breakfast in the morning or just relax.

Other things to note
Please respect my neighbours.

Smoking is not allowed inside but you can smoke on my terrace.

I have a lovely cat, Snuggels, who is very friendly and independent. He can come in as he like through the cat door. Food is available for him. You just need to feed him in the morning and in the evening. :-)

I did put a lot of love in my house so please respect it like it would be your own. But most of all enjoy it😊

name: Surprising characteristic apartment in Antwerp
description:
You're staying in the former servants' quarters of a house of the 30's. It comprises a double bedroom with a sitting area, a bathroom, a separate toilet, a compact kitchen, a living room with double sofa bed for 1 or 2 additional guests, a semi-covered terrace and a cosy and sunny garden. It is situated in a quiet street in a lively area of Antwerp near the center, attractions, shops, railway station and public transport.

The space
To enter the apartment you descend four steps. The bedroom with double bed is attached to the bathroom. There is a full bath in which you can also take a shower. The sofa in the living room can be used as a double sofa bed. You can make yourself a pleasant breakfast and enjoy it with a view on the garden. For guests with a large suitcase there is a lot of room in a closet and in the cloakroom. In the kitchen you can use a two-burner stove and microwave to prepare a simple meal.

name: Beautiful sunny apartment in the centre of Antwerp
description:
Welcome to my beautiful, spacy and sunny apartment in Antwerp! The apartment is located on the 4th floor with an amazing view over Antwerp.
My apartment is located in the centre of Antwerp with all the amenities at walking distance. In this neighbourhood (Schipperskwartier/University) you find lots of museums, bars and restaurants. The Great Square Market, the Cathedral and the historical city centre are only five minutes by foot. You can also easily visit the trendy Eilandje and MAS.

The space
My apartment (approx 90m²) has one bedroom with a stunning view over the city, two desk's, a living room with television (Netflix+ high quality surround system), kitchen with dishwasher, bathroom with bath/shower, washing machine and tumble dryer. You have free Wifi in the apartment. All the rooms are spacious and bright. The apartment was built in 1928 and was renovated between 2010 and 2014. Verder houd ik enorm veel van reizen en nieuwe plaatsen ontdekken. Ik trek dus ook regelmatig de wijde wereld in met mijn VW bus om leuke plaatsjes te ontdekken, te surfen of te snowboarden.

name: Homy apartment near many parks #LovelyGreen
description:
Het appartement bevindt zich vlakbij het centrum van Antwerpen (5km), makkelijk te bereiken met openbaar vervoer. Met de fietsen van Velo Antwerpen (300m) geraak je overal snel.
Boekenbergpark (100m) heeft een natuurlijke zwemvijver, Boelaerpark (150m) heeft een grote speeltuin, Rivierenhof (3km) met zijn 132 ha, is het grootste park van Antwerpen.
Dageraadplaats (2.5km) met gezellige restaurantjes en café's gelegen in de leuke Zurenborgwijk.
Een heel rustig appartement in een groene buurt.

The space
Living en eetkamer bevinden zich in 1 grote ruimte met aansluitend een half open keuken, met mooi uitzicht op de bomen. Dit geeft een ruime en open indruk.
De houten vloer in heel het appartement, maakt het geheel warm en knus.
In de badkamer bevindt zich het toilet, bad met douche.
De slaapkamer heeft een dubbel bed en bevindt zich aan de achterkant van het gebouw, het geeft uit op stadstuintjes en is daarom heel rustig.

I love living in the beautiful city of Antwerp, come and take a look for yourself :)
I love family, friends, children, books, healthy food, coffee, music, shiatsu, movies and most of all: travelling. 
I like yoga and it's way of living, like to try new things in the kitchen, mostly vegetarian and world cuisine.

I like to share my apartment with you in an open way. You can use everything here, also the kitchen.

name: Fully renovated superb townhouse with garden
description:
Enjoy your stay in Antwerp in our recently renovated (2019), beautiful townhouse with garden in the heart of the nicest area of Antwerp, Zurenborg. Our house was recently fully renovated and we love the result :-)

The house is located in Antwerp's nicest area: Zurenborg. This area is well known for its splendid architecture, nice restaurants and cosy bars (on the famous Dageraadplaats). Public transport is a 2 min walk away if you'd like to discover other parts of the city.

The space
We have just finished renovating our home, making sure to respect beautiful 19th century elements such as the big wooden door, original wooden floor and ceiling details in the living room. We are combining these elements with more modern improvements on utilities such as heating/air conditioning but also focusing on light, white spaces. description:
The house is located in the historic heart of Antwerp. Culture, restaurants and bars, shopping: no matter what you want to do, it's a footstep away. You will enjoy this place because it has the spirit and the soul of a charming old lady and the dynamics and flexibility of the youth. 17th century on the outside, ultramodern on the inside. There's wifi, a Sonos sound system and digital tv. Or: switch it all off and enjoy the sauna and outdoor shower. Private parking available!

The space
Our house has a master bedroom with a kingsize bed. There is a tv-lounge which can be used as a spareroom with two single beds.

An amazing big and bright apartment in the heart of Antwerp.The apartment has just been completely renovated, it is situated 2 minutes walking distance from the Central train station, the largest famous zoo, diamond area and the new Elisabeth zaal. 10 minutes walking distance from the Meir ( main shopping street).
All public transports are a minute away! Around the corner you have a big supermarkt.

The space
The apartment has a big living room, fully equipped open kitchen, 2 bedrooms, a bathroom and a separated toilet.
It is all fully furnished and has a big flat screen smart TV

name: Luxe cosy studio in central Antwerp
description:
*** Weekly/Monthly Stays With Offer Rate, Upon Completion Of Stays ***
Gelegen in centrum antwerpen net naast busterminal, 5 minuten lopen van centraal treinstation, vlak aan de belangrijkste winkelstraten meir en Keyserlei naast opera en ugc cinema. Tal van restaurants en cafés liggen op wandelafstand. De zeer lichte studio heeft een 2 persoonsbed en slaapbank voor 2 personen, kitchenette en badkamer met bad douche lavabo en toilet.

The space
De studio is volledig gerenoveerd en beschikt over aparte badkamer met ligbad/douche lavabo en wc. De goed uitgeruste keuken met koelkast, diepvriezer, kookplaat en microwave maken zelf koken eenvoudig. Er is een kingsize bed en comfortabele slaapbank. Lakens en handdoeken voor badkamer en keuken zijn voorzien. Er is snel wifi in de ganse ruimte en flatscreem tv met internationale zenders.

Guest access
Volledige studio staat ten gunste van de gasten.

name: Beautiful house to enjoy an Antwerp family-holiday
description:
Our recently renovated house is situated in a quiet, children friendly neighbourhood in the suburbs of Antwerp. The city center is only 15 minutes away by bike or tram. The house is fully equipped with washing machine, dryer, flatscreen television, sunny garden, modern kitchen with dishwasher. Two bikes will be at your disposal. You will much appreciate the beautiful park across the street for your morning run or afternoon picknick. Welcome!

The space
Our house is very childfriendly and only a 15 minute tramride away from the lovely Antwerp city center.

Other things to note
The second floor of our house is occupied by Judith, our 29 year old tenant. She has her own kitchen and bathroom, so except from the staircase you won't be sharing any room with her. name: Cosy groundfloor in Antwerps popular area: 't Zuid
description:
A nice and beautiful apartment in the middle of Antwerps most popular area : t'Zuid.
The apartment is more than large enough , 65m2, and on the groundfloor. It is perfect to spend a few comfortable days in the middle of the city centre. Easy to reach, close to a very large public parking and to tram 4, and to the river de Schelde.

The space
A beautifully renovated apartment situated in one of the most attractive quarters of Antwerp: Het Zuid. Close to the Musea and the area has lot of shops and popular restaurants. It is in walking distance from the Cathedral, de Meir, Groenplaats...
The apartment is located on the ground floor
The living room, is tastefully decorated and ends in a beautiful modern kitchen where you can find a gas cooker, a fridge, a coffee maker, tea, oil, herbs...everything to make cooking easy. Near the bedroom there is a beautiful bathroom, which offers a shower and toilet.

name: Beautiful House in Historical Centre of Antwerp
description:
This Beautiful house in the heart of Historical Centre of Antwerp is absolutely amazing.

It is an ancient traditional townhouse,completely renovated with a lot of style and elegancy.

The house is fully equipped and furnished and make you feel home right away with tasteful interior.

The master bedroom has its own bathroom with bath.
The 2 other rooms have a desk

Its perfect for a family, friends or business to stay for a short or long term in Antwerp.

name: Zeer ruim Appartement op Toplocatie
description:
Dit zeer ruime appartement (185m²) bevindt zich op 'Het Eilandje' één van de toplocaties in Antwerpen. Vlak bij de Schelde en de 2 oudste dokken in Antwerpen is het de ideale uitvalsbasis om lekker te kunnen genieten van ons historisch verleden , cultuur, shopping ( 10 min te voet naar het Centrum van de stad en eveneens de mogelijkheid om de tram te nemen vlak in de buurt) restaurants , leuke caféetjes en trendy koffiebars.
Sinds

The space
Geniet van ons zeer ruim appartement voor 6 personen, in een voormalige karaktervolle havenbuurt met een bijzondere rijke geschiedenis. Het appartement is gevestigd vlakbij het RedStarLine museum, het MAS museum,de jachthaven en de Schelde.
De buurt rond het Willemdok en het Bonapartedok is bezaaid met een divers pallet van leuke restaurants, unieke caféetjes en trendy coffeebars voor elke smaak en budget.

Het appartement bevat 3 ruime slaapkamers met dubbele bedden. Daarnaast zijn er 2 badkamers, een zee

name: Private house "2600"
description:
Op een boogscheut van Antwerpen bieden wij onze gezellige airbnb "2600" aan. We hebben 3 slaapkamers voor 5 personen (kinderbed mogelijk), woonkamer, wifi, televisie,badkamer, keuken. Op wandelafstand kan je het openbaar vervoer nemen richting stad. Ook zijn er voldoende winkels in de buurt en restaurants. Parkeren mits gebruik van parkeerautomaat. De luchthaven van Antwerpen is vlakbij. Op enkele meters bij ons vandaan kan je een fiets huren en de stad verkennen. (URL HIDDEN)r

Guest access
Gasten hebben de volledige privé woning ter beschikking.

Other things to note
Achter de hoek is er een wassalon.
Fietsen kunnen vlakbij gehuurd worden om de stad te verkennen.
Het aanbieden van een factuur is niet mogelijk.
Parkeertarief vanaf 1 april 2019 : 2.50 euro per dag

description:

name: Loft in ancient militairy hospital in Antwerp
description:
Loft in carfree historical area with private garden (300m2). Living area (150 m2) and 4 bedrooms of which 3 with private bathroom. Next to one of the most famous restaurants in Antwerp, "the Jane" and close to the city center and various touristic interesting must see's. Like the most beautiful art nouveau street of Belgium, Brewery "The koninck", PAKT and zurenborg on walking distance. Private parking for 2 cars available and storage for bycicles. Good Wifi and cleaning lady 2 times a week.

The space
spacious living area and kitchen with all you can wish on the groundfloor. On the lower floor we have 4 bedrooms. 2 bedrooms with each a private bathroom ensuite. And 2 bedrooms who share one bathroom. 2 bathrooms have a big bad. Each bedroom has a tv. In the living room is a corner for the kids with all kinds of stuff to play. In the garden is a swing, a slide and a trampoline.

Guest access

name: Complete house | 10 people | historic center
description:
ZaligInAntwerpen is a luxury holiday Home in the historic center of Antwerp.

The 16th century house has been completely renovated and can easily accomodate 10 people with 3 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, a cosy living room and fully equipped kitchen and dining area. It is ideal for big families, groups of friends, colleagues, workshops, etc...

You stay in a quiet pittoresk street and yet only few steps of all hotspots in Antwerp: Groenplaats, Kloosterstraat, Fashion District, shoppingstreets,

The space
Because you have the whole house for yourself, you can spend quality time with your friends or family, share aperitifs, cooking and dining.
Both the cozy living with TV and gas fireplace on the 3rd floor as the kitchen and dining area in a cozy bistro atmosphere are exclusively for your group.

Guest access
You have the entire property exclusively at your disposal.

name: Vintage flamenco appartment
description:
Ground floor of my house: 1 bedroom, dining room with sofa bed, private kitchen, bathroom corner and private toilet, terrace. Possible 2 extra single beds at office next to appartement. Multicultural, park, bio-shop, supermarket, bars, resto. 17 min. from Central station.

Gelijkvl: 1 slaapkamer, eetkamer met zetelbed, privé keuken met douchehoek en privé toilet, terras. Mogelijk 2 extra 1-pers.bedden in werkruimte naast app. Park en speeltuin, resto en bars, bioshop. 17 min. van Centr.Station.

The space
Ground floor with additional option to use the yoga/dancestudio. It is also possible for larger groups to sleep in the yogastudio.

Guest access
Yoga on monday at 10 am, cost 12€. Private yoga class on demand.

Other things to note
Our sweet cat Balou is part of the family. Unfortunately he does not like other pets in the house. He will not enter the Airbnb, but lives upstairs with us.

description:
This studio is unique as it has a garden, free coffee and tea facilities and it is located in a quiet street but within 5 min walking distance from the center. The area has some great places closeby for coffee, lunch, dinner or drinks.
You can park in the street for 2,70e per hour.

The space
The studio has a comfortable boxspring bed (160x200), a one person sleeping couch (80x204) and the kitchen is fully equipped with fridge, 4 pit induction cooking stove and electric oven. There is a shower and separate toilet too and cable tv. Sleeping places available for maximum 3 persons.

Guest access
The studio is in a building with other appartments on the ground floor with private entrance.

Other things to note
You can have breakfast for 7,50e per person, which includes; bread, croissant, butter, jam, cheese, ham, 2 eggs, orange juice, yoghurt, coffee and tea as much as you like.

host_about: Life is short , world is big !We love travelling as we  like new adventures in life . We enjoy  seeing the difference in culture , in food, in life style , in people.We do not like being stucked in a hotel room which dose not give you much more  than just a bed to sleep. We always search for a place which will bring us more comforts , passion,flexibility , privacy ,romance, relaxation , peace ,independence , a place giving the feeling of our own place when we are away from home . Therefore , we made great effort to turn this 450 years old building into cozy and romantic apartments building specially  for the travellers . All apartments are desinged and decorated with morden vintage style,   well furnisehd with self catering kitchen . No matter you are alone or you are with friends , you will always find your  hideout here .

name: Spacious apartment in trendy neighbourhood
description:
Sunny and spacious recently renovated apartment located near the famous restaurant 'The Jane'. It is situated in the MIPIM award nominated residential project called 'Het Groen Kwartier'. The project is the urban transformation of the former Military hospital of Antwerp. It is known for its combination of beautiful architecture, green environment, great restaurants, bars AND all this in a walking distance from the Antwerp city-center.

The space
The apartment offers the following amenities:
- 2 Large bedrooms: 1 with Kingsize double bed and 2nd with 2 separate bed
- Clean sheets, towels, etc.
- Fully equipped kitchen (including a Nespresso coffee machine)
- Fully equipped bathroom (including a hairdryer)
- Washing machine (no dryer)
- Small sunny balcony
- Fast Wifi
- Netflix

Guest access
The apartment will be completely yours during your stay.

description:

Hello! We're a young couple, living in the north of downtown Antwerp. We bought this house, but as it is a bit big, we're renting out the apartment on the ground floor, including the magnificent garden! Feel welcome in the most vibrant part of town!

The space
This is the ground floor of our own house. We live upstairs and in the other part of the ground floor, we have our office and work area. In the back of the ground floor is an apartment for you to enjoy with kitchen, bathroom, bedroom, small living room (which is also bedroom if you're coming by 4), separate toilet and great view of (and access to!) the garden.

There is one double bed in the bedroom, shower and toilet in the bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with refrigerator, sink, microwave oven, regular oven and gas cooker. Hi and welcome on my page!
As I like to travel a lot via Airbnb as well I thought it was nice idea to start renting my own place too, and here we are!

name: Romantic Gem in Antwerp’s Historic City Center
description:
This quiet, bijoux loft (65m2) is perfectly located; at 1’ from the 'Grote Markt', the City Hall, the Cathedral and the Scheldt river. You’ll be just a few steps away from great museums, art galleries, restaurants, bars, shops…

But be aware! There’s so much to explore —if only you manage to shut the door and leave your cosy nest behind. Can you?! ~;))

Museums:
2' DIVA - Diamonds
5' MoMu - Fashion
10' MAS - Antwerp history
15' MUHKA - Modern Art
20' FOMU - Photography
22’ Central Station

The space
‘Op Den Spieghel’ is a newly renovated, fully equipped rooftop aerie/loft with fantastic views out onto this beautiful city, often called the Manhattan of the 16th Century.

The building is secure and has a lift. Our small loft (65m2) includes a fully equipped kitchen, a dining/living area, a toilet, a bedroom with queen-sized boxspring bed (feather duvet) and en-suite bathroom with bath and shower.

host_about:
Traveling around the world as ’sales representative' for Antwerp fashion designers, or as ‘buyer’ for interior designers, made me be quite demanding regarding the places I was staying. Finding a comfortable, elegant and very tidy stay at a perfect location has always been my main goal.

When traveling for pleasure, I noticed I actually looked for the same kind of qualitative, stylish and —for sure!- authentic spots… Pleasure & business always seemed tightly connected :-)))

Starting from my own travel experiences and the encounter with so many people with various cultural backgrounds made me of course very skilled for the hosting of guests from all over the world. For business travelers, but for sure as well for my beloved friends. So, if you are looking for a kind of specific spot that provides you an ease of living in the heart of Antwerp, don’t hesitate and contact me!

CU soon?!

name: Gezellig verblijf in stadswoning
description:
Gezellig verblijf, achter de Zoo en het Centraal Station, tussen Borgerhout en Zurenborg. Voel je helemaal thuis in Antwerpen, op je eigen verdieping met slaapkamer, leefruimte en badkamer.
Je hebt geen keuken, maar er is meer dan voldoende aanbod op wandelafstand om rustig te ontbijten, lunchen of dineren.

Let op! Op weekdagen is het niet altijd mogelijk om voor 18u in te checken. We verwelkomen jullie graag persoonlijk voor de check in en spreken hiervoor een tijdstip af samen met jullie.

The space
Jouw ruimte maakt deel uit van onze stadswoning. Wij bewonen enkel het gelijkvloers en de eerste verdieping. De tweede verdieping is volledig voor jullie, de inkom en trappenhal zijn gemeenschappelijk.

Je verblijf bestaat uit een slaapkamer met dubbel bed en opbergruimte, een badkamer en aparte leefruimte met zithoek en eettafel.

Er is geen aparte keuken. We voorzien verse koffie/thee en de afwas mag je bij ons achterlaten. Op

name: Large attick room in city center
description:
Attick room of +- 30 m2 with separate ensuite containing a sink, shower and toilet. No smoking. Use of pool upon request and from May - October only. Very close to the station, trams, shopping center, city park and city bikes. Pool is to be used by our guests only (no additional invites) or ourselves until 22.00 pm. No diving or splashing allowed.

The space

Garden and attick room

name: LuLu's place
description:
Wij zijn reeds jaren klant van Airbnb en nu verhuren we zelf een privé kamer met dubbel bed. De recent gerenoveerde badkamer is privé, de keuken wordt gedeeld. De ligging is zeer rustig en toch centraal en vlakbij openbaar vervoer en alle mogelijke winkels. Ook het station is op wandelafstand. Parkeren is helaas wat moeilijker. Wie de stad wil verkennen geven we graag informatie (in 5 talen).

The space
We hebben van de pandemie gebruik gemaakt om de badkamer helemaal te vernieuwen. Ook het huis krijgt een nieuwe kleur en een deel van het terras is onthardt. Één stukje moet nog afgewerkt worden.
We garanderen volledige privacy in het verhuurde deel van de woning, met uitzondering van de keuken die we delen. Voor het ontbijt blijven we toch even aan onze kant om jullie niet te storen tijdens het ochtendritueel.

Guest access
Jullie beschikken over een privé badkamer maar de keuken delen we. Jullie mogen alle toestellen en gerief gebruiken

name: EXCLUSIVE & AUTHENTIC ARCHITECT LOFT with GARDEN!!
description:
Exclusive, warm and very authentic architect's loft (4m ceiling height)  with a huge green urban garden. 
Decorated over the years with design furniture, precious carpets, an extensive library and exclusive art pieces. 
Located in a unique Military Heritage site "Military Hospital Antwerp", completely locked from public streets. 
Walking Distance (2 minutes) from Michelin Star restaurant The Jane, August, Supermarket, Bakery, Restaurants and coffeebars.

The space
Privacy and discretion in your own loft within military walls. 
All modern comfort in kitchen and bathroom as well as luxury details such as floor heating and sauna. 
Private parking spot in underground garage.

You have 2 little shelf cupboards that you can use, you will also find some DVD's and clean towels. The second space is a little kitchenette equipped with a fridge, an electric 2 plate stove, a water kettle a shower and a separate toilet. name: PM87 - Modern, stylish home

Our lovely one-bedroom apartment is located centrally, just 5 minutes of a walk to the charming Eilandje and MAS museum. The kitchen is fully equipped. Netflix is available. Our bathroom has a rainshower and there is a washing machine. A rental city bike station is just in front. It is a great basis to explore the city, and you will find all you need here for a nice stay!
* COVID -19: See details under 'Other things to note'.

The space
Our apartment has been renovated with an eye for detail. The black kitchen is custom-designed and made by an architect and is at the centre of the apartment, as it deserves to be. The cups, glasses, and plates are carefully chosen from tasteful brands, just like the bedlinen, towels, and other objects. The bathroom is a delight to refresh yourself in the morning, with the beautiful marble top, rain shower, and the shower radio. host_about: I live in Antwerp since 2001 and became a real local in the meantime. I love this city and enjoy living in the close proximity to all kinds of nice cafe's, restaurants, theathers, summer bars, stores, etc! In my free time, I like cooking, reading, watching films, spending time with friends, exploring new spots in and outside Antwerp. For sure you can count on me to get good advice on where to eat or go to, from fine dining to the most child-friendly places. I live almost next door to the apartment, together with my husband and two young children. After working for 15 years in a multinational company, mainly as Customer Service Manager, I have decided in 2017 to have some time off to spend with my family and follow my passions, and possibly make an own business out of it in the future. This also gave me the extra time to be able rent this apartment to guests, so that they can enjoy the space and this wonderful city. The apartment was originally meant for our family and friends visiting us from abroad, but we thought it will be a pity not to share it with others when it is not occupied. Hope you will like and cherish it as much as we do.  And hope to meet you soon!

name: Cozy and compact city home
description:
This compact comfy apartment is the perfect basis for exploring the cultural, gastronomic and fashion city of Antwerp. Located ideally between the old town and the hip district of 't Eilandje, you will be able to walk almost everywhere during your stay. This 50 cm2 one bedroom apartment is at the ground floor of a typical Antwerp house from 1800s. It has a living, a separate bedroom with a queen-size bed, a bathroom, kitchen, and a small terrace. We wish you a nice and comfortable stay!

The space
The apartment is located at the back of the building, and does 'not' have any street views. It looks at the private small terrace through 2 windows in the kitchen. The living room and the bedroom has windows 'only' on the ceiling. The kitchen has a full-size fridge, an oven, microwave, a Nespresso coffee machine, and a kettle. In the bedroom, there is a queen-size bed, and a closet. Bathroom has a bathtub with a shower in it. There is Netflix available on tv, in case you

name: Spacious  new apartment in Antwerp City Center
description:
85 m² newly built appartement on the second floor in a cosy neighbourhood with lots of shops in Antwerp City Center. Ideally in between shopping street Meir and Sportpaleis/Lotto Arena (concert hall). 240 meters from a metro station which connects you directly with Antwerp Central station, Sportpaleis and Meir/Groenplaats. Ideal for a shopping/seighseeing trip or to pick a concert at the concert hall "Sportpaleis." Business travellers will appreciate the workdesk and fast (broadband) wifi.

The bedroom of the apartment has a balcony and looks over the garden with trees. The bedroom has also digital tv.

The kitchen is fully equiped american kitchen.

name: Kamer Adriaan
description:
Een kamer bevindt zich op de tweede verdieping van een eengezinswoning. Een sfeervolle kamer met een dubbel bed op de duplex en een zetelbed in de kamer. In hetzelfde huis is een gelijkaardige kamer beschikbaar voor airbnb. Op de eerste verdieping is een ruimte waar een microgolf staat en een gootsteen. Er is eetgerei aanwezig. Je kan dus een eenvoudige maaltijd opwarmen. Er is geen kookgelegenheid. Het huis in gelegen in de groene rand van Antwerpen, op wandelafstand van het openbaar vervoer.

The space
Gemakkelijk bereikbaar met de wagen, ruime parkeergelegenheid. Het huis ligt naast het fort van Merksem, een leuke plek om te wandelen of joggen. Dichtbij het sportpaleis!

Guest access
De gasten hebben toegang tot de bovenverdiepingen. Gelieve de schoenen benden te laten. Het huis is volledig vloer verwarmd.

Other things to note
Gelieve de schoenen beneden aan de trap te laten, de vloer boven is vrij delicaat.
In

description:

The space
Ons huis is dicht bij de stad gelegen, maar toch volledig in het groen! Het is gemakkelijk bereikbaar met de auto en het openbaar vervoer. Het is gelegen naast het fort van Merksem.

name: Gezellige kamer, dichtbij openbaar vervoer.
description:
Als je mijn appartement binnen komt in de hal dan is daar de toiletruimte en rechts de gezellige kamer
aan de straatkant met een groot raam, zuid gericht. Links zijn mijn privé gedeelten. De bedden kunnen op verschillende manieren staan naar gelang je vraag. Er is een waterkoker en servies en bestek aanwezig voor het geval je eten laat bezorgen of zelf gaat afhalen. Aan het tafeltje kun je goed met 2 zitten.

The space
In een multiculturele buurt is het gezellig ontdekken van de vele smaken eenvoudig.
Op wandelafstand zijn er winkels,eethuizen,cafés,restaurants-wereldkeukens en markten. Het is 15 minuten wandelen van Centraal station en daar begint de winkelstraat en dan is daar het stadscentrum om te ontdekken. Halte van openbaarvervoer De Lijn is 3 min.

Guest access
De kamer ligt naast de inkomhal dus kun je in alle vrijheid binnen en buiten gaan. Waterkoker is op de kamer en thee en koffie en suiker en melk cupjes om te starten

host_about:
Hallo allemaal,
 ik ben vanuit Nederland vertrokken in 1978 en  huwde met Marcel en kreeg 2 prachtige zonen en die zochten weer lieve partners en zo kreeg ik ook 5 prachtige kleindochters.
Ja ik ben dus al wat wijzer maar niet grijzer!  
Ik geniet als er mensen rond me zijn, maar houd ook er van rust en stilte.

name: The knight's room
description:
Impressive historic room on a perfect downtown location in one of Antwerps oldest Monuments. The house is situated opposite the Arts Academy. Some other rooms are rented to artists.
The room is furnished with 4 brand new boxspring beds and is very quiet.
The bathroom is fully private and freshly renovated.
If you like historic houses and and artists around, we're sure you will enjoy our place!
Free bagagelockers available, you can drop off your bags before check in and go discover the city!

The space
One of Antwerps most characteristic town houses, originaly built by knight and former major of the city 'Arnold van Liere' back in 1503.
The knight's room is a majestic space with high ceilings and lots of historic elements. Cosy and with 4 brand new hotel quality boxspring beds.

Guest access
The room is easily accessible and located on the ground floor level in the back of the house.

Other things to note

name: The Nomad's Lounge
description:
The Nomad's lounge breaths Eastern charm in a historical setting. It is located in one of Antwerps oldest protected town houses. The room combines historical elements like high ceilings and stained glass windows, with modern comfort, hotel beds and a stylish tadelakt bathroom. Perfect downtown location, ideal for discovering the city on foot or by bike.
Free bagagelockers available, you can drop off your bags before check in and go discover the city!

The space
We personally restored this historical space, which is part of a protected house that originally dates back to 1503. We tried to pay attention to the historical perspective, and give it a unique contemporary touch as well, using ecological building materials. Hope you like it!

Guest access
The room has a fully private bathroom and toilet. A kitchen is not available.

Other things to note
There´s a few great painters living on the upper floors of this house.

* 15 min by foot to the train station

* 10 min by foot to a big Carrefour and Aldi supermarkets

No shoes are allowed in the flat, except house shoes of course

name: Many Amenities ☆ Self check-in, walk from station
description:
Recently built (2018), well-equipped apartment with garden. Just a 5 min. walk from Antwerp-Berchem station, so you can drop off your bags and start seeing the sights.

Located in "het Groen Kwartier", nearby you will find: De Koninck brewery, PAKT, The Jane (two-Michelin star restaurant), city rental bikes, shops and plenty more.

Street parking is available for 5eur/day (free on sundays and after 19:00), availability can vary depending time of day.

Prices include VAT and tourist tax.

The space
- Open kitchen area with dishwasher, electric hob, oven/microwave combi and all required cooking utensils. A Nespresso coffee maker and capsules are available, along with a selection of teas, herbs and spices.

- Living room is equipped with a 55" smart tv. Relax, sit back and enjoy your Netflix shows after a day of exploring. There is also a chromecast available so you can easily cast your videos or spotify to the tv.

host_about:
Wij zijn Dietrich en Sofie, uitgeweken Kempenaars naar de Koekenstad. 
We wonen in een rustig achterhuis aan het De Coninckplein en genieten van het stadsleven.
We geven je graag tips over te bezoeken restaurants, verborgen historische parels en als barista geeft Dietrich je uitgebreid uitleg over leuke koffiebars en lunchplekjes. 
Wees welkom!

De ruimte

De accomodatie is een rustige, lichte kamer met privé-badkamer. De kamer ligt gescheiden van ons huis, zodat je in alle privacy kan genieten van je verblijf.
Gelegen in een bruisende buurt van de stad, heeft u vanaf hier de perfecte uitvalsbasis om de binnenstad te bereiken.

Openbaar vervoer op 150 meter.
Historisch centrum en Eilandje zijn vlot bereikbaar.

Antwerpen-Centraal (500 meter)

Cosy Attic/Suite, perfect for your stay in Antwerp. Situated on the third floor of our house "Casa Zurenborg", with private bathroom, sofa, table and corner with washbasin and microwave, in the heart of the picturesque quarter of Zurenborg. The area is unique and famous for its architecture, full of little bars and restaurants, and at only 10 minutes on foot from the train station Antwerpen-Berchem. The place is easily connected by public transport with the center and other tourist areas.

The space
Our Attic/Suite of around 35 square meter is an intimate and cosy place, with original wooden roof beams. It is situated on the third floor of our house, built in neo-flemish-renaissance style with a red brick façade, and is reachable through the common internal stairway. The automatically closing and fireproof door guarantees your privacy. The room is completely furnished and well illuminated, and has a double bed with luxury comfortable mattress. We love to enjoy life, traveling and sharing our experiences.

La casa per noi è un luogo caldo da condividere insieme e con amici, gustando una buona birra o un bicchiere di buon vino.
"La vita... Un Viaggio che ti porto verso l'inaspettato, da vivere pienamente."

Hope to host you soon! Cheers! :-)

This beautiful luxury apartment is located right on the famous "Meir" street in the heart of Antwerp. The Meir is the biggest shopping street of the Benelux filled with high-end and well known brands.
The best possible location for a wonderful stay in our city.
Recently renovated with and with a completely equipped kitchen our apartment will exceed your expectations.
We are on a couple of minutes walking distance of the Central Station, Groenplaats square & The Cathedral! :-)

The space
Our apartments are decorated to make you feel at home. We want to give you a warm, enjoyable and relaxing place to rest while exploring our beautiful city. Our apartment is equipped with all essentials for a comfortable trip. Eg. a fully equipped kitchen, fresh bedlinnen and towels for each guest, shower gel, shampoo and conditioner, coffee, tea, hair dryer etc.

Guest access
The apartment is completely private for the people that made the rese

name: Beautiful Duplex 2 Bedroom Apartment in Center SPA
description:
A very charming and beautiful duplex 2 bedroom apartment right in the historic center of Antwerp. It is located on a quiet and cozy square with lovely bars and coffee shops.

On 70 meters walking you have the riverside, perfect for walks and sunset views.
On 5 minutes walking you have the Historic Center, famous Shopping street Meir and Central Station.

The whole place is fully equipped and we provide fresh linen and towels.

Hope to host you soon!

The space
Our apartments are decorated to make you feel at home. We want to give you a warm, enjoyable and relaxing place to rest while exploring our beautiful city. Our apartment is equipped with all essentials for a comfortable trip. Eg. a fully equipped kitchen, fresh bedlinnen and towels for each guest, shower gel, shampoo and conditioner, coffee, tea, hair dryer etc.

Guest access
The apartment is completely private for the people that made the reservation

name: The Industrial Residence in Heart of Antwerp 1
description:
Bright and beautiful industrial style apartment, just renovated, very close to the charming Riverside and to the Cathedral of Antwerp.

This is known to be the best possible tourist location.
You are surrounded by all the historic-high-lights of Antwerp and there are several iconic café's, bars and restaurants in the area.
The central station is a 15min walk from the apartment.

The kitchen is fully equipped and we supply fresh linen, towels and all essentials. Hopefully we'll host you soon!

name: Knus verblijf in het eeuwenoude Begijnhof
description: Misschien wel de speciaalste plek van Antwerpen: het Begijnhof. Midden in het stadscentrum vind je een heel bijzonder hofje. Oude huisjes omringen een prachtige binnentuin met eeuwenoude bomen. Het is een plek om tot rust te komen en om inspiratie op te doen. Het sfeervolle appartement bestaat uit een ruime woonkamer, een knusse slaapkamer, en moderne keuken en badkamer. De patio geeft veel licht en biedt privacy. De winkelstraten zijn op loopafstand, net als de wandelgebieden langs de Schelde.
amenities: ["Hot water", "Fire extinguisher", "Long term stays allowed", "Kitchen", "Smoke alarm", "Shampoo", "Washer", "Hair dryer", "Hangers", "Iron", "Wifi", "Heating", "Essentials"]
host_about:
Optimistic and curious, resourceful and easygoing - these are my positive characteristics. And the negative? Hm, even when I am cranky I can find something to smile about. Crankiness in itself is kind of funny.

Anyway, I'm a Dutch artist living in Antwerp, Belgium. Made a career switch after a few years working as a copywriter and brand strategist in Amsterdam. I'm a trained writer. From study (Dutch language and literature) to work (copywriter) till now in my art works: I'm always busy with words. 

I've landed in Antwerp in 2015. Over five years already. I LOVE this city. It's gentle and creative, it's got great museums and the best coffeebars. I will leave you a list of recommendations. 

But above all, living in a place like The Beguinage (Het Begijnhof) is the best blessing ever. City center AND quiet. It's a beautiful medieval place with a sacred garden where old trees speek to you - if you listen very carefully...

I hope to see you soon and welcome you here in my mystic abode. 

Hannah

Oh last thing: I don’t smoke. Thank god. 
No pets allowed here, and it's a quiet place so not really suitable for children.

name: Spacious apartment at 'Den Dam' for two
description:
Spacious apartment in the city of Antwerp, appr. 3km away from the city centre (Groenplaats) . The perfect place for two people who'd like to discover Antwerp and stay in a hip and trendy neighbourhood.
It's only 3 minutes walking to Park Spoor Noord where in summer there's a pop-up bar and lots of chilling spots. Above all, the MAS is only 2km away from this amazing place.

The space
This apartment is on the third floor of the building, but there is an elevator to get you up easily. On the ground floor there's a very good sandwich bar for a quick snack or fruit juice.

We offer a FREE PARKING spot in the basement where you can park your car in all safety.

We don't allow animals for hygiene reasons nor smoking inside, but there is a terrace where you can.

For your comfort, there's a washing machine, dryer and ironing board with iron to your disposal. Moreover, there's a dish washer installed in the kitchen, free wifi all over

name: Charlie’s Loft (Bed and Breakfast)
description:
Volledige nieuwe luxe-loft op een toplocatie: gelegen in de centraal gelegen art-deco wijk van Antwerpen-zuid omringd door mooie boetiekjes, musea, leuke restaurants en café’s.
Openbaar vervoer voor de deur.
De loft kenmerkt zich door luxe, hygiëne en kwaliteitsvolle producten. Ontbijt beschikbaar in de loft of koffiebar. De bijhorende koffiebar werd uitgeroepen tot ‘Beste ontbijt-koffiebar van Vlaanderen 2014-2017’.

The space
De verhuurde ruimte is een volledige loft ter grootte van 92m2 waarvan 12m2 gezellig terras. De loft beschikt over een mooi afgewerkte keuken, een gezellig salon, aparte toilet, badkamer volledig in marmeren tegels en regendouche en open slaapkamer die wel afgezonderd wordt door een gangpad. De loft kenmerkt zich door enorm hoge grote ramen waardoor er zéér veel lichtinval is.
De hoge plafonds van meer dan 3.60m maken deze loft uniek voor dergelijke locatie.
De loft beschikt over wifi en televisie.

Guest

host_about:
Beste,
Ik ben Charlotte, uitbaatster van koffiebar Charlie's die ook gelegen is in dezelfde straat als de Bed and Breakfast.
Onze loft die te huur staat is gericht op kwaliteit, hygiëne, toplocatie, verwennerij en mogelijkheid tot een origineel en luxe ontbijt.
De prijsklasse ligt dan ook hoger dan een gewone kamer maar de unieke ervaring die je hierbij ervaart in deze prachtige loft proberen we dan ook te accentueren.
Ons team staat ook steeds ter uwe beschikking tijdens de openingsuren om jullie zo goed mogelijk te ontvangen. Bij late ontvangst kan u steeds binnen met een codeslot.

Lieve groetjes,
Charlotte

name: Simone's Kitchen B&B - Deluxe Double Room
description:
Simone's Kitchen Home Restaurant and B&B is a place to feel at home, where you can sleep well and eat organic balanced delicious home cooked meals.

Right in the centre of Antwerp, located in a quiet street, you will find a 100 year old house with renewed interior that contains a homely restaurant B&B, with home-style meals prepared by Simone, all healthy, balanced flavour journeys, friendly for everyone; environment and animal.

The space
Get a full-experience of this by coming to our B&B, where breakfast is served upon request dinner Wednesday through Saturday, and Sunday brunch is served from 10am-2pm.

The homely feel continues into our rooms, which are newly outfitted and refinished, with two beds which can be made up as singles (90 x 200cm), or as a double bed (180 x 200 cm), made up with 100% Egyptian cotton, 400 thread count bed linen, and an ensuite bathroom. Acoustic isolated floors, new sanitary, home feeling lighting, cradle to crad

name: Feel Home
description:
The apartment is located at the left bank of the river.

It is very easy to get to the center. You can go by tram or on foot.
Using the pedestrian tunnel to the center is a unique experience !
It takes a 10 minutes walk to the tunnel from the apartment.

One can easily take tram 3 for those who attend a concert or performance in the "Sportpaleis".

You will stay in a very cosy bedroom.
You will feel at home !

The space
A trendy cosy bedroom with a very comfortable Boxspring a stylisch miror and a modern white little table.

Guest access
The guests have acces to the kitchen and the garden.
When the hostess is at home, the guests are welcome in the livingroom.

description:
Most welcome to stay in our studio, located between the old centre of the city and 'het eilandje'. The studio is divided by a mezzanine floor, furnished with a double-sized bed, a sleeping couch, usable as of from 3 persons. A private bathroom and Wi-Fi are available. No kitchen incl.
The main shopping streets and fashion shops, tourist spots + a wide range of bars/restaurants are within walking distance. A 20' walk from the Central station and the Port House, 10' from the cathedral & the MAS.

The space
The studio its high ceilings are a remnant of the times when this building was used back in the time as a banana storage facility when they were unloaded from the boats in the nearby harbour.

Other things to note
- No kids under 16,
- No smoking allowed
- No pets allowed

name: Instaworthy view 2 | A location | peaceful | shops
description:
Beautifully renovated apartment on one of the main squares of Antwerp. Great location! Near the shopping streets. This area is famous for its weekend market. The apartment offers a stunning view towards the theater building. The historical center, the Rubens House, the Grote Markt, the Cathedral, the Botanical Garden and many more are all within a 5 minute walk from the apartment. Wine and dine just a few steps away. And for those who love a morning jog: the park is literally around the corner.

The space
You will have a nice living room, fully equipped kitchen, two separate bedrooms and nice bathroom with walk in shower for your use.

Both Saturday and Sunday there is a big market in front of the door.
Bars and restaurants, the main shopping street, the Rubens house and the Cathedral are all within a 5 min walk. And there is even the city park behind the corner.

This authentic charming house offers a great and hassle free way to discover Antwerp. You are free to use the curbside parkingplace in front of the house to park your car for the duration of your stay. From there you can easily enjoy Antwerp by foot or if you prefer by public transport which is just around the corner.

A comfortable and convenient getaway for families or couple's with two beautifully renovated bathrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a cosy outdoor patio and a spacious living and dining room. Go for a nice Belgian beer, a great meal in one of the many restaurants close by, discover animals in the Antwerp Zoo, visit chinatown or stroll towards the historic city centre.

name: Penthouse met uniek zicht op Antwerpen 15e etage
description:
Vanop deze zeer lichte penthouse op de 15de verdieping heb je een uniek zicht op Antwerpen en de ruime omgeving.
Ideaal voor als uitvalsbasis om Antwerpen te ontdekken. Op 10min ben je met het openbaar vervoer of de deelstep in het centrum.
Eveneens op 500m van Berchem station waar alle internationale en lokale treinen stoppen, zodat je niet met de auto hoeft te komen.

The space
Je beschikt over het volledige appartement van 90m2 met een terras van 80m2 in 3 windrichtingen (O-Z-W).
De woonkamer, zithoek en keuken zijn 1 open ruimte, dus je hebt een zeer ruimtelijk gevoel. De 3 dubbele schuifdeuren geven een zeer licht effect alsof in de lucht logeert.

Guest access
Alle ruimtes zijn vrij toegangelijk

Other things to note
Je moet wel 1 verdiep de trap nemen.
De lift gaat tot de 14de verdieping, de penthouse bevindt zich op de 15de verdieping

Leuke studio in een gerenoveerd herenhuis voor 2 personen naast Park Spoor Noord en op wandelafstand van het Sportpaleis. Zowel het historisch centrum als het hippe Eilandje zijn vlot bereikbaar te voet of met het openbaar vervoer. Ideaal om de stad te leren kennen!

Ideally situated in a quiet street in the middle of Zuid 'the place to be ', with the vibrant Marnix and Museum Square, with their trendy bars and restaurants, around the corner. Walking distance from the fashion district and the historic center.

name: Verblijf in uniek Antwerps Belle Epoque Herenhuis
description:
Bent U toe aan rust, schoonheid en authenticiteit? Reserveer dan zonder aarzelen uw verblijf bij Baron Osy en geniet in stijl. Niet alleen de uitzonderlijke architectuur van de buurt, maar ook de elegante ‘fin-de-siècle’ uitstraling van het pand, verlenen het huis een gevoel van rust. Vertoef in een omgeving die geschiedenis ademt.

Verkent u graag het bruisende stadsleven om dan ‘thuis’ te komen? Eenmaal voorbij de imposante hal, komt u tot rust in onze binnentuin.

description:
Dit comfortabele, gezellige huis met ruime tuin is gelegen in de unieke Unitas tuinwijk, naast het Boekenbergpark waar je kan genieten van het ecologische zwembad. Vlakbij is er openbaar vervoer naar het centrum van Antwerpen, en ook een Velo-station waar je zeer goedkoop een fiets kan huren. Parkeren is geen probleem, bovendien gesitueerd in de goedkoopste parkeerzone van Antwerpen: zondag gratis, dagticket 2€70. Je logeert in een groene rustige omgeving aan de rand van de stad Antwerpen.

The space
Het huis maakt deel uit van de Unitaswijk, een beschermd stadszicht.

gasten beschikken over het hele huis. Let op: slaapkamer 2 bevindt zich op de zolderverdieping en is toegankelijk via een trapladder.

name: Maison Emile - Executive Room
description:
A hospitable home in a new city! Put one step in our carefully renovated city house and experience the gentle calm of our warm home. Our classical, with modern elements, decoration, combined with smooth music will put your at ease from the moment you walk in. And of course, we will be ready to shake your hand and welcome you in person.

Other things to note
When staying at Maison Emile, you will find yourself amidst the trendy, artful part of Antwerp-South. Our hotel is situated in the centre of trendy bars, colourful shops and delicious restaurants, all waiting for you to discover. And your journey will start at Maison Emile

Modern and newly renovated apartment with lots of natural light in the center of Antwerp. Located close to the trendy neighbourhood 't Eilandje and walking distance from the heart of Antwerp, The Cathedral, Grote Markt, Groenplaats and the Meir.

name: The Wood Gallery
description:
Lovely, charming, spacious, green and magazine cover house in the middle of Antwerp.
Grocery store, bakery, railway station, restaurants, ... it’s all nearby!
Most things in this house are made of wood what creates a very calming atmosphere. There is a lot of space in the house and although you’re in the busy centre, we have spots where you don’t hear any noise! We have two separate terraces, with both a lot of green and plants. Very cosy and perfect to relax, have dinner, enjoy the sun, ...

The space
The woodhouse is the place to be! The location couldn’t be more practical and the interior is something special. There is a lot of space and you have many different options to make your stay valuable and adapted to your own preferences.

You can sit on a terrace to enjoy the calming silence of the city.

Rather crash in the sofa? No problem.

Relax taking a jacuzzi bath? Go on!

Need to get some work done? Goo

name: * Casa Amazing * with lovely garden

You’re very welcome in my cosy and modern groundfloor appartment! At the back of my flat I have a lovely garden. Outsider a have a dining table and a lounge set.

My place is just 1 minute walk from the metro and the Velo City bikes that brings you in 10-15 minutes to the city center.

You can park your car for the street. There is a large parking space at the end of my street.

name: STUDIO in the heart of Antwerp!
description:
You are staying in the centre of Antwerp, close to all the highlights. The old city centre, the famous Central Station, the cathedral, main shopping street 'Meir', the Zoo and many musea. Everything is at walking distance. And if you don't like walking, the main bus and tram station is just 200m away which connects you with everything Antwerp has to offer. You can always rent a bike, bike rental is 50m away. In short, the perfect place to explore and experience Antwerp!

The space
Industrial loft with a very comfortable and practical design to optimise your stay and sleep.

Guest access
You have access to the apartment on the 1st floor. Washing Machine and Dryer are available in the shared basement.

Other things to note
There are plenty of restaurants and bars nearby. We are in the center of Antwerp, remember. And the closest supermarket is literally across the street.

name: spacious & light private room in the heart of A
description:
spacious 20m2 room In my retro style apartment on 5 min walking distance of central station.

The space
If you are looking for a quiet home, I'd be happy to take you in. your spacious 20 m2 bedroom has a comfortable double bed, a reading nook, television with netflix and a mini fridge. There is also a small dining table with 2 chairs to enjoy your dinner. I'm not always in the apartment, so if you are lucky, you have my flat all to yourself.

the apartment itself is spacious (110 m2) and has a nice mix of vintage and new furniture. It is conveniently located in the heart of the city; a 5-minute walk from the central station. I live on the top floor of a 6 floor building, that holds a nice view. In front of the apartment, tram 24 brings you in 10 minutes to the historical old town.
During your stay you can also use other facilities like a washer and dryer. No need for bed linen or towels; everything is included. Bathroom and kitchen are fully eq

name: spacious 2 bedroom apartment in the heart of A
description:
spacious 105 m2 2 bedroom apartment in the heart of Antwerp, walking distance from Central station and city center.

The space
If you are looking for a quiet home, I'd be happy to offer you my cosy apartment.

The 105m2 apartment comes with a spacious living room with lots of light and plants :-)
There is a well- ecquipped kitchen and a convenient bathroom with bath/shower.

the apartment has one big bedroom (20m2) and one smaller bedroom (15m2), both equipped with 2 double beds.
the biggest bedroom holds a television and comes with free use of my netflix account. (which is also accessible trough the TV in the living room)

Guest access

name: New renovated studio perfectly located in Antwerp
description:
Hi! I'm Sander and I'm offering my studio in Antwerp for a nice stay. I won't be living there until November so I've prepared it to rent out on airbnb! I'm 24 years old, I speak English, Dutch, Spanish fluent and some French so feel free to reach out with any questions.

The location is perfect for people arriving in Antwerp by train (direct connection the airport) and everything there is to see in Antwerp is closeby (walkable). I think it is best suited for people traveling alone or couples.

The space

name: "Pagadder Flat"
description:
"Pagadder Flat"

This quiet, charming apartment (80 m2) is located in the historical city center just a few steps away from great restaurants and shops, the Cathedral and the “Grote Markt”.

The space
The apartment

The “Pagadder Flat”’ is a renovated, fully equipped and sunny apartment with fantastic view onto the “Pagadder Tower” and the backside of the beautiful historical 16th century guildhalls of the “Grote Markt”.

An elevator brings you to the 2nd floor (entrance, toilet, dinner/living room, kitchen). Inside the apartment are stairs to bedroom/bathroom and the attic room. The facility includes on the first floor a dining/living area with integrated and fully equipped kitchen, a toilet, a storage area. The bedroom on the second floor has an integrated bathroom with bath and shower, separate dressing. There is also an attic room. The apartment is located at the backside of the building so you're protected from urban noise.

Beleef het historische en diverse Antwerpen vanuit een stijlvolle fifties stadswoning. Het zonnige gelijkvloers kijkt uit op een ecologische siertuin. Rustig gelegen in hartje Antwerpen vlakbij het Centraal Station, de Zoo, Park Spoor Noord, het Sportpaleis, Lotto Arena en de Roma. Het historische centrum is op wandelafstand of bereikbaar per tram. Bijzonder geschikt voor zes personen mits bijhuren van kamer Rosalie Loveling (extra slaapkamer en badkamer). Ook geschikt voor langere verblijven.

- elektrische oven
- Nespressomachine met cups, thee, melkschu

host_about:
We are a family with three sons living in the center of Antwerp. We love our city life and its multicultural dynamics. We adore traveling and meeting people from all over the world. This love for diversity is the main reason why we started our bnb. We enjoy it when our guests have a good time, feel comfortable and at ease. We live in an original mansion from the fifties with a beautiful ecological garden. We completely renovated our ground floor into two separate bnb's, where the style and finishing level connect with the rest of the building. We hope to welcome you in our pleasant and soothing environment! 
Zouhra & Bernard

name: Green, bright apartment with amazing views
description:
Welcome in my green apartment, in a quiet area between parks: I'm renting my appartment because I like to meet new people and give you as a tourist a cheaper/more authentic way to explore the diamond city Antwerp.

I'm not always around: we can share the apartment or you can rent the apartment entirely - it depends on your preference and my agenda ;-)

You'll get a Belgian Beer (or a coffee with Belgian Chocolate) to give you a head start and a warm welcome!

The space
The apartment is entirely yours during your stay.

You can choose between 2 rooms:
- a double, kingsize waterbed
- a single bed (+ optional: an extra pull-out single beds)

Distance to city highlights:
Zurenborg - 2km
Zuid - 2km
Theaterplein - 2km
Meir - 2.5km
Cathedral - 3km
Eilandje - 4 km

Guest access
You can use every space - kitchen/bathroom/toilets/TV/...

host_about:
I like to Play in the snow, 
stick my hand in - 
now where did it go?

It might be mighty cold, 
but that's all part of 
not doin' what you're told.

Carpe Diem, I like to explore the world and other cultures but also enjoy exploring my own neighboorhood or new Books, music, Movies.

Horticulture is my passion, and I like to rent a room or my whole appartement when I'm gone to give people the opportunity to explore Antwerp in an authentic and cheaper way.

In twee minuten wandel je naar de Meir en andere winkelstraten, in vijf minuten ben je in het oude centrum. Café en winkel om boodschappen te doen, zijn om de hoek. Ideale ligging dus!

name: Luxurious Authentic Apartment
description:
Located in Antwerp South, near main roads and a huge free parking lot. Very accessible via public transport. The 135 square meters provides you with very light rooms: you look out on green both along the back and along the front of the mansion. As a result, there is no insight, which is a special feature in the city. This apartment on the 2nd floor is luxuriously furnished with Siemens appliances, rain shower, Miele washing machine, Auping box spring,...

The space
The apartment in this old mansion of 1892 was completely renovated while maintaining its authentic original features such as the marble fireplaces, the 45 square meters original parquet floor in living room and lounge, the wooden doors with glass and the cement tiles in kitchen and hallway. The terrace at the back gives way to spacious, beautiful and peaceful gardens of immense mansions that once housed the French and Congolese embassy. You can sit here on a bench; smoking is permitted here.

name: Green urban oasis on car-free courtyard
description:
Our house is located near the centre of Antwerp, in a busy multi-culti neighborhood, a ten min walk from the central train station. Shops, bakeries, restaurants, bars, and public transport are all within walking distance.
The house is on a car-free courtyard, and next to a hidden park. My friends tell me they feel like they're in nature when they're in my garden, it's so peaceful.
If you come with kids, be aware that the second bedroom has a steep staircase.
Ideal for four, possibly for more.

The space
There's lots of natural light, and hardwood floors in all the rooms and living space. The house was saved from demolition because someone went on a hunger strike, and it is now in the only original row of houses on the square. It was built towards the end of the 19th century, and continuously maintained and renovated.

Groot authentiek herenhuis met 7 slaapkamers en 2 badkamers. Elke kamer is naar een eigen thema ingericht (Bohemian, Zanzibar, La Roche, ...) Bedlinnen en handdoeken zijn inbegrepen. Het huis heeft nog alle orginele elementen van eind 19de eeuw, maar is voorzien van alle moderne gemak. Ideaal voor grote groepen die toch graag voldoende privacy hebben. Verschillende tram, bus en metrolijnen vlakbij (de Meir is slechts 10min veraf!). Het huis ligt ook op maar 15 min wandelen van het Sportpaleis.

The space
Zouden jij en je vrienden ook wel eens Sherlock Holmes willen spelen? Ben je fan van de Peaky Blinders-periode? Dan is dit herenhuis, dat dateert uit het einde vd 19de eeuw, echt iets voor jullie! Het huis heeft 7 slaapkamers met een tweepersoonsbed. In 2 van de kamers staat er een extra sofabed. Het huis biedt dus plaats voor 16 mensen. Er zijn 2 badkamers en 3 toiletten, een keuken en een zonovergoten terrasje.

Hoi, ik  ben Pim. Ik ben 24 jaar en woon in een klein dorpje (waar de Monniken hun eigen bier nog brouwen en de helft vd bevolking uit koeien bestaat) dichtbij Antwerpen.

Ik heb vorig jaar mijn eigen bedrijf opgestart (id recruitment sector), een hele uitdaging waardoor ik ineens gekatapulteerd ben in het 'volwassen leven', maar ik doe het ontzettend graag. 

Ik ben verzot op reizen. Ik kan even hard genieten van een weekendje London als van dagen met de rugzak gaan rondtrekken.  

Ik heb geen specifieke hobby (momenteel is mijn werk mijn hobby en mijn hobby mijn werk), maar 's avonds lees ik graag een boek en in het weekend ga ik graag met vrienden op café of een stapje in de wereld zetten.

name: Beautiful apartment in Antwerp city center!

Our apartment is registered with Toerisme Vlaanderen and is legally certified and compliant with local fire and safety regulations.

The space
Our apartment is located in an old Art Deco building near the KBC tower, a two minute walk from many attractions, bars and restaurants.
Each apartment in our building has either been renovated or modernized, depending on the owner's preference; we chose to keep the original feel of the apartment but modernize it.
There are hardwood floors, a spacious living and dining area, as well as larger than usual bedrooms. The bathroom contains a shower and a bathtub (as well as a toilet) and there is a separate toilet room at the front of the apartment.

Guest access
Guests have access to the entire apartment.

description:
Huize Amoras is een prachtig gerenoveerde vakantiewoning in het historische centrum van Antwerpen.
Ideaal voor grote gezinnen, kleine vriendengroepen, maar niet voor vrijgezellenfeesten!
Je logeert in een rustig straatje en toch op enkele stappen van: Vrijdagmarkt, groenplaats, Kloosterstraat, Modekwartier, shoppingstraten, Vogelmarkt, etc...
Centraler kan je niet verblijven in Antwerpen!
Rustige omgeving en fijne buren, absoluut niet geschikt voor feestjes en evenmenten!

The space
Huize Amoras is een oude beschermde stadswoning in 2018 gerenoveerd.
Huize amoras beschikt over een ruime keuken, living, 2 slaapkamers, 2 badkamers en een dakterras.

Guest access
Huize Amoras werkt met een toegangscode, gasten kunnen arriveren wanneer het hen schikt.

Other things to note
Wij vragen onze gasten om zelf badlinnen mee te brengen.
Huisdieren en roken ten strengste verboden.
