name: EXCLUSIVE LOFT IN ANTWERP
description:
Beautiful, open loft in the Park Spoor Noord district, with a lot of hotspots. The loft is a renovated former warehouse SAF building.

There are a lot of good restaurant in walking distance with meat as speciality however, the location of my loft is very quiet. Also on walking distance to the modern center of Het Eilandje, the riverside, museums, parks, yacht harbor, supermarkets, bakery and public transport.

name: Licht en ruim herenhuis Antwerpen-Zuid
description:
Huis in rustige straat vlakbij levendige, lekkere, gezellige restaurants en cafés. Goed bereikbaar met tram, bus, fiets, dichtbij op-en afrit autostrade. Vlakbij hypermoderne justitiepaleis en museum van Schone Kunsten.
Wijzelf doen bijna alles met de kinderen te voet of met de fiets, lukt perfect!

The space
De eerste verdieping bestaat uit een ruime keuken met een eettafeltje in de keuken, een grote eettafel in de woonkamer en een grote zetel in de living aan de straatkant.
De tweede verdieping beschikt over een bureauruimte met een zeer ruime badkamer met een inloopdouche en groot ligbad.
Op de hoogste verdieping zijn de drie slaapkamers gesitueerd met een toilet vlakbij.

Guest access
Buiten de gelijkvloerse verdieping, zijn alle verdiepingen beschikbaar voor huurders.

The space
100 square meters with a beautiful billiard table and baby foot. There is also an open patio for smokers or to relax.

Because the apartment is not inhabited, you won't find much attributes that makes it very personal. The charm of the apartment lays in it's freshly renovated style, at a top location!

Onze Guesthouse is gelegen in het hart van de wijk Zurenborg met zijn Dageraadplaats, the place to be, op 15' loopafstand van het centraal station. In de directe omgeving vind je voedingswinkels en vele hippe restaurants. Beste bakker om de hoek!
De Guesthouse is stijlvol, gezellig ingericht. Onze gasten kunnen genieten van volledige privacy, want ze hebben een compleet verdiep en tussenverdiep. Wij kennen de stad goed en doen dan ook graag leuke aanbevelingen! Wij verhuren min 2 nachten.

The space
Unieke romantische plek, met alle restaurateurs en het hart van Antwerpen vlakbij (10' te voet of tram op de hoek van de straat die brengt tot de grote markt van Antwerpen)
Sterrenrestaurant en vele trendy aanbevolen adresjes op 5' wandelafstand.

Vanuit de centrale ruime inkomshall, die gemeenschappelijk is, bewoon jij het complete 2e verdiep.

Als je een gastronomische lekker

Hi there I'm Tobias.

I'm born to a dutch father and brazilian mom and like to learn new languages and learn new cultures. I'm fluent in English, Dutch and Portuguese  and can speak a bit of french, spanish and german. Its nice that I can practice these languages some more while hosting!

name: nieuw appartement met uniek zicht op het park
description:
Na een drukke dag in Antwerpen is het goed thuiskomen in dit zonnige, nieuwe appartement met zijn prachtig uitzicht. Een beetje buiten het drukke centrum maar toch niet té ver van de stad. De leefruimte is ruim en licht. De slaapkamer is compact, maar het bed is comfortabel en extra groot.
Op het balkon zit je zo hoog boven de straat dat je er ongestoord kan eten of zonnen.
Je logeert hier op wandelafstand van het Sportpaleis en Lotto Arena.
You get up to 30 % off for long stays!

The space
Het appartement ligt op de derde verdieping van een klein nieuw gebouw op de hoek van een straat. Daardoor is de glaspartij aan de voorkant erg groot en biedt deze flat een panoramisch uitzicht over het park een uitzicht dat je op weinig andere plekken zal vinden. name: sunny one bedroom apartment at the riverside
description:
Sunny one bedroom partment in the south of Antwerp, on the first floor of a small apatment block. Located on the quay with a view of the Schelde and within walking distance of the historicalcenter. Close to lots of nice restaurants

The space
A few years ago I bought a house on the quay with a view of the Schelde.
The house is divided into 3 apartments. That was useful because at that time I had two daughters at home. The top apartment needs a lot of renovation and if everything goes well the works will start summer of 2019.
Meanwhile, the first floor apartment is already equipped with a new kitchen and a renovated bathroom.
My daughter went to live with her boyfriend a few weeks ago, so now I have available an apartment until the summer.
My experience with Airbnb is limited to using it until now. But I like receiving peolple and guiding them in Antwerp. Antwerp is a very nice city and there is always something to experince

You can find everything you need in the apartment to feel at home! The place is very close to different highways (E19), and it is easy to park in front of the building or in the streets around it for just 3,80 euro per day!!! There is so much to do around the apartment and we would love to help you get around!

The space

Meir n Groenplaats ligt op 05 -1 km van Antwerp old town triplex appartement. Antwerpen Centrum is een geweldige keuze voor reizigers die geïnteresseerd zijn in musea, winkelen en cafés.

Het appartement beschikt over een terras.
De keuken kijkt uit op de Grote Markt en Brabo een super appartement met een view!
Alles is aanwezig om van een top verblijf te genieten.
Geniet van de terrasjes, restaurants en vooral van het oude gedeelte van onze stad!

name: Antwerp Old town Apartment with a view!
description:
Antwerp old town apartment biedt een accommodatie aan met een aparte keuken in Antwerpen. Het appartement kijkt uit op De Grote Markt. De perfecte locatie om Uw bezoek in te plannen! De OLV Kathedraal op 50m, het MAS Museum op 1,3 km, Meir en Groenplaats op 05-1 km van de woonst.
Op het gelijkvloers is een gelateria :Compagnie Belge met de beste ijsjes van de stad!
Antwerpen Centrum is een geweldige keuze voor reizigers die geïnteresseerd zijn in musea, winkelen & cafés.
We spreken uw taal!

The space
We hebben voor het 2 persoons appartement gekozen om met frisse kleuren te werken.
Vanuit de zithoek kan je over de Grote Markt kijken. De ligging is subliem!
Het appartement bestaat uit living, keuken, zithoek /slaapkamer, 1 badkamer met gratis toiletartikelen en een apart toilet. Er is 1 flatscreen-tv's aanwezig.
Het appartement beschikt over een terras.

Gelieve te noteren dat er in Belg

description:
This beautifull, 125m² appartment has 3 spacious bedrooms, a terras and fully equiped kitchen. The building is from 1930 and is recently renovated with eye for detail and scandinavian touch. The high ceilings give a bright, modern feeling.
It is near all the highways, with a public parking in front of the appartment (1€/12h). Park Den Brandt is only 700m away, tram stops right in front of the appartment and rentbycycles (15min by bike to downtown Antwerp) are also on the corner.

Spacious, bright, modern apartment that has been completely renovated with a Scandinavian touch. Kitchen on original tile with gas stove and adjoining terrace. A large potted wardrobe in the hallway offers plenty of storage space. Sunny living space with a south orientation. Bathroom in mosaic tiles with walk-in shower and built-in cupboards. 3 spacious bedrooms with boxspring beds.

Guest access
Everything is accessible.

host_about:
HELLO 
My name is An.
I am 42  years old and live in Antwerp.
Living without being able to garden would not work for me. Growing my own vegetables, herbs and fruits is my healthy addiction. Cooking these fruit and veg another. When the Belgian weather doesn’t make a gardener happy and I have to stick indoors, you will find me reading endlessly. Mainly historical fiction novels, which I tend to spice with some scientific non-fiction.
I love to swim and run….and scan second-hand shops and flee markets. When I discover something lying in the streets or materials my neighbors or friend true out, I will confiscate them to turn them into something “NEW”. Maybe you can discover some of these lovely treasures when you visit my place.
I am looking forward meeting you.

name: Atmospheric and well equipped in calm neighborhood
description:
"Quietly located (new) apartment in a residential area. Within walking distance of the renowned Middelheim museum. The apartment is located in a very quiet one way street. Public transport and supermarkets nearby. Spacious, cozy living and dining area with hyper-equipped kitchen and cozy city garden. Free wifi, flat screen TV. Bedroom: 2 single beds + large wardrobe. Bathroom with shower, electric towel dryer, equipped with free toiletries and hairdryer."

The space
This house can also be rented out for a longer period to expats or candidates who only temporarily need a furnished house. Spacious closed bicycle shed available for placing your own bicycles.

name: Hidden cosy house in alley in central Antwerp
description:
This cosy house is hidden in the centre of antwerp, near central station. The private alley, the vintage kitchen and the nice bedroom, will make you feel welcome and at ease in Antwerpen city.

The space
The house is cosy and small with three floors. Ground level : living area and dining room, kitchen,toilet and garden First floor: master bedroom. Second floor: a double sofabed, shower, bath and toilet. I have a cat Raketje, who is very friendly, but goes in and out the house as he pleases. In the last pictures you will see the room. The room is closed by dark curtains to keep your privacy. The double bed is a sofa bed. The bathroomis next door.

Guest access
The upstairs room is closed with a curtain on a seperate floor. Outside the curtain, you will find the bathroom. There is an extra toilet on the ground floor. There you can also find the kitchen, which you can use but with respect for cleanliness.

name: Spacious house next to the zoo
description:
Our beautiful house is welcoming you for a visit to the great city of Antwerp. It's a very cosy place with lots of space and a fully equipped kitchen. In walking distance from the centre and in a very quiet neighborhood assuring you a good sleep. Our house is perfectly fit for families, offering 3 rooms with double beds and 1 children's room. Our neighborhood is also a very warm residential neighborhood, near by the zoo and nearby the station.

The space
Beautiful house built in 1920 style with lots of ornaments from that period. It has a garden with a terrace, 1 bathroom, a fully equiped kitchen, 4 bedrooms. The location is right behind the zoo of Antwerp very near to the ciry centre. Walking distance from the central station. It's a very quiet space in a very lively city, close to nice restaurants and bars, museums and shops to discover.

name: Antwerpen kamer  met grandioos uitzicht
description:
Een kamer met eigen badkamer en toilet en toegang tot grote terras. Ik woon zelf in het appartement. Veel licht en mooie zichten . Zeer goede verbinding met Antwerpen maximum 20 min. Bus stopt voor de deur .Tram of boot naar centrum. Mooie wandelingen en restaurants in onmiddellijke omgeving. Paradijs voor fietsers . Zomeractiviteiten: plage , open luchtzwembad met lage inkomprijs, wandeldijk, zomer bars , jachthaven . Gemakkelijke verbinding naar Lotto arena en sportpaleis.

The space
Lichte kamer met grote kast. Kamer ligt in een aparte nacht hal zodat geluid uit de woonkamer niet stoort. Heel veel stilte in de blok en buiten. Veel parkeer ruimte. Natuur in de directe omgeving. Antwerpen op een boogscheut.

Guest access
Bureau, living en keuken zijn toegankelijk voor de gasten

Other things to note
Ontbijt kan geserveerd worden indien het gewenst is. Dit aan €8 per persoon.

Enjoy real peace in the heart of the city.

You have the whole house to yourself.

There are 4 spacious bedrooms in the house and 2 bathrooms. All bedrooms can be darkened completely.

name: The House on Kleine Goddaard, great 4 large groups
description:
A Large but super cosy charismatic house smack in the Historical center of Antwerp (up to 20 people).
Great for families, large groups of friends, wedding groups etc (read party policy). Completely renovated, and really comfortable and clean. We will do all in our power to make your stay the best possible. You'll be surrounded by restaurants, bars. Clubs like Club Anvers & Cargo (Red & Blue) are a 5 minute walk away. There's a grocery store on the corner + a Velo bike station across the street

The space
Every room in the house has it's own flair. Some are double rooms, other rooms can host up to 6 people. There's a cosy breakfast room with a fridge, an extra large micro/oven, egg boilers, a toaster and of course a coffee machine and water boiler.
The luxury rooms have a private bathroom, 1 room has a private toilet and the other rooms share a clean bathroom on the top floor.

This is the listing for the whole house. You can rent the whole

host_about:
Hi there, I'm Erik. A makeup artist from the Netherlands who has been living in Antwerp for 20 years now. Antwerp is such a wonderful city to live and work, I’ll probably never leave.

Meanwhile, I opened a beautiful make up academy and shop right in the historic city center right underneath this beautiful completely renovated complex where I also live. 

So ladies, if you want to make Antwerp unsafe for a weekend, you can go downstairs for a beautiful make-up! ;) and guys! If you go with your girlfriend or wife... Surprise them with a nice make-over before you go out. You ‘d never score points so easily! Haha :)) 

We will always help you with tips for the best places to visit and eat in Antwerp and there is always a  little surprise waiting for you when you check in.

the rooms are warm and cozy .. some large, some smaller, but all very charming and completely renovated.

As a makeup artist, hygiene is incredibly important to me and the rooms will be dust free and anti allergic, bathrooms will always be clean and the bedding freshly washed.

I hope to meet you soon!
Erik

Hi there, I'm Erik. A makeup artist from the Netherlands who has been living in Antwerp for 20 years now. Antwerp is such a wonderful city to live and work, I’ll probably never leave.

Meanwhile, I opened a beautiful make up academy and shop right in the historic city center right underneath this beautiful completely renovated complex where I also live. 

So ladies, if you want to make Antwerp unsafe for a weekend, you can go downstairs for a beautiful make-up! ;) and guys! If you go with your girlfriend or wife... Surprise them with a nice make-over before you go out. You ‘d never score points so easily! Haha :)) 

We will always help you with tips for the best places to visit and eat in Antwerp and there is always a  little surprise waiting for you when you check in.

the rooms are warm and cozy .. some large, some smaller, but all very charming and completely renovated.

As a makeup artist, hygiene is incredibly important to me and the rooms will be dust free and anti allergic, bathrooms will always be clean and the bedding freshly washed.

I hope to meet you soon!
Erik

name: The Loft, Spacious Charming Loft Historical Center

A very warm & cosy but also large room (up to 6 guests) with shared bathroom in the best part of Antwerp with new mattresses and luxurious bed covers. It is a great family or friends room. perfect for people that want to stay in the center of Antwerp in a newly renovated, very clean and affordable house. There's nice cafes, breakfast/lunch rooms, great restaurants and really nice shops In the street itself. + Pretty much all Nightlife of Antwerp is just around every corner.

The space
This really charming and very spacious room in the top of the building is on the same level as the Rooftop Terrace (great for smokers, as they can go outside for a smoke) and on the same level as the shared coffee & Tearoom / bathroom.

The bathroom is shared by a maximum of 4 extra people - the toilet only by a maximum of 2 extra people.

There are new mattresses and new luxurious bed covers.

name: Private apartment near parc - B&B InterMezzo
description:
BnB Intermezzo biedt een volledig gerenoveerd benedenappartement met eigen ingang en privé badkamer. Veggie of vegan gasten serveren we een aangepast ontbijt.
We zijn gelegen nabij Antwerpen op het gelijkvloers van een statig herenhuis van 1913 en vlakbij het park Rivierenhof .
Voor zowel korte periodes als voor zakenverblijven kan u bij ons terecht.
WIFI is gratis. Uitgebreid ontbijten kan voor 7,00 pppn.
Koffie- en theefaciliteiten worden gratis aangeboden evenals een welkomstdrink.

The space
We verhuren 1 ruim appartement met statige slaapkamer en suite met een kingsize bed (200x180) voor 1 of 2 personen en de mogelijkheid om van de sofa een comfortabel bed voor 1 of 2 personen te maken.
U kan privatief gebruik maken van de gehele benedenverdieping om rustig te ontbijten, te relaxen in de zithoek of in de stads(zuid)tuin.
Bij goed weer wordt het ontbijt buiten geserveerd.
Voor zakenmensen is er voldoende werkruimte,

name: Comfortable, relaxing and with a personal touch
description:
You are a guest in a creative and active family with three teenage children and three cats. The guest room is located on the ground floor of our home. You enjoy comfort and privacy in a homely atmosphere.
You will also find a cozy sitting area in the studio next to the guest room where, in the winter, the pellet stove burns attractively. In the morning you can use our breakfast service here. But you will also find all the practical necessities to prepare something yourself.

The space
The guest room is tastefully decorated with wooden furniture and here and there a funny detail such as a strip of retro wallpaper or a colorful shell garland.
Double bed, flat screen, internet, coffee and tea are available in the room. Our guests have their own separate private bathroom with shower, sink and toilet.

Guest access
As a guest you have access to the entire ground floor of the house.

name: Antwerp Historic Centre at Vrijdagmarkt (C2)
description:
Toerisme Vlaanderen LICENSE: 384199 BnBAntwerp.com

Address: Vrijdagmarkt 18 Antwerp - at 2nd floor

In the middle of the historic city, near Groenplaats, our famous Cathedral, Market square, fashion district, Kloosterstraat (antiques), restaurants and local pubs.

A fully decorated apartment with 1 separate bedroom, well equipped kitchen, bathroom with walk-in shower, separate toilet, cosy livingroom with TV...
Terrace at the back-side.

Public parking Brabo or Groenplaats at 100 m.

The space
The apartment is located at the 'Vrijdagmarkt'; a folksy and very cosy local square with terraces. A little gem not discovered by tourist...

We offer free coffee and tea.

You look at the Plantin Moretus museum - world heritage!

All restaurants, local bars and shops at your fingertips!

Guest access
Guests will receive the keys to the complete apartment.

Other

name: STUDIO  DAYLIGHT,located in the diamond district
description:
Welcome to enjoy the beautiful view this studio offers on the park of Antwerp!

The space
This central situated studio,who has been totally renovated in 2018/2019,has a fully eguipped kitchen.
On the balcony you can breath the vibes that Antwerp offers.A fresh shower or bath and there you are ready to visit the city! I am sure you will totally relax in the cozy bed that’s foreseen in this one room studio.Sunset or sunrise view from the double bed (max.2pers.)is the best way to start or to end the day with!

host_about:
Welcome to SLEEPINNBNB Antwerp!

We are here to offer tourists/locals all-inclusive apartments on one of the best locations in Antwerp to explore the city.

Whether you're in Antwerp alone, as a couple or a family, our accomodations have all the necessary you need for both long and shortterm rentals.

All of our apartments are recently renovated and decorated with passion and style. We are located on the Theaterplein, with an amazing view over the city.

You won't have to worry about taxi fares, there are plenty of busses and trams to explore the city also we are just in walking distance of the central station.

 If you are coming by car you can hire a parking spot for your car safely at our private garage closeby the apartments.

SUNNY SIDE UP!
Welcome to the world of wonder by Lot and Bert!
This eclectically decorated AIRB&B is located in the immediate environment of Antwerp City.

Apartment on the ground floor with apart sleeping room, living room, kitchen, bathroom with shower and toilet, and a smal terras.
It located at 5 minutes by foot from the Central Stadion, in an area where food shops and small restaurants are open thill late in the night. Easy to reach, and 2 minutes walk for the tram station that brings you to the Central Station ,or on the new part of the city.
I leave in the building

The space
Appartement is situated in an area where food shops, as wel as smal restaurants are open thil late in the evening.
Apartament is recently renovated , . From the kitchen you can go outside on the terras . Terras has a roof protection in CAse that rains tha you do not have to go directly inside. Building is a small building and every Floor had only one appartment . I leave in the building.

Guest access

name: Antwerp city centre - 16th century house
description:
Situated in the historic centre of Antwerp. The house dates back to the 16th century and is full of character. Located near to restaurants, pubs, museums and pubs. Especially the museum of fashion and all the fashion industry is in the vicinity.
The street itself is very calm and quiet.
Price per night for 1 guest is €40 and for two guests €60.

The space
The place is full of character. The guests van enjoy their room, the bathroom, can make use of the kitchen and the dining room.

Other things to note
The entire Antwerp city centre is a low emission zone. Those who intend to come by car should check if their car is allowed to enter the LEZ (please check on https://lez.antwerpen.be/?Taal=EN).

name: Great apartment, top location in historical center
description:
Welcome to our apartment in the historic city center of beautiful Antwerp.
The location is in Antwerp's student area, perfect in the middle between the "Grote markt" and the "Meir" - highstreet shopping.
The apartment is on the third floor and rustic decorated. It's a 55m2, one bedroom apartment, with an equipped kitchen, one bathroom with toilet and shower and a little balcony to enjoy the city!

The space
The building is a restored neoclassical townhouse and originates from around 1830. The entrance is original with the old tiles and big oak stairway.

The apartment is on the third floor and rustic decorated. It's a 55m2, one bedroom apartment, with a fully equipped kitchen, one bathroom (with toilet, shower and washing machine) and a little balcony to enjoy the city!
The apartment is refreshed in June 2019 with small renovations, new paint, new bedding/towels and a beautifull new retro design sofa.

host_about:
Hi, I'm Paul. 
Born in 1975, married to Maud and  with a young daughter. We are original Dutch, but we live in Belgium for 10-15 years now.  I'm working as a contracts manager for Stork (a Fluor company) and my wife works in the hospitality business in Antwerp. 
We live in the Belgium countryside close to the Dutch border, but used to live downtown and hence we kept our love for Antwerp. 
In 2019 we got the opportunity to buy a beautiful little property in one of the best area's in Antwerp, which we would like to share with you. In our apartment we brought the rustic atmosphere of our home to the beautiful city of Antwerp. 
Very pleased to meet you!

name: Trendy white duplex apartment in the city centre
description:
An attractively furnished Duplex apartment, underneath the roof.
The attic duplex apartment is located in a central and upcoming part of Antwerp, very close to everything you need for a good stay. It's 5 minutes walking to the Meir, the biggest shopping street in Antwerp. 5 minute walk to the Central Station.
Ideal for a short as well as a long-term stay.

The space
The duplex apartment is furnished with a double bed, a dining/work High table, free WiFi, private toilet and private bathroom with rain shower.
The duplex has a fully equipped kitchen, an electric water kettle for coffee/tea. There is a fridge and oven. Bed linen and towels are included.

name: Trendy Art Nouveau apartment near station & centre
description:
Attractively furnished apartment in a trendy & popular district of Antwerp. It is located near the centre and only a 10 minute walk away from the Central Station as well as Station Antwerpen-Berchem. This part of Antwerp is known for its two vibrant squares, the Dageraadplaats and the Draakplaats, locating the best and most charming Restaurants and bars. Very close to the city center and everything you need for a good stay! Great public transport connections & Antwerp Velo docking stations.

The space
Je hebt in dit prachtige authentieke herenhuis temidden in de mooiste buurt van Antwerpen, Zurenborg, de ideale plek om Antwerpen te ontdekken.

De vele trendy en leuke terrasjes en restaurantjes in de buurt geven de extra touch aan deze locatie.

The space

You have your own entrance

description:
Welcome to this stylish and cosy flat, a fifteen minutes walk from Antwerp Central Station, with public traffic around the corner. The flat is quiet and there's bars and brunch opportunities just around the corner at the same time. You don't hear the loudness of the tourists in the city center, but will be at a walking distance from the center (25') too.
Trix, Lotto Arena and Sportpaleis are also on a 15 minutes walk. It makes the flat an ideal starting point for a music concert.

The space
The room is calm and clean and the bed and matrass are high quality based and new since April 2021. Also: some guest posted that it was too light in the room, but in the meanwhile, I have changed the curtains (those on the pictures are old ones), so it is much darker now.

Being an old couchsurfer, I will be happy to provide you with any information you need if I am available. Be my guest and have a great time!

I live on the 5th floor. At the front I have a large window so in the living room there is a lot of light. I still enjoy the beautiful sunsets. At he back you have a view of the museum of fine arts.
I have an non smoking rule inside. You can use the balcony if you don't want to go outside :).

description:
Beautiful appartement in the heart of Antwerp. Very quiet street. The appartement is on the first floor (no elevator) and has a lovely view. Located in the historical city center this is a perfect base to explore the city by foot, bike or public transport.

The space
Cozy appartement on the first floor consisting of a light and spacious living room with open kitchen, a bedroom and a bathroom with shower and toilet.

Guest access
The apartment consists of a big living are with kitchenette, a bedroom and a bathroom.

Other things to note
The ground level of the building is a bit neglected. In a couple of months we will start renovating the whole building so that's why it is not very appealing at the moment. The appartement itself is very clean and cozy though!

host_about: Ik ben geboren en getogen in Antwerpen. Ik ben werkzaam in de Horeca (heb enkele jaren mijn eigen muziekcafé uitgebaat) en de cultuursector (Bourlaschouwburg). name: Penthouse of medieval home with rooftop terrace
description:
Beautifully renovated, light apartment on the 2nd floor of an authentic medieval house in the pedestrian city-center of Antwerp. The perfect place to unwind with a beer or glass of wine on the rooftop-terrace, to explore the lively city-center or to eat & drink in the many surrounding restaurants and cafes. The owners' recommendations make this hopefully an unforgettable stay.

The space
Open-plan apartment with kitchen, sitting area and comfortable queen-size bed. Bathroom with shower and separate toilet. Mezzanine with 2 single beds, leading towards rooftop terrace. Abundance of board-games to enjoy.

By car there are quick connections to the E17 (direction Ghent/Bruges), E19 and A12 (direction Brussels) and the Antwerp Ring Road (direction Breda/Liège). There is a large and free parking area at walking distance from the apartment.

name: Spacious apartment with garden, South of Antwerp
description:
Guest access
* Public transport: To get to the apartment from the Central Station, you can take the metro. You can choose:
- metro 6: direction Olympiade  (stops: Diamant Metro - Plantin Metro - Lange Leemstraat - Harmonie – Provinciehuis and get off at the stop Antwerpen Markgravelei). 
- metro 2: direction Hoboken (stops: Diamant Metro - Plantin Metro - Lange Leemstraat - Harmonie – Provinciehuis and get off at stop Antwerpen Markgravelei).

From the stop Markgravelei it’s a 343m walk to the apartment.

* • Parking your car in the street costs about 5€ per 24h, except on Sundays (free). Or you can park for free on the square, at the end of the street (6min walk).

Enorm exclusief en prachtig groot luxe appartement in oud theater te midden het Schipperskwartier hartje Antwerpen ! De foto’s zijn twee jaar oud, het is veel mooier op dit moment zeggen alle gasten.

The space
Het is mijn meest favoriete plek op aarde, rustige straat zonder auto’s in het midden van het oude Schipperskwartier ! Super lieve buren en op 5” van het centrum en de grote markt.

Op 1 minuut van het eilandje en de jachthaven alsook de Schelde. Massa’s restaurants cultuur en vrije tijdsbesteding in de buurt !

Very bright 140m2 loft in the centre of Antwerp.

The bedroom, bathroom and dressing are designed as a compact glass volume in order to give the living room/kitchen a very open feeling.

Zeer lichte zithoek, slaapgedeelte en eigen badkamer. Er is geen ingerichte keuken, maar wel een koelkast, microgolf en waterkoker voor koffie of thee. Inkom en traphal is gezamenlijk. name: Unieke woning in het historisch stadscentrum

Karaktervolle stadswoning in oud Antwerpen. Deze eeuwenoude woning is met moderne accenten uniek gerenoveerd. Ideaal voor het verblijf van een vrienden- of vriendinnengroep. Vanuit de woning sta je op enkele minuten wandelen bij de Grote Markt, de kathedraal of het MAS. De woning is super rustig gelegen aan een idyllisch stadspleintje, en maakt van je verblijf in Antwerpen een bijzondere ervaring! Opgelet, dit is geen partyhouse, hou rekenig met de buren, geen geluidsoverlast 's nachts!

The space

This house is ideal for rentals for couples, singles, expats and business travellers.
Parking, high speed Wifi, cable TV. Located at 5k from the city center, with excellent connections to the Central Train Station and highway connections to Brussels, Ghent, Rotterdam, …

Rent for minimum period of 30d.

Very safe area, central and quiet.

Fully equipped, you will only need to bring your suitcase and a smile 😉

The space
- The house is 206m² in total – installed with solar power panels
- Two bedrooms with queen size luxury double bed (26 & 15m²)
- One bedroom with single bed (7m²)
- 80m² garden
- Sunny wooden deck (terrace) at the back of the house (South side = sunny!)
- Private Parking spot in front of house, so no need to driver around 15 min to find one.
- Bathroom with bathtub with shower cover, towels

name: Lovely, central app w/ a sunny terrace, incl bike!
description:
Our apartment is located about 7’ from central station in a lovely street. We are right around the corner of some hidden gems in Borgerhout (Plaza Real, Cafe Mombasa, Bar Leon, to name a few). And a 5’ walk to the tram which takes you into the city in less than 10 minutes. Bikes are also available!

The space
The apartment has a bright living room with a bunch of records and a record player for you to enjoy. A tv with all the channels and Netflix, a big dining table. The kitchen has all things needed for you to make meals. There’s a small bathroom with shower, a big bedroom with a queensize bed and - the best thing: a big sunny terrace at the back!

Guest access
The whole apartment would be available to you!

name: Bright apartment in Antwerp on Dageraadplaats
description:
We welcome you in our lovely apartment in Antwerp in one of the most cosy neighbourhoods of the city. It's an apartment located on the square Dageraadplaats where are many restaurant and cafes. There is also a grocery store that you can reach by foot in less than 10min. You can reach the old city center by bike (10min), by tram (14min) or by foot (25min). A very nice place to stay and to explore Antwerp city!

The space
The apartment is on the second floor of a big house. Our co-housers live on the first floor but you will have all the privacy you need, you will probably never even see them :). On the ground floor there is a delicious Hummus lunchbar/restaurant that is operated by our co-housers. So you don't have to go far to get a nice meal! They have a beautiful hidden terrace that is very nice to sit during the summer.
On the second floor you can find the spacious living room with dining room and a fully equipped kitchen. You can see the square and beauti

name: Spacious room next to central station of Antwerp
description:
This bedroom apartment has everything you need for your Antwerp stay. The unit comes with a kitchen, bathroom, spacious living room, parking, laptop-friendly workspace, smart TV compatible with your favourite Netflix series.

Our Airbnb is within walking distance to several popular shops such as "Colruyt, Delhaize, Lidl, Aldi", including nature parks with scenic view, easy tram routes to travel and get back home easily.

It's an ideal base to explore Antwerp and to begin your journey.

The space
The flat is very quiet spacious, has no direct neighbours so you do not have to be too concerned about being a bit louder as long as it remains within reason.

Guest access
There is a communal kitchen space available in the flat with a coffee machine, microwave & a basic set of cooking appliances. A washing machine & dryer is also available for general use. The living room shared and its spacious with a lot of walking space.

name: Hartje Antwerpen, stijlvol en gezellig
description:
Appartement vlakbij de kathedraal, de hotspot voor toeristen, waar werkelijk alles aan je voeten ligt. Open de ramen van de woonkamer en je voelt je in het midden van het levendige en bruisende Antwerpen. Je kan alles makkelijk te voet bezoeken.
Als je iemand bent die graag lekker eet en drinkt, de wereldkeuken in de directe omgeving; voor Belgisch eten, gewoon de trappen aflopen en je kunt dineren in de ‘Pottekijker’.

The space
Je moet je geen zorgen maken voor teveel lawaai van buiten; met de ramen dicht zit je in de stilte van de woonkamer en de slaapkamer bevindt zich achteraan. Het restaurant beneden sluit normaal om 10u ’s avonds.
Het is perfect voor een stel, een jong kind kan ook op de bank (1.6m) slapen.

description:
This sunny and spacious apartment on the 3th floor offers everything for a comfy stay in Antwerp with or without children. Located on the lively and vibrant South, there are lots of trendy cafés, coffee and brunch bars and restaurants within walking distance.
A tram stop right in front of the apartment takes you into the city center both ends.

The space
The apartment is a hidden pearl in the city! You will be amazed by the brightness of the place and cosy atmosphere. The main area includes a kitchen with a modern touch, a dining table for 6 people, a large comfy couch and a flatscreen tv. The apartment has a Sonos System (accessible by Sonos app) giving the guests the availability to play music in the apartment and Netflix available on the tv. When making a turn to the right the guests will see three bedrooms, two of which have a streetview. Two of the bedrooms include king-sized beds and one bedroom has a queen-sized bed. name: Charming and spacious apartment with sunny terrace
description:
Charming and spacious apartment with sunny terrace in a lively neighborhood, near the central station.

The space
The apartment is on the first floor, accessible by a long straight staircase. You then enter through a hallway that gives access to the kitchen and living areas. The kitchen and dining room both have a view of the terrace, and are therefore very light spaces. Through the kitchen you enter the terrace, which is not enclosed but very open and casts a glance at a landscape of typical Flemish back-building. The terrace also borders our back house, where we store our private belongings when we have visitors. The bqq around the corner is however available! There is a gas fire in the kitchen and we have a small but very capable oven! As well as a microwave. There is a fridge with freezer compartment, and there is a washing machine that you can use. name: gelijkvloersappartement met tuin in rustige straat
description:
Gelijkvloersappartement met tuin. Heerlijk zitten op het terras. Gelegen in een heel rustige straat, vlak bij tram- en bushalte, 15 minuten van het oude stadscentrum. 20 minuten wandelen van het Middelheimmuseum, Brand en Vogelzang/Nachtegalenpark.

The space
Heerlijke tuin met terras. Woonkamer met tafel voor 8 personen, hangmat (kan ook buiten op het terras) en futonbed voor 2 personen. Badkamer met wc, lavabo, zitbad/douche. Ingerichte keuken met voldoende materiaal gasfornuis en grote koelkast, bergruimte met wasmachine.

name: Spacious & modern apartment in Antwerp's centre
description:
Beautiful, brand new apartment on the first floor (with elevator) with a stunning view and a lot of natural light located in Antwerp's city centre. Just a 2 minute walk to the Meir (shopping street), a public park, cosy bars and restaurants,... I wrote my favourite places down for you to go and explore.

You can park your car in 'Parking Horta' (Hopland 24, Antwerp - 4 min walk) for 10,00€ a day.

Hope to welcome you soon!

The space
You have the whole apartment and the stunning view for yourself.

My home has two bedrooms with each their own bathroom (one shower - one bath).
One of the bedrooms has a sleeping sofa for two people. Plus there is a guest toilet!
There is also a laundry machine, dryer, ironing board and iron available for those who are staying for a long period of time.

These apartments are connected to each other by a steep spiral staircase. There are three bedrooms, three living spaces, three kitchens and three bathrooms in total, spread over 5 floors. name: Spacious bright appartement with harbour view.
description:
A spacious bright appartement in the upcoming Cadix area. Located right next to het Eilandje, it is easy to borrow the typical city bikes down the road and explore Antwerp from there. The large fully equipped open kitchen and balcony give you a relaxing place to come home to after a day of exploring and a place to enjoy a nice sunny breakfast.
There is a supermarket at walking distance that is open every day ofcthr week from 8:00 untill 20:00.

The space
The master bedroom with adjacent bathroom is equipped with a large wardrobe. The bathtub will surely help you relax. If a quick shower is what you prefer, you can enjoy the rainshower in the second bathroom. Two toilets are available, one in the bathroom and one in the hallway. There is a laundry space where you will find a washing machine and dryer.
The kitchen is fully equipped.

name: City trip Antwerp - Summer in Belgium
description:
Private apartment in a quiet residential building with lift. Lots of space and light. This apartment is available when I am not present myself. This way you can safely stay in your own bubble. Please check in advance to ensure you can stay alone. Easily accessible by car, train, tram and bus. A swimming pool and fitness center are at walking distance.

The space
Quiet area. Buses and trams within walking distance (14 min. by tram to the central station). City bike pick up location across the street. Free parking around the corner.

Guest access
You have a bedroom with two single beds, a bathroom, separate toilet, kitchen, living room and two terraces with sun in the morning and late afternoon.

Other things to note
Third floor with elevator. The elevator will be out of order from 21/09/2021 untill 05/10/2021

The whole apartment is a non smoking area.

name: Flat with  2 terraces, 400m Central station
description:
This is a small loft/large studio (70m2) with terraces (also 70m2). It is the top floor of a 4floor building, you have the skyline to enjoy north and south. Central station is a 8min walk (400m). There are plants to take care of. I take care of you via a Weber BBQ, shower, washing machine, dishwasher, WIFI and you can use a bicycle. My library offers world literature and items on gastronomy and wine :-)

The space
Bright and sunny, quiet and with great views, at 400m from Antwerp Central station. The massive wooden floor is a joy and the absence of a tv is great. This treasure is ideal to work, rest, chill and plan further steps and travels. There is WIFI.

Spacious bedroom with walk-in closet.

description:
Enjoy this cosy and authentic appartement in the heart of Antwerp.
In a bustling neighbourhood full of shops, restaurants, cafés and magnificent sightseeing you will find yourself ideally situated in our appartement.

We offer 2 spacious rooms. 1 with 2 single beds and 1 with a double bed and a bunk bed. In case of 8 people we also have a double sleeping couch.
All mattressess are new and linens are hotel quality.
In case of 8 people please contact us to provide you with all necessities.

The space
Appartement located in the back of a city garden. Big spacious and light living room, 2 spacious bedrooms.

Guest access
The appartement is fully yours. Parking is rather difficult and expensive in Antwerp so we suggest you take public transportation to get to us. PLease check the website visitantwerpen for the most up-to-date information.

name: Cosy Apartment close to Antwerp Central Station
description:
Cozy and modern apartment, full of natural light.
It is located at the top floor (3rd) of a recently renovated building, only 5' walk from the Central Station.

Perfectly situated to explore the city of Antwerp either by foot or by public transport.

The space
A fully equipped apartment close to the center of Antwerp. It has a cozy bedroom -- perfect to rest after a long day, a fully operational kitchen with all necessary appliances to make coffee & cook including a dishwasher and a TV connected to Netflix, YouTube etc.

This apartment is the one I live in when in Antwerp. I live between Belgium and Greece, and it felt like a nice opportunity to share my apartment when I am not here.

That means that since this space is mine, it is also made full of love. I am a jewelry designer with a soft spot for interiors, so I've put my heart into creating a cozy space for me and now for you too!

Located in Antwerp, near Plantin-Moretus Museum, Groenplaats Antwerp and Rubenshuis, Daily Apartments - Antwerp City features free WiFi.

All of the units feature a private bathroom, flat-screen TV and fully-equipped kitchen.

Cathedral of Our Lady is 1.8 km from the apartment, while Meir is 2.1 km away. The nearest airport is Antwerp International Airport, 6 km from Daily Apartments - Antwerp City.

name: Charmante woning met privé tuin
description:
Een charmante woning met privé tuin!

Je verblijft in een moderne, praktische dublex met ingerichte keuken die zich bevindt op gelijkvloers met vaatwasser, inductie ,microgolf , waterkoker , koffieapparaat , frigo en nodige materialen om te koken . Op gelijkvloer is er nog een teras gedeelte waar je nog kan eten met het Gezicht naar de tuin toe .Er is nog een badkamer met 1 bad , 2 lavabo, regendouche op eerste verdiep en nog een slaapkamer met 1 lege kast .
Plaatst voor 2 mensen en mss1 kind .

The space
Woning en tuin

Other things to note
Aub schoenen uitdoen en de woning netjes verlaten zoals u had ontvangen .

name: industrial nightlife loft
description:
cozy, industrial loft styled open duplex with two bedrooms, bathroom, separate guest toilet and laundry room and a small terras. Located at Groenplaats (main subway halt) know for its restaurants and bars in the center of the city, 10' from the station, The kitchen is the place to be, its island allows you to cook while enjoying each others company over some drinks before starting your dinner.

The space
you will be located in the heart of the city right in the middle of the most famous shopping streets, this means that during daytime the street is crowed with shoppers but at night it is very quiet

Other things to note
Contact me via WhatsApp a day in advance of your arrival so that we can arrange for the keys, we r super flexible but are both running busy lives so best to find a solution prior of you making your travel plans. We will find a solution that works for both of us!

name: Single guest room in charming appartment @ Berchem
description:
The apartment is on the first floor and has lots of sunlight. There is a launchy livingroom en fully equiped kitchen that you can use. The bathroom is shared and you have to pass trough my room in order to enter the bathroom but you will be able to shower in a complete relaxed and private way. The bathroom has a rainshower and a bath to relax in after a busy day discovering Antwerp.

I like to keep the house clean so you will always find a very clean room and house.

The space
You have access to the whole apartment, except for 1 room. There are personal items in it. The rest is totally at your disposal.

I like to make sure you have a pleasant stay. Therefore, I am happy to share all accomodations, and I will gladly show you around and give you some valuable pointers to start discovering Oud-Berchem, an authentic and colorful neighborhood.

name: Apartment near Sportpaleis/Lotto Arena
description:
It's a small, cosy apartment, located in Merksem. It was completely restored in 2012, so you can say it's modern. You'll sleep in the master bedroom, which is not on the street side (and thus quiet). I normally stay/sleep in the guests bedroom, but if needed, we can agree on me not being there. In that case I'll only pass by at night to feed the cats.

Guest access
There's a small reading corner, a living room, dining room and a kitchen. This is all in one open space. Then in the hallway there's the bathroom (first door on your left) with a walk-in shower, the second door on your left is the small bedroom and ahead of you is the master bedroom. There's also a small terrace. In April 2020 air conditioning has been installed in the kitchen and the master bedroom.

Other things to note
- I have two cats.
- I'm located on the 3rd floor and there's no elevator.

name: Sleeping on the Leftbank of Antwerp
description:
Je kan hier overnachten op de Linkeroever van de Schelde, de groene long van Antwerpen. De oude stad is binnen handbereik. Wij zijn ook vlot bereikbaar met auto en er is voldoende gratis parkeergelegenheid. Je kan hier mooie avondwandelingen maken met zicht op de skyline van Antwerpen. Alle troeven binnen handbereik. Indien je met de auto komt dien je je wagen te registreren voor de Lage Emmissie Zone.

The space
Er is een hond aanwezig.

Guest access
Als u met de auto naar Vlaanderen komt dient u uw auto te registreren op volgende site. slimnaarantwerpen.be Voor het gebouw is er genoeg gratis parkeermogelijkheid.

name: Entire Floor with 2 bedrooms and private bathroom
description:
The accommodation is located in a quiet neighbourhood close to the trendy Antwerp south, with train-bus-tram connections nearby. It consists of 3 spacious rooms and a private bathroom. An entire floor for your own privacy.

The space
Room 1 is a cozy sitting area with a comfortable sofa. The adjoining room has a double bed. The third room also offers a double bed. It has an ensuite bathroom with a large shower, toilet and sink.
Lovely smelling shampoo, soap and bodywash is provided. You can also enjoy tea or coffee in the morning.
The rooms are spacious and light, the windows give out to our garden and a beautiful oak tree in our neighbours garden.

We can also provide a baby cot and other baby care things if necessary.

name: At home in Antwerp !
description:
Welcome to Studio Minerva!

It is a home away from home for people who want to stay in Antwerp for a week or more for professional reasons or simply to explore the city. This loft is located in a historical building with connections to the belgian car maker Minerva, hence the name.
Excellent location to get in and out of the city. Quiet and green neighborhood.

The space
The serviced studio consists of 3 rooms: a bedroom with double bed, sitting area and writing table, a reading / living room under the roof with sofa-bed, and a kitchenette with bathroom.
This is a very independent set-up. Your hosts, their children and dog Cesar animate the other rooms in the house. We are all usually off to work/school or enjoying Antwerp so it can be rare to run into each other.
Children: welcome if you take into account the steep stairs that lead to the room under the roof.
A sofa bed is available in the attic room (hosts 1 adult or 2 children).<

name: Authentiek, stijlvol, warm en gezellig !
description:
Je wordt opgevangen in een gerenoveerd herenhuis dat dateert van 1891. Je slaapt in een ruime kamer met balkon, op de eerste verdieping. De badkamer bevindt zich op de tussenverdieping: er is een bad, een douche , toilet, 2 lavabo's , strijkgelegenheid...Op aanvraag kan je uitgebreid ontbijten met de lekkerste producten...Voor slechts 10 euro extra per persoon ! In deze artistieke buurt vind je heel wat gezellige restaurantjes en cafeetjes met zowel wereldkeuken als lokale proeverijen ! Welkom !

The space
Je verblijft in een warm cosy huis...

Guest access
slaapkamer en badkamer

name: Stofwisseling Guesthouse
description:
Recent gerenoveerd 1 slaapkamer appartement van 67m2.

Het appartement is ontworpen met materialen en textiel afkomstig van “Stofwisseling”, dit atelier/winkel is gelegen op de begane grond van hetzelfde pand.
Het is een verlengde van “Stofwisseling”; authentiek en hedendaags met zorgvuldig geselecteerd textiel, behangpapier en meubilair.

-

Recently renovated 1 bedroom apartment of 67m2.

The apartment is designed with materials and textiles from the workshop "Stofwisseling".

The space
Gasten hebben toegang tot de ruime lichte leefruimte, een slaapkamer met ligbad en lavabo, een ontbijtkeuken met aansluitend ingesloten terras.

-

Guests have access to the spacious and light living space, a bedroom with bath and washbasin, a breakfast kitchen with an enclosed terrace.

name: Newly renovated designer studio
description:

name: Spacious, Luxurious Flat by Historical City
description:
Beautiful, two bedroom apartment as part of a majestic house just outside Antwerp's historical city centre. Over a 100 sq/m of living/sleeping space, lots of natural light and ten minutes away from Antwerp's best bars and restaurants. The house was built by Duke and Duchess Le Grelle over 100 years ago and currently occupied by a family. “occupied by a family, where they work and live.

The space
The house has become the inspiration for the Belgian coffee brand Vascobelo and is also where the artist Isabel Miquel Arques has her Fine Art Photography atelier. The home is a blend of history, art, beauty, style, perfect imperfection and functional poetry.

The apartment is on the third floor, via stairs. Two bedrooms, a kitchen with Vascobelo Coffee provided andTea provided. Big private terrace where you can eat and relax when the weather permits. A bathroom with a shower and a dining area.

name: Charming studio close to central station
description:
Welcome to our ground floor studio flat. We currently live in London but I am originally from Antwerp so we've created this home to come back to when we visit. It's conveniently located near central station (8 minute walk), the neighbourhood is lively and has a great community feel to it, while also being in a quiet street. New places are popping up and the centre is only a 10-minute bike or tram ride away.

The space
This is a studio flat and ideal for a couple. You enter the living space which has a sofa, small desk and a double bed. In the back there's a kitchen, a conservatory, and a sunny courtyard. The bathroom is big with a nice sized walk-in shower. The studio is located on the ground floor. It has been newly renovated so all appliances are new, while respecting the original features of this historic building.

name: Private double guest room in charming row house.
description:
We welcome you into our modest yet charming early 20th century workman's house, located 450m from Berchem Station.

Our study doubles as a private guest room with a comfortable 2 person daybed.

It is our aim to make sure you have a pleasant stay. Therefore, we are happy to assist you in any way and share all accomodations, and we will gladly show you around and give you some valuable pointers to start discovering Oud-Berchem, an authentic and colorful neighborhood that bursts with creativity.

The space

Aangezien wij hier wonen heeft het appartement een uitgebreide uitrusting van bv. kookgerief, thee, zepen. Deze mag je gebruiken. Er zijn 2 kledingrekken voorzien voor de keldij van gasten.

name: Theaterstudio 2.0 Antwerp
description:
In this super cosy studio at the third floor in the heart of the city of Antwerp, you will find everything you need during your citytrip, business trip or even a longer stay - a double size boxspring bed (140x200), a comfortable sofa bed, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area with big round table, a flatscreen TV (with Netflix), a compact bathroom and enough storage space for your clothes and luggage. The perfect base to explore Antwerp from!

The space
After climbing the stairs to the third floor you will enter the studio with your key and enter the tiny hallway with built-in closet and bathroom door. You will step right into the living area where you can find on your right hand the queen size bed, in the middle of the room the living area with sofa bed and TV with Netflix and on your left the dining area with the big kitchen around the corner.
The Auping bed is made with 100% Egyptian cotton bedlinen and for each person we provide a big and a small towel.

name: Close to City Centre
description:
The house is located 15 minutes walking from Central Station and city. Public transport is just opposite the street which will take you to any part of the city. An evening at De Roma or Sportpaleis? De Roma is 4 minutes away walking and Sportpaleis is 20 minutes walking distance.
The neighbourhood is very lively, there are many shops and restaurants closeby aswell as some good pubs serving really good Belgian beers. Baker next door serves breakfast.
The interior of the house is quite modern.

The space
The room is modern and is located on the 3rd floor. Guests will have to endure the stairs. There is a full bathroom on the same floor aswell.
Guests are most welcome to join in the livingroom and in the summer they can relax on the terrace.

Guest access
The best way to explore the neighbourhood is walking around. There are many shops and fastfood/eat in facilities.

Our terrace is located between the first and second floor.

The space
About the room :
It’s 13 square metres and has a comfortable double bed. The room is decorated in warm colours and stylish furniture. It has a big closet with mirror to put your stuff in. There is daylight from the window. (Not gonna lie, the view isn’t great 😊. Luckily you didn’t come to spend all day in the room, but to discover the great city of Antwerp!)

The shared bathroom (with only the host) is right outside. It has a bath and shower. And even the radio that starts playing automatically when you turn on the light ;) There is a separate toilet on the other side of the hallway.

Via a metal staircase at the back side of the building, you enter the first floor with kitchen, dining room and living room. The bathroom and an extra dressingroom are at the second floor. A cosy bedroom is located at the third floor.

The space
The building was totally renovated in 2019 and provides all modern comfort with a fully equipped kitchen.

Welcome to Antwerp's historic city center!
Your clean and disinfected comfy home will be a light and spacious loft in a refurbished 19th century mansion.
Private entrance with cloakroom at the 4th level, wooden floors, lots of natural light with 3 big Velux roof windows. 2 Sofas, a Smart TV, DAB+ bluetooth Radio, private internet, a fully equipped kitchen, dishwasher, etc.
Queensize bed, a bathroom with bath and shower and a separate toilet. All with bed en bathroom linen.

The space
DISINFECTION of the loft and PERSONAL HYGIENE.
After each occupation the dwelling will stay vacant for 24 hours and professionally cleaned up and disinfected. A disinfecting handwash is installed at the entry, please use it.

description:
A charming studio located in the old harbor district of Antwerp known as the legendary “Schipperskwartier” Only a stroll away from the river side, shops, restaurants and all the delights of the old city centre. This Bright & cozy studio is on the first floor with an amazing view over a vivid square. Take your breakfast on a sunny morning on the balcony and feel the enery of this beautiful city.

The space
Heigh ceiling, french doors to the balcony at the front and the back, wooden stairs to the cosy mezzanine with a double bed and Apple TV for your entertainment programmed with Netflix. walk-in closet, fully stocked kitchen if you like to cook, large dining table with 8 chairs, seperate bathroom and a cozy lounge.
We love our flat and are renting out while we are away.

name: Friday Market
description:
The "Friday Market" is a newly refurbished self catering apartment overlooking the quiet, leafy square of the Vrijdagmarkt. Apart from Friday mornings when there is a bustling bric a brac market, the square is a calm oasis hidden in the middle of the historic centre of old Antwerpen.

A bright living room with a double sofa-bed and gas heating stove, a cozy bedroom with a large double bed, a fully equipped kitchen( nespresso machine, toaster, microwave) and a bathroom with a bath and a shower.

The space
Numerous vintage 'objet d'art', pictures and books adorn the apartment, I hope you like them!
The apartment is on the 2nd floor and there is no lift.

Other things to note
There is a busy Bric a Brac market on Friday mornings which affects car access to the square. The nearest open road is 30 metres from apartment.

name: Africa Jacuzzi Loft in Antwerp! 100m2 of romance.
description:
100m2 loft with jacuzzi in the most sought after location in Antwerp. Amazing city views and private 60m2 courtyard garden. Visit my beautiful "Africa Loft" and enjoy all the nearby bars and restaurants by the yacht harbour and the river. The picturesque Old Town is a 10 minute walk and connects to the city centre with its famous fashion shops and avant-guard museums.

The space
Very cozy and romantic design. Clean yet warm with African touches and a good dash of my favourite art. Very nice covered patio at the back which serves as the perfect cool down spot after a long session in the jacuzzi.

description:
Staying here will be an exclusive and unique experience, being a private apartment in a beautiful 18th century monumental mansion. The combination of old-world antique charm and stylish sophistication make this both romantic and cozy.
Upon entering the building, you will be awed by its beautiful historic entrance including a historic water pump & sculptures. The rooms feature a beautiful combination of antique wooden styled 18th century structure, complimented with modern 21st century comforts.

The space
This accommodation is wonderful for families, large groups of friends, wedding groups etc. and we will do all in our power to make your stay the best possible.

host_about:
Hosting guests and tourists is our passion.

Our mansion is situated in a prime location and extremely unique as being both a 17th century antique building that also includes all modern comforts

We felt its only morally correct that this building is offered to the general public and tourists, rather than for long term rentals.

We proudly offer accommodation for 3 different group sizes, 4 14 or 18 people, thus be it a couple on their honeymoon or romantic city break, or even a larger group getting together for a fun weekend or conference, we will be delighted to accommodate.

We also proudly offer a dining/conference hall in the building (multi option lighting, set according to your venue and needs).

People staying here marvel the beauty and experience of staying here.

We are looking forward to your bookings and the chance to give you a amazing experience.

name: Spacious room & terrace with a view over Antwerp
description:
A spacious bedroom with en suite bathroom (bathtub/shower) and your own toilet - approx. 35 sqm. The room is in an apartment on the top floor and has a great view over the Antwerp skyline.

The space
Close to the Dageraadplaats you will have 35m2 to yourself. A spacious bedroom with en suite bathroom (bathtub/shower) and your own toilet. The apartment is on the top floor and has a great view over Antwerp.

Guest access
The hallway and guest toilet, the kitchen and dining area. The living room with fire place.

Other things to note
Due to COVID-19 safety protocols the room is not available for reservations. As the kitchen and living room are shared it is nearly impossible to comply to the Airbnb COVID-19 safety practices.

description:
We make your stay as easy as can be. Where you get access to your room without using any keys, so you won’t ever lose them. With a food corner where you can refuel at any time, so you won’t be hangry anymore. With us, you have it your way.
Every private room is equipped with two single beds which can easily be put together as need be. All common spaces are located on the ground floor in a design-driven, high-tech environment. Join us! Unfold the City.

Other things to note

Gezellig vernieuwd appartement gelegen in de gekende Kloosterstraat, Dé hotspot voor alles wat met antiek, design en mode te maken heeft. Zeer centraal gelegen tussen het hippe zuid en het historisch centrum. Op wandelafstand van al het moois dat Antwerpen t bieden heeft. ruim appartement (recent gerenoveerd) met 1 slaapkamer, badkamer met apart gastentoilet, ruime living met open keuken, veel natuurlijke lichtinval. groot terras (57m2)

name: Studio Heaven: in the heart of Antwerp!
description:
Studio Heaven is a beautiful spacious studio in the heart of Antwerp. You'll stay within walking distance of De Meir shoppingstreet, the romantic Old Town, the Cathedral, the Central Station, the Zoo, theather halls, the Opera and numerous museums ... The light and spacious studio is on the 3rd floor, that's why we call it Studio Heaven. A beautiful and peacefull studio at a top location!
(Due to taxes, we don't rent the studio to companies.)

The space
The studio is light and spacious with a very comfortable double bed (160x200 cm), a closet to hang your clothes, a sitting area with a deluxe sofa bed (2p) and an eating area with a large dining table. There is a separated kitchen and bathroom. The renovated kitchen has a breakfast area, brandnew countertops, a new cookingplate, a new combi-oven and fridge with small freezer. The bathroom has a bathtub (with shower option), a toilet and sink. We provide clean sheets, bathtowels and soap. As you can see on t

Hello, I'm Hanne and I work at PRH - Persoonlijkheid en Relaties vzw.
PRH is an organization from the socio-cultural sector that gives courses on personal growth. Studio Heaven is on the 3rd floor of our building were you can enjoy a pleasant stay at a unique location.

name: Antwerp For Two Bed & Breakfast
description:
Our B&B has spacious rooms and is designed to guarantee a delicious night’s rest for two people. You have your own bathroom (with a reviving rain shower and powerful hairdryer) and a separate toilet. A safe big enough to hold your laptop computer, Wi-Fi, digital radio and smart TV with sound bar. After a visit to the city, you can take time to relax on our terrace. And if you feel like a snack or a drink, just serve yourself from your well-stocked Honesty Bar.

The space
When designing your room, we put a great deal of attention into ensuring your comfort while taking a proactive approach to the environment. In your bathroom, for instance, you will find an environmentally friendly soap dispenser with high-quality shampoo, conditioner and shower gel.

host_about: Onze B&B Antwerp For Two boek je vanaf 1 nacht in de week en 2 nachten in het weekend. Je verblijft in een ruime kamer, die zo ingericht werd dat je met 2 personen van een zalige nachtrust kan genieten. Je beschikt over een eigen badkamer (met verkwikkende regendouche en krachtige haardroger) en een apart toilet. Een ruime kluis waar je portable in past, wifi, digitale radio en smart-tv met soundbar zijn aanwezig. Na een bezoek aan de stad vind je rust op je terras. Heb je zin in een hapje of drankje, dan neem je dat zelf uit je goedgevulde Honesty Bar.

name: Antwerpen-Zuid, prachtig huis met tuin en garage
description:
Prachtig gerenoveerd huis op het bruisende Antwerpen Zuid met inpandige garage en zonnige zuid-tuin in de buurt van Mukha, Momu en Fomu. Alle bezienswaardigheden op loopafstand en horeca-gelegenheiden op loopafstand. Extra's : Hammam, Pooltafel en barbeque aanwezig.

Other things to note
-> De douche beschikt over een fijne Hammam voor 2 personen met mozaiektegeltjes.
-> Twee fietsen (1 stadsfiets, 1 citybike) staan ter beschikking voor gebruik.

name: Charming and cosy apartment in the old town
description:
If you are looking for a charming place with everything you need for a great stay in Antwerp, this is your place. Located in between the hip neighbourhood Het eilandje and the historic city centre. The cathedral, Grote Markt and Groenplaats are only a 5min walk. The fashion district and shopping streets will take you 10 min by foot or 3 min by tram (stops at 100m) to Meir. The MAS museum is right around the corner. There are 2 bakeries with breakfast within 20 meters of the appartement.

The space
This appartement (70m² ) is trendy, cool and newly renovated combining high ceilings with exposed beams, and a cosy wooden floor. It is located at the first floor of a small building, and equipped with a lift. The flat features all the modern facilities you need. Wifi, smart tv, fully equipped kitchen, bathroom with rain shower and separate toilet. In the bedroom you will find a queen size hotel bed. The living space has a couch that transforms into a double sofa

name: Central Perk Apartment - Antwerp
description:
Vlak naast de nieuwe "groene long" van Antwerpen , bieden wij op het gezellige Damplein een cosy ingerichte appartement op het gelijkvloers en een trendy loft op de vierde etage. De verschillende leefruimtes, uitgerust met een knusse sofa hebben aansluitend een volledig ingerichte keuken. De slaapkamer en badkamer zijn voorzien van alle comfort. Tal van sportieve mogelijkheden in de buurt. Zo ook gezellige bars en restaurantjes. In de directe omgeving van het Sportpaleis en Lotto Arena.

The space
Cosy ingerichte appartement op de gelijkvloerse verdieping.
Wij voorzien een Nespresso machine, waterkoker en broodrooster. Shampoo, douchegel, handdoeken en beddengoed liggen klaar bij aankomst.
Mocht dit appartement niet meer vrij zijn, vrij vrijblijvend naar onze andere accomodaties. Een babybedje kan op aanvraag.

Other things to note
Ontbijt 15EUR per persoon, enkel op bestelling.

name: Rustic hidden gem apartment in the ❤️ of Antwerp
description:
This cosy appartment in the city centre of antwerp is really a golden gem. An oasis of peace and quite yet all shops, bars, restaurants, and much more within 50 metre

The space
50 m², nice trendy appartment with a very cosy and open kitchen and all utilities. 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, and all accomodations to enjoy a perfect stay. Although it is located in the city centre, it’s a hidden gem that offers peace and quiet.

host_about:
Hi there! My name is Maarten, and I’ve been living here in Antwerp for all my life. This really is my little piece of heaven. 

I enjoy meeting new people and familiarizing myself with other cultures. This is, essentially, why I’ve decided to become an Airbnb host. I’m enthusiastic about sports and various curiosa. Making people happy and helping where I can will always make my day. 

Eat, Sleep and Wander.

Right in the center of Antwerp on the best possible location. Just next to the famous shopping street Meir, surrounded by revered coffee bars and fashion stores.
2 beautiful bedrooms with broad windows.
A brand new fully equipped kitchen, large bathroom, a luminous balcony and a wonderful rooftop terrace. Less than a 5 minute walk to the city hall, the main square 'Groenplaats' and less than 10 minutes walking to the Central Station. Perfect for an amazing holiday or a business trip in Antwerp!

The space
Our apartments are decorated to make you feel at home. We want to give you a warm, enjoyable and relaxing place to rest while exploring our beautiful city. Our apartment is equipped with all essentials for a comfortable trip. Eg. a fully equipped kitchen, fresh bedlinnen and towels for each guest, shower gel, shampoo and conditioner, coffee, tea, hair dryer etc.

You are surrounded by all the historic-high-lights of Antwerp and there are several iconic café's, bars and restaurants in the area. The central station is a 15min walk. The kitchen is fully equipped and we supply fresh linen, towels and all essentials. Hopefully we'll host you soon!

The space
Our apartments are decorated to make you feel at home. We want to give you a warm, enjoyable and relaxing place to rest while exploring our beautiful city. Our apartment is equipped with all essentials for a comfortable trip. Eg. a fully equipped kitchen, fresh bedlinen and towels for each guest, shower gel, shampoo and conditioner, coffee, tea, hair dryer etc.

Guest access
The whole apartment is available, private & yours.

name: The Fashion Street Apartments 1
description:
Right in the historic heart of Antwerp, we host a fully equipped, renovated apartment inside an antique building.

A 1 minute walk to the main square "Groenplaats" on a quiet street. A 15 min walk to the Central Station and less than 5 min walk to the famous shopping street "Meir". We are surrounded by several lunch bars and fashion shops. The cities top restaurant area is also less then 5 min walking from the apartment.

The best possible place for an amazing stay in Antwerp! :-)

description:
Stylish apartment with a gorgeous view of the city center and the sunrise.

Right next to the Opera of Antwerp and a few minutes from the Central Station. We are on the corner of the famous shopping street "the Meir". The most renowned shopping street of Belgium.

The Grote Markt is a 10 minute walk. Our apartments has the ideal location for city-trips, holidays and business trips. We have strong WiFi and a brand new and fully equipped kitchen.

Hope to host you soon! Cheers! :-)

The whole place is fully equipped and we provide fresh linen and towels.

name: Rustig gelegen huis op toplocatie
description:
Het huis is zeer rustig gelegen in het historisch stadscentrum achter een winkel bereikbaar via een afgesloten gang.

De locatie is in een hippe winkelbuurt en vlakbij restaurants, cafés en openbaar vervoer.

Op 5 minuten wandelafstand zijn er ook meerdere ontbijtgelegenheden en supermarkten.

Voor het huis is er een private binnenkoer met terrasje waar ook enkele fietsen kunnen worden geplaatst.

The space
Rust en stilte in een stijlvol ingerichte gerenoveerde woning midden in de Antwerpse hippe modebuurt.

Guest access
De gehele woning is ter beschikking

name: Cosy studio in trendy neighbourhood!

I do have 2 canaries but they are very quiet so they won't bother you. Just a cosy place where you can relax after visiting the vibrant city of Antwerp!

The space
My studio is 45m2 and has 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom with shower + bathtub. The kitchen has a dish washer which is also nice. I have very big bookcase so feel free to read anything! I also have a TV, DVD player and Netflix that you can use.

There are plenty of parking spots right at the street (paying after 2 hours and before 9PM) and the historical city centre is only a 15 minutes tram drive or bike ride away. Beautiful new apartement with nice sun terras in the heart of Antwerp historical center. In the middle of nice shopping streets, bars and restaurants.
It has a cosy, homy style . And immediately gives you that feeling of walking in to your own “get-a-way” in Antwerp.

The space
We designed it as if we would live there ourselfs .
For us it is important that you feel at home and welcome .
On the corner you’ll find an amazing breakfast bar, on the other side of the street the best coffee-/interior shop of Antwerp and just 20m a way a supermarket.
All the best shops of Antwerp are just a 1 min walk away .
The historical monuments of the city are literally around the corner .

We hope you will love this apartement as much as we do .

Other things to note
Very new and cosy

name: Frisse, ruime kamer op het trendy Zuid
description:
Wij bieden een hippe ruimte aan, gelegen op het trendy Zuid in hartje Antwerpen. De lichte kamer is de perfecte uitvalsbasis om de stad te verkennen. In onze buurt vind je heel wat leuke eethuisjes, koffiebars, musea en winkels.

Houd je meer van rust? Onze bnb biedt de mogelijkheid om je terug te trekken voor een zelfgemaakt ontbijt, een koffie in onze schommelstoeltjes of een goed boek op het terras.

We staan garant voor een ontspannen sfeer, en 'local' tips om alles uit je bezoek te halen.

The space
Onze airbnb bevindt zich op de tweede verdieping van een gezellige rijwoning in Antwerpen. Je bereikt de kamer via een gezamenlijke trap. Vlakbij de kamer kan je beschikken over een privé toilet met een eigen (kleine) lavabo.

De badkamer is gedeeld maar meer dan de moeite waard, check de foto's maar. Handdoeken, een haardroger en beddengoed wachten je uiteraard op.

Wie af en toe graag zelf zijn eten voorziet kan rekenen

name: New 2-bedroom condo in the heart of Antwerp
description:
Fully furnished 2-bedroom apartment + terrace in the heart of Antwerp, one block away from the Central Station and located in a highly residential area, next to Antwerp's Diamond District. The apartment was completely renovated three years ago. Airco has been installed in June 2021!

The space
The apartment is on the 3rd floor and is approx. 95m² large. The hall has a bicycle storage space. There is a washing machine and dishwasher in the apartment as well.

name: Cosy apARTment in the suburbs
description:
The flat is located on the first floor (USA: second floor) on a quiet street in the green residential area of Wilrijk. Both bedrooms face the street.
It's a 2 bedroom flat suitable for 3 people. It's bright and cozy. It was designed by an interior architect who combined timeless design with modern artwork.

The living areas are in a large open-space design so you can walk freely from the kitchen through the dining area and into the living room.

There is no elevator, no TV and no microwave.

The space
The master bedroom has a big walk-in dressing making it suitable for long stays.
The second bedroom has a full-length single bed (2m long). The bed has 3 drawers for storage. There is enough seating in the living and dining room for 4 people. The kitchen is fully equipped with a large fridge, an oven, an induction stovetop and a dishwasher.
The bathroom has a walk-in shower and no bathtub.

Beautiful and light city apartment situated in a quit street in the trendy Antwerp South district. The apartment is recently fully renovated and is the perfect stay to enjoy the city of Antwerp to the fullest. Walking distance from the bruising Antwerp South district

Separate bedroom (double bed) with a closet room next to it.
Bathroom with 2 sinks, walk in shower and bath tub.
Separate toilet.
Fully stocked kitchen with everything you need for cooking:
- Refrigerator
- oven
- Microwave
- Dishwasher
- Coffe machine
- A lot of pots, pans, plates, glasses and other kitchen equipment
The apartment is on the 3rd floor in a building without a lift.

name: Duplex apartment in an original Antwerp town house
description:
Fully equipped apartment on the 2nd and 3rd floor of an original townhouse built in 1884.
In the most fashionable and vibrant part of town (Het Zuid), close to the fashion district, the Kloosterstraat with its vintage and antiques shops, shopping street "Meir" and lots of museums, bars and restaurants nearby.
The apartment has its own kitchen, bathroom, 2 bedrooms (2nd bedroom to be installed) and the private use of a huge terrace.
There is a baby cot if needed and coffee and tea is offered.

The space
Welcome to Antwerp's most fashionable neighborhood!

Your home will be a light and spacious apartment in an authentic mansion.

White wooden floors, lots of natural light, a huge terrace, fully equipped kitchen with coffee, tea etc. and a separate bathroom with shower.

Everything you need for a nice getaway!
You get to live here like a local! ;-)

name: Bright Oasis in City Center w/ Rooftop Terrace!
description:
Welcome to our peaceful retreat in the heart of Antwerp’s vibrant city center! (Just minutes from Central Station!)

With many of Antwerp's finest cultural, gastronomic and sartorial gems just minutes away, awake refreshed in this brightly lit space ready to explore all this exciting city has to offer! Enjoy your morning coffee while taking in the sweeping city skyline on our rooftop terrace, or relax in our peaceful interior (complete w/ Mediterranean accents) after a busy day out on the town.

The space
Bedroom:
Since our apartment is located on the 9th floor (don’t worry, there’s a lift!), this stylish room doesn't only offer incredible views of the city and a comfortable queen-size bed, but is also the perfect haven for a good night's rest - away from all the noise of the city! Fresh linens included.

Bathroom:
Along with a walk-in shower, you will be able to enjoy:

- Free toiletries (shampoo, conditioner and body wash)

name: Top located, cosy and very charming apartment
description:
This apartment, fully renovated in 2019, is the perfect central based place to explore the beautiful city of Antwerp. It is located on the 5th floor of one of the most prestigious projects from architect, Marc Segers, just after WOII. The building has a sober modernistic style, which fits perfectly in the architecture of the central 'Leien' next to the beautiful old National Bank.

The space
The apartment is on the 5th floor on the side of “the Leien”. The bedroom is on the back of the apartment which will guarantee you a good night's sleep. The open kitchen and living room improve the comfort and functionality of the place. There is a separate bedroom with a boxspring (double bed - 1.80m), a separate modern bathroom and a toilet. There is a small balcony (south-east oriented) in the front of the apartment which gives you a nice view of 'the Leien'.

What do you get?

-Fresh bed linnen
-Fresh towels
-Hair dryer
-Soap and shampoo<

Ideal to discover Antwerp.
