*Gemeubelde uiters lichtrijk en zonnig hoekappartement op toplocatie vlak over Hof van Roosendael.Vanop het heel zonnige zuidwest georiënteerde living kijkt u op het kasteel en park. Via de zeer ruime open living komt u in de volledig ingerichte open keuken (koelkast met diepvries, oven, afwasmachine). Aansluitend is er een zonnig balkon. Verder beschikt het appartement over drie slaapkamers, 1 groot met kingsize bed en de anderen met elks 2 bedden. Grote badkamer met bad. Aangenaam groot app!

The space
Zeer mooi lichtrijk appartement vlak over park en kasteel Roosendael.

name: Beautiful spacious Loft in the Heart of Antwerp
description: Enjoy our 200m2 fully renovated loft in the city center of Antwerp. This very large loft on the first floor of the remains of a 15th century abbey is equipped with all modern comfort. It has 3 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, a nice dining room and living room, a lounge area with a large TV, wifi and a beautiful terrace overlooking the garden. Visit Antwerps city center, a city full of ancient heritage, museums, nice restaurants, bars and shops, all at walking distance.

After working for over 15 years as a consultant, trainer and coach in human resources for private people and organisations in different sectors, I have decided in 2018 to reorient my career and to follow my passion for interior design and real estate. 
I’m here to go above and beyond to ensure all our guests enjoy their stay and to provide the best quality customer service possible. I like to spend my free time with my family and enjoying what our beautiful city has to offer. We look forward to hosting you and providing you the best Airbnb experience.

name: Charming studio at top location Meir
description:
This recently (2019) renovated studio is situated on the 2nd floor of a small and quiet building in probably the best location in Antwerp.

Closeby the Opera, a few streets from the most renowned shopping street of Belgium, “The Meir”, and just a 10 minute walk from Central Station or the “Grote Markt”…

This studio is the ideal location for city-trips, holidays and business trips. We have strong WiFi, stronger coffee and a brand new and fully equipped kitchen.

We wish you a pleasant stay! (-:

The space
Our apartment is equipped with all essentials for a comfortable trip. E.g. a fully equipped kitchen, fresh bedlinnen and towels, shower gel, shampoo and conditioner, coffee, tea… And last but not least, a Nespresso machine! What else?

Guest access
The studio is entirely private for our guests. Sharing is caring, but not in your safe harbour. :-)

Living room with LG UHD 50 inch Smart TV, with Netflix and Spotify. In the bedroom there is a coffee corner for your delicious morning coffee =)

The apartment is close to many popular bars and restaurants (Draakplaats, Dageraadplaats en Groen kwartier) all within walking distance. Possibility to rent an Antwerp city bike (Velo).

We have an international mindset and we like to socialise. Whenever you like to do it too, you are always welcome. If you prefer to be alone, it is also okay for us. 😉

The space
You'll have a big bedroom on the top floor. Kitchen can be used if needed. Coffee and tea can be used. The bathroom is shared. There is the possibility to do the laundry after 22 during the week and whenever in the weekend.

Other things to note
💡 Please put off the lights when you go around the house and when you leave.

🚪 Close the door turning the key because it is kind of broken and does not close good without turning it.

👟 Leave the shoes downstairs in the hall.

🚬 Smoking is not allowed.

Department stores, top butchers, caterers, greengrocers, everything is within walking distance. Boutiques and various galleries complete the district.

The South is a culinary and cultural hotspot. The neighborhood is packed with trendy bars and restaurants and the Royal Museum of Fine Arts and the Museum of Contemporary Art are within walking distance.

Our personal city guide will make it easier for you to plan your weekend.

The space
The apartment is at the first floor. De living room contains a sitting area with television (with Netflix), a dining table and an open kitchen. The kitchen is fully equipped.

Next door is the bedroom with a double bed and facilities to put away your stuff.

In the back is the bathroom with a shower and toilet.

name: Beautiful townhouse in authentic neighborhood
description:
Verblijf in dit herenhuis van meer dan 100jaar oud. Het is gerenoveerd met een oog voor detail en respect voor de oude elementen. Het huis is ruim, telt 2 grote slaapkamers, een prachtige badkamer met zalig ligbad en beneden een grote living, eetruimte en gezellige leefkeuken. Het huis is gelegen in een van de mooiste wijken van Antwerpen, Zurenborg. Deze wijk staat vol mooie huizen en is het waard om eens in rond te wandelen. Daarnaast heeft het leuke pleinen met de gezelligste bars en cafes.

The space
Op de gelijkvloers van dit herenhuis kan je de open keuken, eetkamer, living en terras vinden. Alsook een toilet in de gang. Op de eerste verdieping bevindt zich een slaapkamer en de badkamer. Op de tweede verdieping kan je de tweede slaapkamer vinden. Dit is een grote kamer van 6x8meter.

name: Enjoy ShipStays Hotel in Antwerp, Belgium
description:
Make your trip unforgettable! Stay on board these authentic docked tall sailing ships.

These beautiful docked ships feature comfortable cabins and showers that make guests immediately feel right at home.

The spacious lounges with their maritime feel feature a full bar.

With plenty of room these docked ships are perfect for scenic weddings, business trips and other large events.

Guests can enjoy relaxing on deck with friends while watching the sun set.

Welcome Aboard :)

The space
The ship 1 was built in 1898 in the Netherlands and was primarily used as a transport ship traveling the Baltic Sea. For the past 30 years this ship has been hosting charter trips and has a capacity to host 24 overnight guests.

The ship 2 was built in 1909 and was primarily used as a cargo ship. With a capacity to sleep 22 guests, this ship is ideal for weddings, business trips and other large events.

description:
This apartment is located in the heart of Antwerp. It has a view on the most popular street of the city: De Grote Markt.

name: Kasteel Boterlaerhof vlakbij Antwerpen
description:
Kasteel Boterlaerhof ligt ideaal gelegen, op 15 min van centrum van Antwerpen, op 100m van het park Rivierenhof. Bij het kasteeldomein hoort een prachtige tuin met zandbak en een bos.
Het kasteel biedt plaats voor 39p, verdeeld over 7 slaapkamers van 3 a 6p. Elke slaapkamer beschikt over een eigen badkamer. Daarnaast zijn er 3 zalen en een keuken in het kasteel.
Deze locatie is ideaal voor vriendengroepen met of zonder kinderen en families.

name: Infinite luxury stay in the heart of Antwerp
description: Experience, modern stylish luxury stay in the heart of Antwerp... conveniently and centrally-located. 50 meters from the apartment you can rent a bike and explore the city... Our suite has massive amenities if u want to shop or work or u can stay in and bask in luxury... So many must see places and must eat establishments bars and restaurants from all over the world, visit the Museums, Zoo or go Shopping for designer brands or check out our Diamond district...its our infinite pleasure to serve.
